1b1(khri pa): rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya da shas ha sr-ik+Sha pradz+nyo pA ra mi
1b2(khri pa): tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tA/bod skad du/'phags po shes rab kyi
1b3(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa khro pi zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po
1b4(khri pa): dang po/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
2a1(khri pa): //'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya/
2a2(khri pa): rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong phrag du ma'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/thams /
2a3(khri pa): cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/sems shin tu
2a4(khri pa): rnam par gril ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/cang shes pa glang po chen po/bya ba byas pa/byed pa
2a5(khri pa): byas pa khur bor ba/bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba/yongs su zad pa/yang dag/
2b1(khri pa): pa'i shos pas/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/gang
2b2(khri pa): zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o//dge slong ma lnga brgya tsamra dang
2b3(khri pa): dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma thams cad kyang bdeni pa mthong ba sha stag drang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po stong
2b4(khri pa): phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ting nge 'dzin thob pa/stong pa nyid la gnas pa/mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul ba/ma
2b5(khri pa): brtags pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa thob pa/spobs pa thogs pa med pa thob pa thams cad kyang mungon par
2b6(khri pa): shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/gzung ba'i tshig dang ldan pa/tshul 'chos pa med pa/shes kyi khe dang /rnyed pa dang /bkur sti'i sems
3a1(khri pa): dang bral ba/zang zing med par chos ston pa/chos zab mo la bzod pa'i pha rol tu son pa/mi 'jigs pa thob pa/bdud kyi
3a2(khri pa): las las yang dag par 'das pa/las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/bstan pa'i chos ston pas bsags pa/bskal pa grangs
3a3(khri pa): med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/gsong por smra ba/bzhin khro gnyer med pa/'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis
3a4(khri pa): gnon pa'i ma 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/bskal pa bye ba phrag du mar bstan pas nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa/chos la sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /rmi lam
3a5(khri pa): dang /chu zla dang /mig yor dang /nam mkha' dang /brag cha dang /dri za'i grong khyer dang /gzugs brnyan dang /sprul pa lta bur mos pa/mi 'jigs pa/
3a6(khri pa): tshad med pa dang ldan pa/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /mos pa dang /phra ba mkhyen pa/khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/sems
3b1(khri pa): can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/bzod pa chen po dang ldan pa/ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa la mkhas pa/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par smon pa
3b2(khri pa): yongs su bzung ba/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mngon du gyur pa/sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol
3b3(khri pa): ba 'debs pa la mkhas pa/lta ba sna tshogs kyis kun nas bslang ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la mkhas pa/ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba 'bum mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas
3b4(khri pa): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /ded dpon dang /nA las byin dang /
3b5(khri pa): gzas byin dang /chu lhas byin dang /dbang pos byin dang /blo gros rgya chen dang /blo gros khyad par can dang /blo gros 'phel dang /mthong ba don yod dang /shin tu yang dag zhugs
3b6(khri pa): dang /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa dang /rtag tu brtson dang /brtson pa mi gtong dang /nyi ma'i snying po dang /zla ba'i snying po dang /blo gros dpe med dang /spyan ras gzigs
3b7(khri pa): kyi dbang phyug dang /'jam dpal dang /lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu lag brkyang dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o chen po byams
4a1(khri pa): //pa dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang thabs cig go/de'i tshe bcom ldan
4a2(khri pa): 'das kyis brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis gzi brjid zil gyis mnan nas/'khor bzhi po de dag gi mdun na lham me lhan ne lhang nge zhing rdzu 'phrul
4a3(khri pa): gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul rnam pa du ma dag yang dag par bstan to//spu'i khung bu rnams nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag byung bar gyur to//yang de'i
4a4(khri pa): tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA re dwa ti'i bu 'khor drir 'dus par gyur te/'dug pa des de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas dga' zhing
4a5(khri pa): mgu la yi rangs te/rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas/stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
4a6(khri pa): te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/btsun pa
4a7(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
4b1(khri pa): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba'i phyir rtag tu skabs phye zin gyis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /
4b2(khri pa): dris pa de dang de'i lan btab pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom
4b3(khri pa): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de gang lags/chos gang
4b4(khri pa): gi pha rol tu phyin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa lags shing /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
4b5(khri pa): 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so//
4b6(khri pa): 'di ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis zhu ba zhus pa mdzes so//khyod kyis yongs su rtog pa bzang ngo //de'i phyir khyod logs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /shes
4b7(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya'o//btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la
5a1(khri pa): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa
5a2(khri pa): med pa yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mngon par zhen pa med pa rnams ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin zhing /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par
5a3(khri pa): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis gang la mngon par
5a4(khri pa): zhen par mi bgyi ba'i chos de dag thams cad gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste/phung po lnga dang /skye mched
5a5(khri pa): bcu gnyis dang /khams bco brgyad dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yong dag
5a6(khri pa): pa'i spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam
5a7(khri pa): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs
5b1(khri pa): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /'du shes dgu dang /rjes su dran pa bcu dang /'du shes kyi rnam pa
5b2(khri pa): drug dang /chos shes pa dang /rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /kun rdzob shes pa dang /sdug bsngal shes pa dang /kun 'byung shes pa dang /'gog pa shes pa dang /
5b3(khri pa): lam shes pa dang /zad pa shes pa dang /mi skye ba shes pa dang /ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang /de bzhin du rtog pa dang bcas/dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam
5b4(khri pa): gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang /kun shes pa'i dbang po dang /kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang /zil gyis
5b5(khri pa): gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang /zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang /stong pa nyid bco brgyad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
5b6(khri pa): dang /byamos pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad
5b7(khri pa): mkhyen po nyid dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /mngon por shes pa lnga dang /mig lnga dang /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag ste/gang la byang
6a1(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis mngon par zhen par mi bya ba'i chos thams cad ni de dag yin no//mngon par zhen pa med pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
6a2(khri pa): pha rol tu son pa yin zhing /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA
6a3(khri pa): radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das phung po lnga gang lags zhes bya ba nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro//
6a4(khri pa): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi gang lags zhes bya ba nas/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid gang lags zhes bya ba nas/rnam
6a5(khri pa): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro//pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang lags zhes bya ba nas/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po dag ces bya ba'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ro//
6a6(khri pa): de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu phung po lnga zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/gzugs dang /tshor ba dang //
6a7(khri pa): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'o//de la skye mched bcu gnyis gang zhe na/nang gi drug dang /phyi'i drug ste/de dag ni skye mched bcu gnyis zhes bya'o//de la
6b1(khri pa): nang gi skye mched drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mig gi skye mched dang /rna ba'i skye mched dang /sna'i skye mched dang /lce'i skye mched dang /lus kyi skye mched dang /yid kyi skye mched de/de dag ni nang gi
6b2(khri pa): skye mched drug ces bya'o//de la phyi'i skye mched drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzugs kyi skye mched dang /sgra'i skye mched dang /dri'i skye mched dang /ro'i skye mched dang /reg bya'i skye mched dang //
6b3(khri pa): chos kyi skye mched do//de dag ni phyi'i skye mchod drug ces bya'o//de la khams bco brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
6b4(khri pa): khams dang /rna ba'i khams dang /sgra'i khams dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /sna'i khams dang /dri'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lce'i khams dang /
6b5(khri pa): ro'i khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lus kyi khams dang /reg bya'i khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi khams
6b6(khri pa): dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams te/de dag ni khams bco brgyad ces bya'o//de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
6b7(khri pa): kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /lam 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya'o//de la rten cing 'brel
7a1(khri pa): par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis
7a2(khri pa): ming dang gzugs/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/
7a3(khri pa): len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrugs pa rnams
7a4(khri pa): 'byung ste/de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro//ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/
7a5(khri pa): rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ming dang gzugs 'gags pos skye mched drug 'gag/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/reg pa 'gags pas tshor
7a6(khri pa): ba 'gag/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/skye ba 'gags
7a7(khri pa): pas rga shi dang /mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba'
7b1(khri pa): zhig po 'di dag 'gag par gyur te/de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa lugs dang mthun pa dang /lugs dang mi mthun pa zhes bya'o//de ladran pa nye bar bzhag
7b2(khri pa): pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa
7b3(khri pa): nye bar bzhag pa dang /chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ste/de dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi zhes bya'o//de la yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/'di la byang chub
7b4(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog
7b5(khri pa): pa dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'obade la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /dge ba'i chos
7b6(khri pa): ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang /
7b7(khri pa): me brjod pa dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /phyir zhing bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed cing 'bad la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/sems rab tu 'dzin cing yang dag par rab
8a1(khri pa): tu 'jog pa ste/de dag ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya'o//de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'dra byed dang ldan pa
8a2(khri pa): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
8a3(khri pa): dang /dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ste/de dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya'o//de la dbang po lnga gang zhe ni 'di lta ste/dad pa'i dbang po dang /
8a4(khri pa): brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po ste/de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o//de la stobs lnga gang zhe na de bzhin du dad pa'i stobs
8a5(khri pa): dang /brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /dran pa'i stobs dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /shes rab kyi stobs te/de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o//de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/
8a6(khri pa): 'di lta ste/dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /chos rab tu rnam par 'gyod pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /dga' ba yang dag
8a7(khri pa): byang chub kyi yan lag dang /shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/de
8b1(khri pa): dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o//de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i dgra
8b2(khri pa): dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/de dag ni 'phags pa'i
8b3(khri pa): lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o//de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa/rnam
8b4(khri pa): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid de/de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis
8b5(khri pa): mtshan ma med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa/rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ste/de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o//de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa
8b6(khri pa): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la/mngon par 'du byed pa med par sems gnas pa/smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/de ni rnam par thar
8b7(khri pa): pa'i sgo smon pa med pa zhes bya'o//de la bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/'dod pa dag las dben pa/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/
9a1(khri pa): dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde bcan bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs
9a2(khri pa): su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /
9a3(khri pa): de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/bde ba lus kyis myong la/'phags pa rnams kyis gang de la dran pa dang ldan
9a4(khri pa): pa/bde ba dang ldan pa/bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de bde ba'ang spangs te/snga nas
9a5(khri pa): sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas sdug bsngal yang ma yin/bde ba'ang ma yin pa/btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/bsam
9a6(khri pa): gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/de dag ni bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya'o//de la tshad med pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /
9a7(khri pa): btang snyoms te/de dag ni tshad med pa bzhi zhes bya'o//de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes
9b1(khri pa): mtha' yas skye mched dang /ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de/de dag ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya'o//de la rnam par
9b2(khri pa): thar pa brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la
9b3(khri pa): lta ba 'di na rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o//sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag
9b4(khri pa): par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
9b5(khri pa): bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam
9b6(khri pa): shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ci'ang med do snyam nas
9b7(khri pa): ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes med 'du shes med
10a1(khri pa): min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du
10a2(khri pa): shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o//de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
10a3(khri pa): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /
10a4(khri pa): bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa dang po'o//de rtog pa dang /dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas
10a5(khri pa): rtog pa med pa/dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis pa'o//
10a6(khri pa): de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa shes bzhin can yin te/bde ba lus kyis myong la/'phags pa rnams kyi gang dran pa dang ldan pa bde
10a7(khri pa): ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs ste gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa gsum pa'o//de bde ba'ang spangs te/snga nas
10b1(khri pa): sdug bsngal yang sbyangs shing yid bde ba dang /ying mi bde ba nub pas sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/bde ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang /dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs
10b2(khri pa): te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /snga
10b3(khri pa): tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa lnga pa'o//de rnam pa
10b4(khri pa): thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni snyoms
10b5(khri pa): par 'jug pa drug pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ci'ang med do snyam nas/ci 'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa
10b6(khri pa): 'dri ni snyoms par 'jug pa bdun pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa
10b7(khri pa): 'a'adi ni snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes mdo 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te
11a1(khri pa): gnas pa 'di ni snyoms par 'jug pa dgu pa ste/de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o//de la 'du shes dgu gang zhe na/'dri lta ste/rnam par
11a2(khri pa): bam pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /rnam par brnags pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang /
11a3(khri pa): rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /rus gong gi 'du shes dang /rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes te/de dag ni 'du shes dgu zhes bya'o//de la rjes su
11a4(khri pa): dran pa bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /gtong ba rjes su dran
11a5(khri pa): pa dang /lha rjes su dran pa dang /nye bar zhi ba rjes su dran pa dang /dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa dang //lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang /'chi ba rjes su dran pa ste/
11a6(khri pa): de dag ni rjes su dran pa bcu zhes bya'o//de la 'du shes kyi rnam pa drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang /sdug bsngal ba'i 'odu shes dang /bdag med pa'i 'du shes
11a7(khri pa): dang /mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dang /'chi ba'i 'du shes dang /'jig rten thams cad la mngon par mi dga' bo'i 'du shes te/de dag ni 'du shes kyi rnam pa drug ces bya'o//de la
11b1(khri pa): chos shes pa grang zhe na/phung po lnga po rnams yongs su sbyang ba/bya ba la yongs su gcod pa'i shes pa gang yin pa ste/de ni chos shes pa zhes bya'o//de la rjes su rtogs par shes pa
11b2(khri pa): gang zhe na/mig mi rtag go zhes shes pa gang yin pa dang /de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang /lus dang yid dang /gzugs dang sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams
11b3(khri pa): mi rtag go zhes shes pa gang yin pa ste/de ni rjes su rtogs par shes pa zhes bya'o//de la pha rol gyi sems shes pa gang zhe na/sems nyid kyis sems can gzhan rnams dang /gang/
11b4(khri pa): zag gzhan rnams kyi sems dang /sems las byung ba'i chos rnams la the tshom med par shes pa ste/de ni pha rol gyi sems shes pa zhes bya'o//de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/
11b5(khri pa): lam shes pa gang yin pa ste/de ni kun rdzob shes pa zhes bya'o//de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/sdug bsngal skye ba dang gnas pa shes pa ste/de ni sdug bsngal shes pa zhes
11b6(khri pa): bya'o//de la kun 'byung ba shes pa gang zhe na/kun 'byung ba spong ba shes pa gang yin pa ste/de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o//de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/sdug
11b7(khri pa): bsngal 'gog pa shes pa gang yin pa ste/da ni 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o//de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa gang
12a1(khri pa): yin pa ste/de ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o//de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnams zad par shes pa gang yin pa ste/de ni zad
12a2(khri pa): par shes pa zhes bya'o//de la mi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams su mi skye ba shes pa ste/de ni mi skye ba shes pa zhes bya'o//de la ji lta ba bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/de
12a3(khri pa): bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes gang yin pa ste/de ni ji lta ba bzhin shes pa zhes bya'o//de la mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/gang zag
12a4(khri pa): slob pa mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa
12a5(khri pa): ste/de ni mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o//de la kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/gang zag slob pa mngon par rtogs par gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson
12a6(khri pa): 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po gang yin pa ste/de ni kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o//de la kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/gang
12a7(khri pa): zag mi slob pa 'di lta ste/dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
12b1(khri pa): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab kyi dbang po ste/de ni kun shes pa dang ldan
12b2(khri pa): pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o//de la rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/'dod pa dag las dben pa/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/dga' ba dang bde
12b3(khri pa): ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa ste/de ni rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o//de la rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/bsam
12b4(khri pa): gtan dang po dang /bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar gang yin pa ste/de ni rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//de la mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/bsam gtan/
12b5(khri pa): dang po nas bzung ste/'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar du snyoms par 'jug pa ste/de ni mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched/
12b6(khri pa): brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang /kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas
12b7(khri pa): shos zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste/de lta bur 'du shes par 'gyur ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen
13a1(khri pa): por gyur pa kha dog bzang po dang /kha dog ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste/de lta bur 'du shes par gyur
13a2(khri pa): pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/kha dog ston po/sngon po lta bur ston pa/'od sngon po 'byung ba
13a3(khri pa): rnams la 'di lta ste/dper no zar ma'i me tog gam/yul b+hA ra NA si'i ras phun sum tshogs pa sngon po/kha dog sngon po/sngon po lta bur ston pa/'od sngon po 'byung ba de bzhin du
13a4(khri pa): nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/kha dog sngon po/sngon po lta bur ston pa/'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched
13a5(khri pa): gsum pa'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po/ser po lta bur ston pa/'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/dper na drong ka'i me
13a6(khri pa): tog gam/yul bA ra NA si'i ras phun sum tshogs pa ser po kha dog ser po/ser po lta bur ston pa/'od ser po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/phyi rol gyi
13a7(khri pa): gzugs ser po kha dog ser po/ser po lta bur ston pa/'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas//
13b1(khri pa): phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po/dmar po lta bur ston pa/'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/dper na ban+d+ha dzi ba'i me tog gam/yul bA ra NA si'i ras phun tshogs pa
13b2(khri pa): dmar po kha dog dmar po/dmar po lta bur ston pa/'od dmar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po/dmar po lta bur
13b3(khri pa): ston pa/'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o//nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog dkar po/dkar
13b4(khri pa): po lta bur ston pa/'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la 'di lta ste/dper na skor ma pa be sangs kyi mdog dkar po kha dog dkar po/dkar po lta bur ston pa/'od dkar po 'byung ba de bzhin
13b5(khri pa): du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog dkar po/dkar po lta bur ston pa/'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i
13b6(khri pa): skye mched drug pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams
13b7(khri pa): yod la mi byed pas/nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o//de rnam pa
14a1(khri pa): thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te
14a2(khri pa): gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad po ste/de dag ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad ces bya'o//de la zad par gyi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/zad par
14a3(khri pa): sa dang /zad par chu dang /zad par mo dang /zad par rlung dang /zad par nam mkha' dang /zad par sngon po dang /zad par ser po dang /zod par dmar po dang /zad par dkar po dang /
14a4(khri pa): zad par rnam par shes pa ste/de dag ni zad par gyi skye mched bcu zhes bya ste/khams thams cad sa'i khams su mos par byed de/thams cad kyang sa'i khams kho nar khams gcig tu
14a5(khri pa): 'gyur ro//khams thams cad chu'i khams su mos par byed de/thams cad kyang chu'i khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro//khams thams cad me'i khams su mos par
14a6(khri pa): byed de/thams cad kyang me'i khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro//khams thams cad rlung gi khams su mos par byed de/thams cad kyang rlung gi khams kho nar khams gcig
14a7(khri pa): tu 'gyur ro//khams thams cad nam mkha'i khams su mos par byed de/thams cad kyang nim mkha'i khams kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro//khams thams cad sngon
14b1(khri pa): por mos par byed de/thams cad kyang sngon po nyid du 'gyur ro//khams thams cad ser por mos par byed de/thams cad kyang ser po kho nar 'gyur ro//khams thams cad dmar por mos
14b2(khri pa): par byed de/thams cad kyang dmar po kho nar 'gyur ro//khams thams cad dkar por mos par byed de/thams cad kyang dkar po kho nar 'gyur ro//khams thams cad rnam par shes
14b3(khri pa): par mos par byed de/thams cad kyang rnam par shes pa kho nar khams gcig tu 'gyur ro//sa dang chu dang me dang /rlung dang /nam mkha' dang /sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /
14b4(khri pa): dkar po dang /rnam par shes pa thams cad kyang gcig kho nar 'gyur te/de ni zad par gyi skye mched rnams zhes bya'o//zad par du skye ba rgyas par byed pas de ni zad par gyi skye mched rnams zhes
14b5(khri pa): bya'o//re re'ang skye mched thams cad du 'gyur te de'i phyir zad par gyi skye mched rnams zhes bya'o//de la stong pa nyid bco brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /
14b6(khri pa): phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong
14b7(khri pa): po nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
15a1(khri pa): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/nang
15a2(khri pa): gi chos rnams zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid de/de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir mig ni mig gis stong ngo ///
15a3(khri pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang lus dang /yid ni yid kyis stong ngo //
15a4(khri pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na/phyi'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang /
15a5(khri pa): ro dang reg bya dang /chos rnams te/de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir gzugs rnams ni gzugs rnams kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de
15a6(khri pa): yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir/sgra dang /dri dang ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams ni chos rnams kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i
15a7(khri pa): rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la phyi nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/phyi dang nang gi chos rnams zhes bya ba ni nang gi skye mched drug dang /phyi'i skye mched drug ste/
15b1(khri pa): de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro//ther zug tu gnas pa
15b2(khri pa): med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la stong pa
15b3(khri pa): nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/thor zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid des kyang chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid stong ngo //
15b4(khri pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la chen po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i
15b5(khri pa): phyir shar phyogs ni shar phyogs kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir lho dang
15b6(khri pa): nub dang /byang dang /phyogs mtshams bzhi ste/phyogs de brgyad kyang de bzhin no//steng gi phyogs ni steng gi phyogs kyis stong ngo //'og gi phyogs kyang 'og gi phyogs kyis stong ngo //
15b7(khri pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir to/de ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/don dam po stong pa nyid ces bya ba la/don dam pa zhes
16a1(khri pa): bya ba ni/mya ngan lngas 'das pa zhes bya ba ste/de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa ni mya ngan las 'das pas spyong/
16a2(khri pa): ngo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/'dus byos zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i
16a3(khri pa): khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs mod pa'i khams te/de la thar zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jog pa med pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong
16a4(khri pa): ngongo//de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams ni gzugs kyi khams kyis stong ngo //gzugs med pa'i khams ni gzugs med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de
16a5(khri pa): yin pa'i phyir te/de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni chos gang la skye ba med pa dang /gnas pa med pa dang /
16a6(khri pa): 'jig pa med pa dang /gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ni 'dus mo byas kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/
16a7(khri pa): de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /rnam par
16b1(khri pa): 'jig pa med pa'i phyir/chos gang la skye ba shin tu mi dmigs pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la thog
16b2(khri pa): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos gang la 'ong ba mi dmigs pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir
16b3(khri pa): te/de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir gang la chos gang yang dor du med
16b4(khri pa): pa'o/||de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /
16b5(khri pa): 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/byang chub
16b6(khri pa): sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ma mdzad pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ces
16b7(khri pa): bya'o//de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/rang gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba la/gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni gzugs su rung ba/tshor ba'i mtshan nyid ni myong ba/'du shes kyi mtshan
17a1(khri pa): nyid ni kun tu shes par byed pa/'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni mngon par 'du byed pa/rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par shes par byed pa ste/'dus byas kyi
17a2(khri pa): chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang /'dus mi byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar te/ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i
17a3(khri pa): phyir mtshan nyid de dag thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir to/de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la chos
17a4(khri pa): thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na/chos thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po lnga dang /skye mched bcu gnyis dang /khams bco brgyad dang /chos gzugs can rnams dang /gzugs med
17a5(khri pa): pa'i chos rnams dang /'dus byas kyi chos rnams dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams te/de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni chos thams
17a6(khri pa): cad kyis stong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/de'ang ther zug tu gnas
17a7(khri pa): pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mi dmigs pa gang yin pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/de ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces
17b1(khri pa): /de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gung she na/gang la dngos po 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa ste/de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/'dus pa las byung
17b2(khri pa): ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yang med pa ste/de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o//de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid 'ga' yang med pa ste/de ni dngos po
17b3(khri pa): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o//shA radwa ti'i bu gzhan yong dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo //dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo //ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo //gzhan
17b4(khri pa): dngos po ni gzhan gyi dngos pos sbyong ngo //de la dngos po gang zhe na/dngos po zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga po rnams te/'di lta ste/gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams
17b5(khri pa): dang /rnam par shes pa ste/de la dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo //ji ltar na dngos po med pa dngos po med pas stong zhe na/dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/de la 'dus ma byas
17b6(khri pa): pa ni 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo //de bzhin du dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas sbyong ngo //ji ltar na ngo bo nyid ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhe na/chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes paso
17b7(khri pa): kyang ma byas/mthong bas kyang ma byas/gang gis kyang ma byas pa ste/de ni ngo bo nyid ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya'o//ji ltar na gzhan gyi dngos po gzhan gyi dngos pos stong zhe na/gang de bzhin
18a1(khri pa): gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung /chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /
18a2(khri pa): de bzhin nyid dang /phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas pa nyid de/chos 'di dag gi gzhan gyi stong pa gang yin pa de ni gzhan gyi
18a3(khri pa): dngos po gzhan gyi dngos pos stong pa zhes bya ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par zhen par mi bya ba'i chos thams cad ni de dag yin no//mngon par
18a4(khri pa): zhen pa med pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son po yin zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol
18a5(khri pa): tu phyin pa khri pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri po//bam po gnyis pa//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
18a6(khri pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal po/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pas gnas la'ang gnas su yang dag
18a7(khri pa): pa ji lta ba bzhini du rab tu shes/gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i las
18b1(khri pa): rnams dang /las yang dag par len pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gnas kyi sgo dang /rgyu'i sgo nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams du ma pa/khams sna tshogs
18b2(khri pa): pa/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /des sems can gzhan dag dang /gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs nyid dang /mos pa du ma nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
18b3(khri pa): du rab tu shes pa dang /des sems can gzhan dag dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang /mchog ma yin pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /
18b4(khri pa): thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /rnam par thar pa dang /bsam gtan dang /ting
18b5(khri pa): nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /ldang ba shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma
18b6(khri pa): rjes su dran pa dang sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang /skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /zag pa rnams zad pas zag pa med par sems rnam par grol ba dang /shes
18b7(khri pa): rab rnam par grol ba'i tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing bdag gi skye ba ni zad do//tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do//bdag gi bya ba ni/
19a1(khri pa): byas so//srid pa ni 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang
19a2(khri pa): zhe na/de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas ni/'dir chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud
19a3(khri pa): dam tshangs pa 'am su'ang rung ba 'ga' zhig 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ngas rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba
19a4(khri pa): thob ste/gnas shing bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/tshangs
19a5(khri pa): pa'i 'khor lo sngon dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa'am/sus kyang chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba rab tu bskor ro zhes bya ba dang /nga zag pa zad do zhes
19a6(khri pa): dam bcas na 'dir zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/su'ang rung ba 'ga' zhig 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par bdag
19a7(khri pa): la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ngas rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob ste/gnas shing bag tsha ba med pa thob la/mi 'jigs pa thob ste/gnas
19b1(khri pa): kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go//tshangs pa'i 'khor lo sngon dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam tshangs pa
19b2(khri pa): 'am/sus kyang 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par ma bskor bar bskor ro zhes bya ba dang /nges bar du gcod pa'i chos gang dag bshad pa de dag bsten kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur te/de ni gnas
19b3(khri pa): med do zhes 'dir dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/su'ang rung ba 'ga' zhig 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi
19b4(khri pa): mthong ste/ngas rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas bde ba thob ste/gnas shing bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o///
19b5(khri pa): 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/tshangs pa'i 'khor lo sngon dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa'am/sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par
19b6(khri pa): ma bskor ba bskor ro zhes bya ba dang /des nyan thos rnams la 'phags pa nges pa ro 'byin pa nges par 'byed pa de byed pa sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gang bshad pa de
19b7(khri pa): bsgrubs na/nges par 'byin pa ma yin zhing sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par mi 'gyur te/de ni gaunas med do zhes 'dir dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs
20a1(khri pa): pa'am/su'ang rung ba 'ga' zhig 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ngas rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/bde ba
20a2(khri pa): thob ste gnas shing bag tsha ba med pa thob la mi 'jigs pa thob ste/gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go/tshangs pa'i
20a3(khri pa): 'khor lo sngon dge sbyong ngam bram ze'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba rab tu bskor ro zhes bya ba ste/de dag ni mi
20a4(khri pa): 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya'o//de la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /nges pa'i tshig so/
20a5(khri pa): so yang dag par rig po dang /spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/de dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya'o//de la byams pa chen po gang zhe na/de bzhin gshegs
20a6(khri pa): pa sems can thams cad la dgra bo dang /mdza' bshes la 'dra bar mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/de ni byams pa chen po zhes bya'o//de la snying rje chen po gang zhe na/sems can yod
20a7(khri pa): pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa mi gtong ba gang yin pa ste/de ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o//de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
20b1(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang /ca co med pa dang /bsnyel ba med pa dang /tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang /sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang /so sor ma
20b2(khri pa): brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang /'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang /brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang /dran pa nyams pa med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang /shes
20b3(khri pa): rab nyams pa med pa dang /rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa dang /lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye
20b4(khri pa): shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes
20b5(khri pa): su 'brang ba dang /'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma tshigs ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /
20b6(khri pa): da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa ste/de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya'o//de la thams cad shes pa nyid gang
20b7(khri pa): zhe na/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams skye mched bcu gnyis po dag la gang zag la bdag med par phyogs gcig shes pa gang yin pa ste/de ni thams cad shes pa nyid
21a1(khri pa): ces bya'o//de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gsum gyi lam shes kyang nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pas/
21a2(khri pa): dga' bar mi sems kyi/byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyis nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa ste de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya'o//de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang
21a3(khri pa): zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pas dus gsum po dag tu rnam pa thams cad du chos thams cad la the tshom med par mkhyen pa gang yin pa ste/de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
21a4(khri pa): ces bya'o//de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
21a5(khri pa): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya'o//de la mngon
21a6(khri pa): par shes pa drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /lha'i mig shes po mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon
21a7(khri pa): par shes pa dang lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /pha rol gyi sems shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /sngon gyi
21b1(khri pa): gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/de dag ni mngon par shes pa drug
21b2(khri pa): ces bya'o//dri la mig lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sha'i mig dang /lha'i mig dang /shes rab kyi mig dang /chos kyi mig dang /sangs rgyas kyi mig ste/de dag ni mig lnga zhes bya'o//de la dri bzhin
21b3(khri pa): gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa yin no//de la zhabs shin tu gnas pa ni 'di yin te//
21b4(khri pa): zhabs kyi ngog gi mthil gnyis thams cad kyis sa la kun tu reg pa ste/dper na za ma tog gi zhabs mnyam zhing zhabs phyang nge bas gzhi shin tu mnyam pa la bzhag na/'og gi zhabs thams
21b5(khri pa): cad kyis sa la kun tu reg par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni mu khyud khor yug dang ldan pa yin no//de la
21b6(khri pa): mu khyud khor yug dang ldan pa ni 'di yin te/zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/lta ba dang bcas pa mu khyud dang bcas pa/rnam pa thams cad yongs su
21b7(khri pa): rdzogs pa mdzes par skyes pa gang dag yin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das ni phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa yin no//de la phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa
22a1(khri pa): nyid ni 'di yin te dper na shing bal gyi 'dal ba 'am/ras bal gyi 'da' ba lta bu ste/ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni sor mo ring ba
22a2(khri pa): yin no//de la sor mo ring ba nyid ni 'di yin te/de'i phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dag lhag par ring ba yin te/ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das
22a3(khri pa): ni phyag dang zhabs dra ba dang ldan pa yin te/de'i phyag dang zhabs la dra ba lhag pa dag skyes te/ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni rting pa yangs pa dang
22a4(khri pa): ldan pa yin no//de la rting pa yangs pa ni 'di yin te/de'i zhabs kyi rting pa gnyis kyi mthil ni yangs pa ste/ji ltar me gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni/
22a5(khri pa): zhabs long mo'i tshogs mi mngon pa yin no//de la zhabs long mo'i tshogs mi mngon pa nyid ni 'di yin te/rting pa yangs pa la yang dag par sbyor la/rting pa yangs pa'ang zhabs
22a6(khri pa): long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa la sbyor ba ste/ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni byin pa ri dgas e n+ya ya'i lto bu dang ldan pa yin no//de la byin pa
22a7(khri pa): ridags e n+ya ya'i lta bu ni 'di yon te/de'i byin pa byin gyis phra bar skyes shing /byin gyis phra bar yang dag par byung ba ste/dper na ri dgas kyi rgyal po e n+ya ya'i lta bu yin no//
22b1(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das ni bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo sleb pa yin no//de la bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo slob pa ni 'di yin te/bcom ldan 'das ni bzhengs na sku ma btud
22b2(khri pa): par phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la yang dag par reg par mdzad cing kun tu nyug par mdzad pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa yin no//
22b3(khri pa): de la 'dems kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa nyid ni 'di yin te/dper na rigs btsun pa'i glang po che cang shes sam/rta cang shes kyi lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni spu re re nas mdzes
22b4(khri pa): par skyes shing g.yas su 'khyil ba yin no//de la spu re re nas mdzes par skye zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba nyid ni 'di yin te/de'i spu'i khung bu re re nas spu re re mthon mthing la lcang lor
22b5(khri pa): 'khyil ba 'jam zhing snum lo g.yas su 'khyil cing mdzes par skyes pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa dang ldan pa yin no//de la sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa
22b6(khri pa): nyid ni 'di yin te/de'i sku dang dbu las skyes pa'i dbu skra dang /spu rnams ni kha gyen du ltas shing mthon mthing la kun nas lcang lor 'khyil ba 'jam zhing snum la g.yas su 'khyil ba mdzes
22b7(khri pa): par skyes pa yin no//becom ldan 'das ni pags pa srab cing 'jam la snum pa yin no//de la pags pa srab cing 'jam la snum po ni 'di yin te de'i sku la chu'am rdul kun tu mi 'chags/
23a1(khri pa): shing mi gnas pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni mdog gser lta bu dang ldan te/dper na dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi mchod sdong la rin po che sna tshogs kyis smras pa ltar
23a2(khri pa): gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la lta na sdug pa yin te/des na gser gyi mdog lta bu zhes bya'o//bcom ldan 'das ni bdun mtho ba yin no//de la bdun mtho ba nyid ni 'di yin te/
23a3(khri pa): de'i zhabs gnyis kyi gong mtho ba gnyis gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la lta na sdug pa sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par gyur pa dang /de bzhin du phyag gnyis kyi mtho ba gnyis
23a4(khri pa): gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la lta na sdug pa sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par gyur pa dang /thul gong gnyis su gnyis mtho bar gyur pa dang /gnya' gong du mtho ba gcig
23a5(khri pa): gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la lta na sdug pa sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par gyur pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang ldan pa yin no//bcom
23a6(khri pa): ldan 'das ni thal gong rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni sku shin tu drang por 'khrungs pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni sku n+ya gr-i d+hA ltar chu zheng gab pa yin no//
23a7(khri pa): de la n+ya bro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid ni 'di yin te/chur ji srid pa zheng du'ang de srid la/zheng du ji srid pa chur yang de srid de/de ni n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa zhes bya'o//
23b1(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das ni 'gram pa seng ge'i dang 'dra ba yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni tshems thags bzang ba yin no//bcom ldan 'das
23b2(khri pa): ni tshems rtse mo mtho zhing rno la dkar ba yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin te de ni mgur drang por med pa drang zhing ma yo la thogs pa med par ming du rung bar gyur pa
23b3(khri pa): yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni ljags ring zhing srab pa yin no//de la ljags ring zhing srab pa nyid ni 'di yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhed na zhal nas ljags phyung ste/shangs kyi
23b4(khri pa): bu ga gnyis dang /spyan gyi khung bu gnyis dang /snyan gyi bu ga gnyis su reg par mdzad cing yongs su nyug par mdzad la/dbu'i mtshams su thug pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
23b5(khri pa): kyang 'gebs par mdzod pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni spyan yangs shing ba'i rdzi ma lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das
23b6(khri pa): ni spyan mthon mthing lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni skyon gyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni 'od 'dom gang ba yin no//bcom ldan
23b7(khri pa): 'das ni zhal zla ba nya ba lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni mdzod spu smin mtshams su 'khrungs la shing bal ltar 'jam zhing me tog kun+da dang /zla ba dang /dung dang /
24a1(khri pa): pad+ma'i rtswa lag dang /ba'i 'o ma dang /ba mo'i mdog lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa yin te/de dag ni skyes bu chen
24a2(khri pa): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya'o//de la dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dong ldan pa
24a3(khri pa): yin no//sred med kyi bu ltar sku groms pa yin no//pus mo'i lha nga dag mdzes par grub pa yin no//sku gtsang ba dag yin no//sku 'jam pa dag yin no//sku gnyen pa dag yin
24a4(khri pa): no//sku snum bag can dag yin no//sku ma btud pa dag yin no//sor mo rnams ring ba dang byin gyis phra ba dag yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sor mo rnams zlum
24a5(khri pa): pa dag yin no//sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba dag yin no//rtswa rnams mi mngon pa dag yin no//long bu rnams mi mngon pa dag yin no//sku dbyibs legs pa dag yin no//
24a6(khri pa): sku shin tu legs par 'brel ba dag yin no//skye mched rnams shin tu yongs su dag pa dag yin no//mkhyen pa yongs su dag pa dag yin no//spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa
24a7(khri pa): dge yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dpal dang blo gros dang ldan pa dag yin no//lta bar 'os pa dag yin no//zhal ha cang mi rong ba dag yin no//zhal kang
24b1(khri pa): klong med padag yinano//spros pas ltung dmar bdag yin no//zhal yongs su rgyas ba dag yin no//byungs zab padag san//skye bzab padag sbyinano//bshin tu zlum pa dag yinano//
24b2(khri pa): lte ba g.yas su 'khyil bdag yin no//phyug dang zhangs yongs su rgyas pa dag yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang rlabs ji ltar dgongs pa bzhini dang ldan pa dag
24b3(khri pa): ni//phyag gi mthol mnyam pa dag yin no//phyag gi ri mo par mchad pa dag yin no//phyag gi ri mo mtho ba dge yin no//srul dri ma med cing dri mi zhim pa med pa dag yin no//mdogags
24b4(khri pa): bdag yon no//skye mched kyi sgo bzang ba dag yon na//zhal zla ba lta bu dag yin no//gsong por gsung bdag yin no//zhal la khro gnyer gyur ma pa med pa dag yin no//spu'i khung
24b5(khri pa): buthams cad nas dri yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba dag yin no//de dag gi zhal dri zhim pa dag yin no//seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dag yin no//glang po che'i dbang po'i stabs su
24b6(khri pa): gshegs pa dag yin no//ngang pa'i skyabs su gshegs pa dag yin no//dbu gdugs 'dra ba dag yin no//gsung snyan cing rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dag yin no//
24b7(khri pa): tshems mche brna ba dang ldan pa dag yin no//shangs mtho bdag yin no//ljags dmar pa dge yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ljags srib cing che bdag yin na/
25a1(khri pa): snu mthon mthing can dag yin no//spu gtsang ba dag yin no//spyan yangs pa dag yin no//bu ga'i sgo rnams yongs su ma nyams pa dag yin no//phyag dang zhabs kyi mthi
25a2(khri pa): dmar ba dag yin no//lte ba ma bye ba dag yin no//sku ma rnyongs pa dag yin no//phyal phyang nge ba dag yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku la gnyer ma med pa dag yin/
25a3(khri pa): no//tshigs mdzes pa dag yin no//tshigs ring ba dag yin no//phyag dang zhabs yongs su dag pa dag yin no//'od 'dom gang menyam pa dag yin no//'od kyis gsal bar
25a4(khri pa): mdzad cing gshegs pa dag yin no//lha dang mi gang dag de dag gi sku mthong ba de dang tshim par 'gyur ro//srog tshugs thams cad kyis mthong yang brnyas par mi byed do//sems
25a5(khri pa): can rnams la rjes su ston par mdzad do//de dag gi gsung ni 'khor drang mthun par khyab par mdzad kyi 'khor gyi phyi rol tu gsung mi 'gro'o//ro stod seng ge'i lta bu dag yin no//
25a6(khri pa): sku'i tshigs legs par 'brel pa dag yin no//spyi gtsug bltar mi mngon pa dag yin no//dbu skra mtho na mthing la 'dzum zhing ring ba dag yin no//dbu skra ma 'khrugs
25a7(khri pa): pa dag yin no//dbu skra gyen du phyogs shing bzong la lcang lor 'khyil ba dag yin no//dbu skra ma 'dzings pa dag yin no//thugs kar dpal gyi be'us legs
25b1(khri pa): par brgyan pa dang ldan pa dag yin no//phyag dang zhabs kyi mtshan dpal gyis 'bar ba dang ldan pa dag yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtshal dang /ldong ros dang /tsi na piSh+Ta
25b2(khri pa): dang /ma/thing shun dang /zangs g.ya'i kha dog gse bres pa lA bu'i ma/tsan rAr+ras dang ldan pa yin te/de dag ni dpe bad bzang po brgyang rtswa zhes pa'o//de nas bcom lan 'das la tshwa dang
25b3(khri pa): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis chos thams cad la mngon par zhen par mi bgyi na//
25b4(khri pa): des na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos thams cad tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong lags te/'di lta ste/'di dag ni dge ba'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos
25b5(khri pa): rnams so//'di dag ni lung du bstan pa'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das
25b6(khri pa): pa'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams so//'di dag ni 'dus ma
25b7(khri pa): byas kyi chos rnams so//'di dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams so//'di dag ni thun mong ma lags pa'i chos rnams so zhes bgyi bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/byang chub kyi lam ji ltar/
26a1(khri pa): bsgrub par bgyid lags/ma bsgrubs na ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis
26a2(khri pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/de ni kun rdzob tu yin gyi don
26a3(khri pa): dam par ni ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na kun rdzob tu legs kyi don dam par ni ma lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
26a4(khri pa): sems dpa' 'di snyam du de la 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba rnams gang yin snyam du sems pa las de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/phar 'dzin pa dang /mar 'dzin pa dang /dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang //
26a5(khri pa): bram zer 'dzin pa dang /rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa dang /sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /tshul khrims las byung ba dang /bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod
26a6(khri pa): nams bye ba'i dngos po dang /zhal ta byed pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams dang /thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams dang /dge ba bcu'i lus kyi lam rnams dang /'jig rten pa'i rnam
26a7(khri pa): par bam pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /rnam par brnags pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes
26b1(khri pa): dang /rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang /rus gong gi 'du shes dang /rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang /de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa
26b2(khri pa): bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /chos rjes su dran pa dang /dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang /
26b3(khri pa): gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /lho rjes su dran pa dang /nye bar zhi ba rjes su dran pa dang /dbugs rngub pa dang /'byung ba rjes su dran pa dang /lus su gtogs pa rjes su dran pa dang /'chi ba
26b4(khri pa): rjes su dran pa ste/de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams yin no snyam du sems so//de la mi dge ba'i chos rnams gang yin snyam pa las de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/srog gcod pa dang //
26b5(khri pa): ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pas ldog par g.yem pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /phra ma dang /tshig rtsub po dang /tshig 'khyal pa dang /brnab sems dang /gnod sems dang /log par
26b6(khri pa): lta ba dang /khro ba dang /khon du 'dzin pa dang /'chab pa dang /'tshog pa dang /rnam par 'tshe ba dang /phrag dog dang /sor sna dang /nga rgyal te/de dgra ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams yin no snyam
26b7(khri pa): du sems so//de la lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang yin snyam pa las/de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/lus kyi las lung du ma bstan pa dang /ngag gi las lung du ma bstan pa dang /yid
27a1(khri pa): kyi las lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang /'byung ba chen po bzhi lung du ma bstan pa dang /dbang po lnga lung du ma bstan pa dang /phung po lnga lung du ma bstan pa dang /skye mched
27a2(khri pa): bcu gnyis dang /khams bco brgyad dang /rnam par smin pa ste/de dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams yin no snyam du sems so//de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang yin
27a3(khri pa): snyam pa las/de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong pa bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub
27a4(khri pa): kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang /kun shes pa'i dbang po dang /
27a5(khri pa): kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang /rtog pa dang bcas/dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang /mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge
27a6(khri pa): 'dzin dang /nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag por rig pa bzhi
27a7(khri pa): dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de/de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams yin no snyam du sems so//de la
27b1(khri pa): zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/khams gsum du gtogs pa/phung po lnga dang /skye mched bcu gnyis dang /khams bco brgyad dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi
27b2(khri pa): dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o//de la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
27b3(khri pa): bzhi dang /de bzhin du bsdus te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du ste/de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams yin no//de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/
27b4(khri pa): 'di lta ste/'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams dang /de bzhin du phung po lnga dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshod med pa bzhi dang /gzugs
27b5(khri pa): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams
27b6(khri pa): yin no//de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/chos gang dag la skye ba med pa dang /gnas pa med pa dang /'jig pa med pa dang /gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa dang /de bzhin
27b7(khri pa): du 'dod chags zad pa dang /zhe sdang zad pa dang /gti mug zad pa dang /de bzhin du chos gnas pa dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /de bzhin
28a1(khri pa): nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams zhes bya'o//de la thun mong
28a2(khri pa): pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga ste/de dag ni so so'i skye bo rnams dang /thun mong
28a3(khri pa): gi chos rnams yin no//de la so so'i skye bo rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi
28a4(khri pa): dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams zhes
28a5(khri pa): bya ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na kun rdzob tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/don dam par ni mngon par zhen par mi byed do//ji ltar mngon par zhen par
28a6(khri pa): mi byed ce na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/dper na/mi la la zhig gis sgyu ma sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/glang po che'i cho gas dang /rta'i tshogs dang /shing rta'i
28a7(khri pa): tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs shig mthong na/de la dpung gi tshogs yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
28b1(khri pa): chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/mngon par zhen par ni mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/mi la la tsha bas gdungs pa zhig gis smig rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs dpa' rlabs
28b2(khri pa): 'dra bar g.yo ba mthong na/'di ni chu yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong
28b3(khri pa): mod kyi mngon par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na mi la la zhig gis rmi lam na gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag mthong yang sad nas de dag gi gzugs yin no snyam du mngon par
28b4(khri pa): zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi mngon par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper
28b5(khri pa): na mi la la zhig gis chu'i nang na zla ba mthong na de de la zla ba yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams
28b6(khri pa): cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/mngon par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na mi lo la zhig gis mig g.yor mthong na de de la dngos por mngon par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
28b7(khri pa): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/chos thams cad la dngos por mngon par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
29a1(khri pa): dper na mi la la zhig gis rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro'ang de la nam mkha'o snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa tI'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
29a2(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad la rnam par dpyad na/chos de dag thams cad nyid la mngon par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na mi la la zhog gis brag ca'i sgra
29a3(khri pa): thos na sgra yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/mngon
29a4(khri pa): par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na mi la la zhig gis dri za'i grong khyer mthong na/de de la grong khyer yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa tI'i bu de bzhin
29a5(khri pa): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/mngon par zhen por mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na mi la la zhig gis me long gi nang
29a6(khri pa): du bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan mthong na 'di bzhin yin no snyam du mngon par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams
29a7(khri pa): cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi mngon par zhen par mi byed do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad tha dad par mthong mod kyi/chos
29b1(khri pa): dedag la mngon par zhen par mi byed do//chos rnams la mngon par ma zhen pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu son pa yin zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par
29b2(khri pa): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/chos thams cad kyi le'u zhes bya ste/gnyis pa'o///
29b3(khri pa): do nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par zhen pa gang lags/bcom ldan
29b4(khri pa): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la lta ba yongs su 'dzin pa dang /sems rnam par rmongs pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par zhen
29b5(khri pa): pa zhes bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la lta ba yongs su 'dzin pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das
29b6(khri pa): kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phung po dang /skye mched dang /khams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /rten cing 'brel
29b7(khri pa): par 'byung bar lta ba gang yin pa dang /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dge bar spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stabs dang /byang
30a1(khri pa): chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar par lta ba dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i
30a2(khri pa): snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang /de bzhin du 'du shes su lta ba dang /rjes su dran par lta ba dang /'du shes kyi rnam par lta ba dang /shes par lta ba dang /ting nge 'dzin du lta ba
30a3(khri pa): dang /dbang por lta ba dang /zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched du lta ba dang /zad par gyi skye mched du lta ba dang /stong pa nyid du lta ba dang /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
30a4(khri pa): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /thams cad shes
30a5(khri pa): pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du lta ba dang /de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang /mngon par shes par lta ba dang /ming du lta ba dang /mtshan du lta ba dang /dpe byad bzang
30a6(khri pa): por lta ba ste/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la lta ba yongs su 'dzin pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub
30a7(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la sems rnam par rmongs pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
30b1(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phung po lnga nas rga shi'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ba dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi nas/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar ba dang /
30b2(khri pa): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum nas/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
30b3(khri pa): kyi bar du de bzhin du sbyar ba dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar dag rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal
30b4(khri pa): ba 'am/bdag yod pa 'am bdag med pa 'amo/stong pa 'am mi stong pa 'am/mtshan ma yod pa 'am/mtshan ma med pa 'am/smon pa yod pa 'am/smon pa med pa 'am/zhi ba
30b5(khri pa): 'am ma zhi ba 'am/dben pa 'am mi dben pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang ba 'am/skye ba 'am mi skye ba 'am/'gag pa 'am mi 'gag pa 'am/dngos po 'am
30b6(khri pa): dngos po med par lta zhing dmigs la 'dzin cing mtshan mar byed pa dang /rtog pa dang yongs su dpyod par byed pa ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams
30b7(khri pa): cad la sems rnam par rmongs pa zhes bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos rnams so//'di dag
31a1(khri pa): ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni lung du bstan pa'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams
31a2(khri pa): so//'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi
31a3(khri pa): chos rnams so//'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so//'di dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams so//'di dag na thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams so zhes bya bar lta zhing dmigs la
31a4(khri pa): 'dzin cing mtshan mar byed pa dang /rtog pa dang yongs su dpyod par byed na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la sems rnam par rmongs
31a5(khri pa): pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can med pa'i phyir dang /sems can mi dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir dang /sems can skye ba med pa'i phyir dang /sems can 'gag pa med pa'i
31a6(khri pa): phyir dang /sems can stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//de bzhin du srog dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed las skyes pa dang /shed bu dang /byed pa po dang /byed
31a7(khri pa): pa po nyid dang /slong ba po dang /kun nas slong ba po dang /tshor ba po dang /tshor bar byed pa po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po med pa'i phyir dang mi dmigs pa'i phyir dang //
31b1(khri pa): skye ba med pa'i phyir dang /'gag pa med pa'i phyir dang /stong pa nyid kyis phyir ro//chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /stong pa dang /g.yo ba med pa dang /gso ba
31b2(khri pa): dang /ya ma brla dang /bdag po med pa dang /byung ba med pa dang /ma byas pa dang /mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang byed pa po dang bral ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar gzugs
