61b5(khri pa): gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi khams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams
61b6(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam
61b7(khri pa): mom/de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/
62a1(khri pa): na na ban pa nan na su rna lag / du ma sa/sa ng+ge ba byung sa sa da yon mas/da
62a2(khri pa): te/rga shi'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs los
62a3(khri pa): gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pA las gzhan zhig byang chub sems
62a4(khri pa): dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin
62a5(khri pa): snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das me legs so//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa'
62a6(khri pa): yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs dag las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa'
62a7(khri pa): yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//de bzhin du sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg pa dang /chos rnams las gzhan zhig byang chub
62b1(khri pa): sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi khams las gzhan zhig byang chub sems
62b2(khri pa): dpa' yin snyam mam/de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi khams kyi bar dag las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma
62b3(khri pa): lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sa'i khams las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /ma'i khams dang /
62b4(khri pa): rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
62b5(khri pa): mem lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ma rig pa las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mamra/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags
62b6(khri pa): so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
62b7(khri pa): ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /
63a1(khri pa): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags
63a2(khri pa): so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//
63a3(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang lus dang /yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa
63a4(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/
63a5(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
63a6(khri pa): pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin/
63a7(khri pa): pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/de bzhin du sbyar te/rga/
63b1(khri pa): shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems//
63b2(khri pa): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
63b3(khri pa): nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi de bzhin
63b4(khri pa): nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//de bzhin du rno ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid
63b5(khri pa): kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma legs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig
63b6(khri pa): gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du
63b7(khri pa): sems/de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam por shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom
64a1(khri pa): ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol
64a2(khri pa): pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'odi ji snyam du sems/de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan zhig byang chub sems
64a3(khri pa): dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mA legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong
64a4(khri pa): na/'di skad du gzugs byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhing de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' ma yin la/gzugs las gzhan yang byang chub
64a5(khri pa): sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhing /de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'
64a6(khri pa): ma yin la/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin te/de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid las byang chub sems dpa'
64a7(khri pa): gzhan ma yin zhes zer/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa to'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
64b1(khri pa): sems can gtan mi dmigs na/de byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis//gzugs byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/gzugs las byang chub
64b2(khri pa): sems dpa' gzhan du 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/de bzhin du sbyar te//rga shi'i bar du byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rga shi las byang chub sems
64b3(khri pa): dpa' gzhan du 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpar 'gyur pa lta ga la mchis/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las byang chub sems dpa'
64b4(khri pa): gzhan du 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rga shi'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid las byang
64b5(khri pa): chub sems dpa' gzhan du 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis te/de dag ni gnas ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs
64b6(khri pa): so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can mi dmigs pa'i phyir/mi dmigs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o///
64b7(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam ma ma/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//sha ra dwa
65a1(khri pa): ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol
65a2(khri pa): pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs rtag pa 'am/mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin
65a3(khri pa): snyam mam//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes
65a4(khri pa): pa rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'angs ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i
65a5(khri pa): bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs bde ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa
65a6(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa bde ba'i tshig bla
65a7(khri pa): dgas sam/sdug bsngal ba'i tshig blo dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji
65b1(khri pa): snyam du sems/gzugs bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
65b2(khri pa): mi lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/bdag
65b3(khri pa): med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun po bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs
65b4(khri pa): stong pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
65b5(khri pa): 'di ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi stong pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems
65b6(khri pa): dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/
65b7(khri pa): mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems//
66a1(khri pa): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems
66a2(khri pa): dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dwags sam//
66a3(khri pa): smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/tshor
66a4(khri pa): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam
66a5(khri pa): mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas
66a6(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /
66a7(khri pa): 'od byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom
66b1(khri pa): ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs dben pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/
66b2(khri pa): gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dben pa'i tshig
66b3(khri pa): bla dgas sam/mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du
66b4(khri pa): sems/gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom
66b5(khri pa): ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla
66b6(khri pa): dges sam/rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam
66b7(khri pa): du sems/gzugs skye ba'i tshig bla dgas samo/'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//
67a1(khri pa): shA radwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa skye ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/'gag pa'i tshig bla
67a2(khri pa): dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mA ma/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'od ji snyam du sems/gzugs dngos po yod pa'i
67a3(khri pa): tshig bla dogs sam/dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
67a4(khri pa): ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/dngos po med pa'i tshig bla drags byang/
67a5(khri pa): chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun po bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi tshig bla dgas byang chub
67a6(khri pa): sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus
67a7(khri pa): dang /yid kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mem/gsol pa/btsuni pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems
67b1(khri pa): mig rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i
67b2(khri pa): bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam
67b3(khri pa): mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig bde ba'i tshig bla dgas sa mau/sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla
67b4(khri pa): dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce
67b5(khri pa): dang /lus dang /yid bde ba'i tshig bla dwags sam/sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin sgyum mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan
67b6(khri pa): 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dogs sam/bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam
67b7(khri pa): mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid bdag yod pa'i
68a1(khri pa): tshig bla dgas sam/bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
68a2(khri pa): 'di ji snyam du sems/mig stong pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi stong po'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags
68a3(khri pa): so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid stong pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa'
68a4(khri pa): yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mtshan ma med
68a5(khri pa): pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rna ba dang sna dang /
68a6(khri pa): lce dang lus dang /yid mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig blo dgas sam/mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bci ma
68a7(khri pa): ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin
68b1(khri pa): snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/
68b2(khri pa): smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma legs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig zhi ba'i
68b3(khri pa): tshig bla dgas sam/ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma legs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du
68b4(khri pa): sems/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
68b5(khri pa): ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig dben pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/
68b6(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid dben pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi dben pa'i tshig
68b7(khri pa): bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mame/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig kun nas nyon mongs
69a1(khri pa): pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/rnam par byung ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA
69a2(khri pa): radwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rna ba dang /sna dang lci dang /lus dang /yid kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/rnam par byung ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems
69a3(khri pa): dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig skye ba'i chog bla dgas sam/'gag pa'i tshig
69a4(khri pa): bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang
69a5(khri pa): lus dang /yid skye ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/'gag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mim/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags
69a6(khri pa): so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig dngos po yod pa'i tshig blo dgas sam/dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mAma?/
69a7(khri pa): gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang /lus dang yid dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla
69b1(khri pa): dgas sam/dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dra rnga snyam du mas/
69b2(khri pa): gzugs rnams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sgra dang //
69b3(khri pa): dri dang ro dang /reg pa dang /chos rnams kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
69b4(khri pa): 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs rnams rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom
69b5(khri pa): ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sgra dang dri dang ro dang /reg pa dang /chos rnams rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas
69b6(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs rnams bde ba'i tshig bla
69b7(khri pa): dogs sam/sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
70a1(khri pa): ji snyam du sems/sgra dang dri dang /ro dang reg pa dang /chos rnams bde ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin/
70a2(khri pa): snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs rnams bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam//
70a3(khri pa): bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/
70a4(khri pa): sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang /chos rnams bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mamaM/gsol
70a5(khri pa): pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs rnams stong pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi stong pa'i tshig bla dwags
70a6(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sgra dang dri dang ro dang /reg
70a7(khri pa): po dang /chos rnams stong pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi stong pa'i tshig bre dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma
70b1(khri pa): lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs rnams mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam
70b2(khri pa): gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sgra dang dri dang ro dang /reg pa dang /chos rnams mtshan ma yod pa'i tshi ga bla
70b3(khri pa): dgas sam/mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam
70b4(khri pa): du sems/gzugs rnams smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom
70b5(khri pa): ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg pa dang /chos rnams smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/smon pa
70b6(khri pa): med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so////'phags pa shes
70b7(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po khri pa//bam po lnga pa//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs rnams zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas
71a1(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'ang ji snyam du sems/de bzhin du sgra dang /dri dang /
71a2(khri pa): ro dang /reg pa dang /chos rnams zhi ba'i tshig rma dgas sam/ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//
71a3(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs rnams dben pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun
71a4(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang /chos rnams dben pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi dben
71a5(khri pa): pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma legs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs rnams
71a6(khri pa): kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags
71a7(khri pa): so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/de bzhin du sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /rig pa dang /chos rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/rnam par
71b1(khri pa): byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs rnams skye
71b2(khri pa): bo'i tshig bla dgas sa mau/dgag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam
71b3(khri pa): du sems/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang /chos rnams skye ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/'gag pa'i tshi ga bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mAm/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom
71b4(khri pa): ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs rnams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgos sam/dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa'
71b5(khri pa): yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg pa dang /chos rnams dngos po
71b6(khri pa): yod pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i
71b7(khri pa): bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi khams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
72a1(khri pa): 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi chog bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin/
72a2(khri pa): snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig bla dgos byang chub sems pa
72a3(khri pa): yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi
72a4(khri pa): rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mAma?/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma
72a5(khri pa): lags so//de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar rtag pa'i tshig blo dwags sam/mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam
72a6(khri pa): ma ma/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/myig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam
72a7(khri pa): par shes pa'i khams nas/de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi bde ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub
72b1(khri pa): sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa tI'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang //
72b2(khri pa): mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi budrug yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/bdag med pa'i tshig bla dgas
72b3(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi
72b4(khri pa): khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi stong pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/mi stong pa'i tshig
72b5(khri pa): bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mA lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gri khams dang
72b6(khri pa): gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla
72b7(khri pa): dgas sam/mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mo ma/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
73a1(khri pa): 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi khyams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi
73a2(khri pa): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi byar gyi smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa
73a3(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das mA lags so//shA ra dwa tI'i bu 'dri ji snyam du sems/mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /de
73a4(khri pa): bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas sum/ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/
73a5(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
73a6(khri pa): de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi dben pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/mi dben pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mAm/gsol
73a7(khri pa): pa/btsun po bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
73b1(khri pa): dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/rnam par byung ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam//
73b2(khri pa): gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /de
73b3(khri pa): bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ber gyi skye ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi skye ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun
73b4(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/
73b5(khri pa): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa
73b6(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mA rig pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar gyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mamA/
73b7(khri pa): gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das me lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ma rig pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bor gyi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi rtag
74a1(khri pa): pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ma rig pa
74a2(khri pa): dang de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar gyi bde ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyemA ma ma/gsol pa/btsun pa btsum
74a3(khri pa): ldan 'das ma logs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ma rig pa dang de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar gyi bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/bdag med pa'i tshigs
74a4(khri pa): dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma logs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ma rig pa dang de bzhin du sbyar te/
74a5(khri pa): rga shi'i bar gyi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//
74a6(khri pa): shA ra dwa tI'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems ma rig pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar gyi mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mtshan ma med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems
74a7(khri pa): dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ma rig pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar gyi
74b1(khri pa): smon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/smon pa med pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
74b2(khri pa): ji snyam du sems/ma rig pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar gyi zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun
74b3(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ma rig pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shrI'i bar gyi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi dben pa'i tshig bla
74b4(khri pa): dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mAm/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dri ji snyam du sems/ma rig pa dang de bzhin du sbyar te/
74b5(khri pa): rga shi'i bar gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dwags sam/rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
74b6(khri pa): ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ma rig pa dang de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar gyi skye ba'i tshig bla dgas sam/'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems
74b7(khri pa): dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ma rig pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar
75a1(khri pa): gyi dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
75a2(khri pa): ma lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod don gyi dbang ci zhig
75a3(khri pa): mthong na/'di skad du gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du sbyar te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
75a4(khri pa): shes pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas dang /mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin
75a5(khri pa): du tshor ba dang /'du shos dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags dang /mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpa'
75a6(khri pa): ma yin/de bzhin du gzugs bde ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/bdag yod pa'i tshig bla dwagos ma yin/bdag
75a7(khri pa): med pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/mtshan ma yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/mtshan ma med pa'i
75b1(khri pa): tshig bla dwags ma yin/skyon pa yod pa'i tshig bla dwags ma yin/smon pa med pa'i tshig pu dag su mu yin/zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas ma yin//
75b2(khri pa): ni g+hi rgya blo dgas ma yin/mi dben pa'i tshig tha dgas ma yin/kun nas nyon mongs pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/rnam par byang ba'i tshig bladags ma yin/skye ba'i tshigs
75b3(khri pa): dgas ma yin/'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas ma yin/dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du sbyar te/tshor ba
75b4(khri pa): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas dang /dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du
75b5(khri pa): mig gi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lum+b+ha dang /yid kyi tshi ga bu dwags byang chub sems dpa'am yin/de bzhin du mig rtag pa'i tshig bla
75b6(khri pa): dgos dang /mi rtog pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/zho bzhin du rnaH pa na sgra dang lce dang lus paH/yid rtig phel /bla dgas sama?/i rgyag rdza kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub
75b7(khri pa): sems dpa' ma yin de bzhin du sbyar te/mig dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/dngos po meng po'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du rna ba dang /snong /lce dang
76a1(khri pa): lus dang /yid dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs rnams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub
76a2(khri pa): sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg pa dang /chos rnams kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/gzugs rnams rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas dang //
76a3(khri pa): mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg pa dang /chos rnams rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas dang /mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas
76a4(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du sbyar te/gzugs rnams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas dang /dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin
76a5(khri pa): de bzhin du sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg pa dang /chos rnams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas dang /dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi khams
76a6(khri pa): dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi tshig bla dgras byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi
76a7(khri pa): tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas dang /mi rtag pa'i
76b1(khri pa): tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du sbyar te/mig gi
76b2(khri pa): khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam por shes pa'i khams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas dang /dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma
76b3(khri pa): yin/de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas dang /dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ma rig pa'i tshig
76b4(khri pa): bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du ma reg pa rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub
76b5(khri pa): sems dpo' ma yin/ma rig pa mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgos byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin
76b6(khri pa): dam rig pa rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas sam/mi rtag pa'i chog bla dwags byang chub sems dpa' mA yin/de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bAr du rtag pa'i tshige bla dgas sam/mi rtag pa
76b7(khri pa): tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/de bzhin du sbyar te/ma rig pa dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas dang /dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas kyi bar byang chub sems dpa'
77a1(khri pa): ma yin/de bzhin du sbyar te/rga shi'i bar du dngos po yod pa'i tshig bla dgas dang /dngos po med pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpa' ma yin zhes ze ba
77a2(khri pa): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs gtan mi dmigs lags na//
77a3(khri pa): gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lte ga la mchis/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang de lta lags so//btsun
77a4(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rtag pa 'am/mi rtag pa gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs kyi tshig bla dgaso byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/tshor ba drang //
77a5(khri pa): 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang de lha lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs bde zhes bgyi ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bgyi ba gtan mi
77a6(khri pa): dmigs lags na/gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang
77a7(khri pa): de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs bdag ces bgyi ba 'am/bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas/
77b1(khri pa): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs skyong
77b2(khri pa): zhes bgyi ba 'am/mi stong zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/tshor ba dang /'du shes
77b3(khri pa): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang de lha lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs mtshan ma mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/mtshan ma ma mchis zhes bgyi
77b4(khri pa): ba gtan mo dmigs lags na/gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes
77b5(khri pa): pa'ang de lha lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugaso smyon pa mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/smon pa ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs kyi
77b6(khri pa): tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom
77b7(khri pa): ldan 'das gzugs zhi zhes bgyi ba'am/ma zhi zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/tshor
78a1(khri pa): ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs dben zhes bgyi ba'am/mi dben zhes
78a2(khri pa): bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes
78a3(khri pa): pa'ang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi ba 'am/rnam par byang zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs legs na/gzugs
78a4(khri pa): tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom
78a5(khri pa): ldan 'das gzugs skye zhes bgyi ba 'am/'gag ces bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis//
78a6(khri pa): tshar ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang de lha lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/dngos
78a7(khri pa): po ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
78b1(khri pa): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig gi tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rna ba dang /
78b2(khri pa): sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig gi tshig bla dgas byang
78b3(khri pa): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig bde zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags
78b4(khri pa): na/mig sdug bsngal zhes bgyi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta gA la mchis/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom
78b5(khri pa): ldan 'das mig bdag mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi ba'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rna ba dang //
78b6(khri pa): sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig stong zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub
78b7(khri pa): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig smon pa mchis zhes bgyi bo gtan
79a1(khri pa): mi dmigs lags na/mig smon pa ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid kyang de
79a2(khri pa): lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig zhi zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis//
79a3(khri pa): rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig dben zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas
79a4(khri pa): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur pa lta ga la mchis/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi ba
79a5(khri pa): gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig rnam par byang ba'i tshig blo dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid kyang de lta lags
79a6(khri pa): so/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig skye zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig 'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rna ba dang sna
79a7(khri pa): dang lce dang lus dang /yid kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig dngos po ma mchis pa'i
79b1(khri pa): tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rna ba dang sna dang lha dang lus dang yid kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams gtan mi dmigs
79b2(khri pa): lags na/gzugs kyi tshig bla dgaso byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang /chos rnams kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
79b3(khri pa): gzugs rnams rtag ces bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs rnams mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg
79b4(khri pa): pa dang /chos rnams kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams bde zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs rnams sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla//
79b5(khri pa): dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang /chos rnams kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams bdag ces
79b6(khri pa): bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs rnams bdag ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang /chos
79b7(khri pa): rnams kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams stong zhes bgyi bo gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs rnams mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub
80a1(khri pa): sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang chos rnams kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams mtshan
80a2(khri pa): ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs rnams mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/sgra dang dri
80a3(khri pa): dang ro dang reg pa dang /chos rnams kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams smon pa mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs//
80a4(khri pa): rnams smon pa ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/sgra dang dri dang ro dang /reg pa dang chos rnams kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa
80a5(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams zhi zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs rnams ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis//
80a6(khri pa): sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang chos rnams kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams dben zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs
80a7(khri pa): rnams mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang chos rnams kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom
80b1(khri pa): ldan 'das gzugs rnams kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs rnams rnam par byung ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis
80b2(khri pa): sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang chos rnams kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs rnams skye ba'i tshig bla dgas gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs rnams
80b3(khri pa): 'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dang /chos rnams kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs
80b4(khri pa): rnams dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/gzugs rnams dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/sgra dang dri dang
80b5(khri pa): ro dang reg pa dang chos rnams kyang de lta lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams gtan mi dmigs lags ni/mig gi khams kyi tshig bla dwags byang chub sems
80b6(khri pa): dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyor bar bgyi'o//
80b7(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams rtag ces bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig gi khams mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la
81a1(khri pa): mchis/gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//tsun
81a2(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams bde zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig gi khams sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la
81a3(khri pa): mchis/gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom
81a4(khri pa): ldan 'das mig gi khams bdag mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig gi khams bdag ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga
81a5(khri pa): la mchis/gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom
81a6(khri pa): ldan 'das mig gi khams stong zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig gi khams mi stong pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur pa lta ga la mchis//
81a7(khri pa): gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan
81b1(khri pa): 'das mig gi khams mtshan ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig gi khams mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis//
81b2(khri pa): gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig
81b3(khri pa): gi khams smon pa mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig gi khams smon pa ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/gzugs
81b4(khri pa): kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams
81b5(khri pa): zhi zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig gi khams ma zhi ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam
81b6(khri pa): par shes pa'i khams nas/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams dben zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs
81b7(khri pa): lags na/mig gi khams mi dben pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/yid
82a1(khri pa): kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bang du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs
82a2(khri pa): lags na/mig gi khams rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/
82a3(khri pa): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin de sbyor bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams skye zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig
82a4(khri pa): gi khams 'gag pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/yid kyi rnam
82a5(khri pa): par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mig gi khams dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/mig
82a6(khri pa): gi khams dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dag so byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lte ga la mchis/gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/
82a7(khri pa): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa gtan mi dmigs lags na/ma rig pa'i tshig bla dgas
82b1(khri pa): byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa rtag ces bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na//
82b2(khri pa): ma rig pa mi rtag pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rga sha'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa
82b3(khri pa): bde zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ma rig pa sdug bsngal ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//
82b4(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa bdag ces bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ma rig pa bdag ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ngo lta ga la mchis///
82b5(khri pa): rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa stong zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ma rig pa mi stong pa'i tshig bra dgas byang
82b6(khri pa): chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa mtshan ma mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi
82b7(khri pa): dmigs lags na/ma rig pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//
83a1(khri pa): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa smon pa mchis zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ma rig pa smon pa ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar
83a2(khri pa): 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa zhi zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ma rig pa ma zhi
83a3(khri pa): ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga lo mchis/rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa dben zhes bgyi ba
83a4(khri pa): gtan mi dmigs lags na/ma rig pa mi dben pa'i tshig bla dwags byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lto ga la mchis/rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun
83a5(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ma rig pa rnam par byang ba'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur pa lta
83a6(khri pa): ga la mchis/rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa skye zhes bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags na/ma rig pa 'gag pa'i
83a7(khri pa): tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lha ga la mchis/rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa dngos po mchis zhes
83b1(khri pa): bgyi ba gtan mi dmigs lags ni/ma rig pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshig bla dgas byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/rga shi'i bar du'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi ste/
83b2(khri pa): phung po'i skabs su ji skad bstan pa bzhin du thams cad rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so//byang chub sems dpa'
83b3(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas/gzugs kyi tshig bla dgas mi dmigs/de bzhin du sbyar te/gzugs dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla
83b4(khri pa): dgas mi dmigs/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i tshig bla dgas mi dmigs pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam par shes pa'i
83b5(khri pa): dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas mi dmigs/de bzhin du sbyar te/ma rig pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas mi dmigs shing /rga shi'i bar gyi tshi go bla dgas mi dmigs pa nas/
83b6(khri pa): dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas mi dmigs par phung po'i skabs su ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//shes
83b7(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri ba las/byang chub sems dpa'i tshig bla dgas kyi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o////shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/byang chub sems
84a1(khri pa): dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes de skad zer ba'ang /shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyis chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo ///
84a2(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gzugs kyi khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //chos kyi dbyings kyis
84a3(khri pa): kyang gzugs kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam par
84a4(khri pa): shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis kyang chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
84a5(khri pa): chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang mig gi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
84a6(khri pa): chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang yid kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
84a7(khri pa): chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag
84b1(khri pa): par rjes su mi mthong ngo //chos kyi dbyings kyis kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas kyi khams
84b2(khri pa): kyis 'dus ma byas kyi khams yang dog par rjes su mi mthong la/'dus ma byas kyi khams kyis kyang 'dus byas kyi khams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu
84b3(khri pa): 'dus byas la ma gtogs par 'dus ma byas kyi khams gdags par mi nus la/'dus ma byas kyi khams la ma gtogs par yang 'dus byas kyi khams gdags par mi nus so//
84b4(khri pa): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos kyis chos yang dag par
84b5(khri pa): rjes su mi mthong la/de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyis chos kyi dbyings yang dag par rjes su mi mthong lags mod kyi/'on kyang btsun pa bcom
84b6(khri pa): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'o byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de'i gzhi'i don gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
84b7(khri pa): bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpe'i gzhi
85a1(khri pa): don gyi bdag nyid med pa'i phyir te/de lhu bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to//shA radwa ti'i bu dper na nam mkha' la bya rnams kyi
85a2(khri pa): rjes med do//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na rmi lam la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub semos dpa'i
85a3(khri pa): gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/sgyu ma la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na smig rgyu
85a4(khri pa): la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//de bzhin du brag ca dang /mig yor dang /chu zla dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
85a5(khri pa): sprul pa la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/de bzhin nyid la gzhi med do//de bzhin du ma nor
85a6(khri pa): ba de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos skyon med pa nyid la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//
85a7(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhi med do//shA ra dro ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i
85b1(khri pa): gzugs kyi phung po la gzhi med do//de bzhin du tshor ba'i phung po dang /'du shes kyi phung po dang /'du byed kyi phung po dang /rnam par shes pa'i phung po la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i
85b2(khri pa): bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig la gzhi med do//de bzhin du yid kyi bar la gzhi med do//de bzhin du
85b3(khri pa): sbyar te/gzugs kyi skye mched la gzhi med pa nas/chos kyi skye mched kyi bar la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i
85b4(khri pa): bu dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
85b5(khri pa): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/sgyu mo'i skyes bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de
85b6(khri pa): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na sgyu ma'i
85b7(khri pa): skyes bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
86a1(khri pa): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa la gzhi med do//shA radwa
86a2(khri pa): ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na de
86a3(khri pa): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gzhi'i don med do//de bzhin du tsher ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /
86a4(khri pa): rnam par shes pa la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
86a5(khri pa): gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig lo gzhi'i don med do//de bzhin du yid kyi bar
86a6(khri pa): la gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhi'i don
86a7(khri pa): med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa la gzhi'i don med do//de bzhin du
86b1(khri pa): sbyar te/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa la gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
86b2(khri pa): pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
86b3(khri pa): la gzhi med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la'ang gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
86b4(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na 'dus byas kyi khams la/'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do///
86b5(khri pa): 'dus ma byas kyi khams la/'dus byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
86b6(khri pa): la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don mod do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper ni skye ba med pa la gzhi med do//de bzhin du 'gag pa med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med
86b7(khri pa): pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub
87a1(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
87a2(khri pa): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi skye ba ma mchis pa la gzhi ma mchis pa lags/gang gi kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa
87a3(khri pa): bar la gzhi ma mchis pa lags/gang gi rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bar la gzhi ma mchis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs
87a4(khri pa): kyi skye ba med pa la gzhi med do//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa la gzhi med do//de bzhin du sbyar te//
87a5(khri pa): gzugs kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la gzhi med do//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
87a6(khri pa): shes pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang po med pa la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi skye ba med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par
87a7(khri pa): byang ba med pa la gzhi med do//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang lus kyi skye ba med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do//de
87b1(khri pa): bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi bar gyi skye ba med pa dang /6kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do//de bzhin du mig gi khams kyi skye ba med pa dang /
87b2(khri pa): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar gyi skye ba med pa dang /kun nas nyon
87b3(khri pa): mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do//de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par
87b4(khri pa): byang ba med pa la gzhi med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi skye ba med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba
87b5(khri pa): med pa la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i skye ba med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi
87b6(khri pa): med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi skye ba med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byung ba med pa la gzhi
87b7(khri pa): med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med pa yin no//
88a1(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper nu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
88a2(khri pa): bar shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub
88a3(khri pa): sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa//bam po drug pa//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na//
88a4(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyobs bcu shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shin tu rnam par drag pa la
88a5(khri pa): gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don
88a6(khri pa): med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na bdag med pa nyid kyi phyir bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du med
88a7(khri pa): pa'i phyir sems can dang /srog dang /gso ba dang /gang zag dang /shes las skyes dang /shed bu dang /byed du 'jug pa po dang /byed pa po dang /slong ba po dang /
88b1(khri pa): kun nas slong ba po dang /tshor ba po dang /tshor bar byed pa po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems
88b2(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'tshor ba la mun pa'i
88b3(khri pa): gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//
88b4(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung ba na 'du byed du gtogs pa thams cad kyi gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
88b5(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
88b6(khri pa): sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po la 'chatshal pa'i tshul khrims kyi gzhi med do//de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la sems rnam par g.yeng ba'i gzhi med do//de bzhin du
88b7(khri pa): shes rab kyi phung po la 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi gzhi med do//de bzhin du rnam par grol ba'i phung po la'ang rnam par ma grol ba'i gzhi med do//de bzhin du rnam par grol
89a1(khri pa): ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po la'ang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa'i gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
89a2(khri pa): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang /zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od la gzhi
89a3(khri pa): med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /de bzhin du tshangs
89a4(khri pa): ris nas gnas gtsang mo'i bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gzhi med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
89a5(khri pa): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang yin pa'i chos de
89a6(khri pa): ngag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa ste/'di lta ste/mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid
89a7(khri pa): gcig pa yin pas/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la ma chags par bslab par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
89b1(khri pa): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub gang lags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang lags pa'i chos de dag
89b2(khri pa): thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma lags/mi ldan pa'ang ma lags/gzugs ma mchis pa/bstan du ma mchis pa/thogs pa ma mchis pa/'di lta ste/mtshan nyid
89b3(khri pa): mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa lags ni/'o na la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste/gal te chos thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/
89b4(khri pa): bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa/'di lta ste/mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin na/ci sgyu ma'o skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas//
89b5(khri pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram zhes de skad du dris na/de la bdag gis lan ji skad du gdab par bgyi/de bzhin du ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu
89b6(khri pa): 'dri bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs/tshul khrims kyi pha rol
89b7(khri pa): tu phyin pa la bslabs/sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/de bzhin du ci sgyu ma'i skyes
90a1(khri pa): bu 'di dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/de bzhin du sbyar te/ci sgyu ma'i skyes
90a2(khri pa): bu 'di 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/de bzhin du ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di de
90a3(khri pa): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/de bzhin du sbyar te/ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di
90a4(khri pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram zhes bgyi ba nas/ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu
90a5(khri pa): 'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bsgrubs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram zhes dris na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'ongs
90a6(khri pa): de la bdag gris lan ji skad gdab par bgyi/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA
90a7(khri pa): radwa ti'i bu de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris/khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob cig/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gzugs kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang
90b1(khri pa): gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/shA ra dwa ti'i
90b2(khri pa): bu 'di ji snyam du sems/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/de bzhin du sbyar te/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar yang gzhan la
90b3(khri pa): sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'ong gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhog yin snyam mam//
90b4(khri pa): de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du'ang gzhan la sgyu ma'ang gzhan stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma'ang gzhan/mtshan ma med pa'ang
90b5(khri pa): gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan/smon pa med pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA
90b6(khri pa): rang ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/byang chub kyang gzhan la/sgyu mo'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mamra/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//de ltar na
90b7(khri pa): gzugs kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma yin te/sgyu ma nyid gzugs yin la/gzugs nyid sgyu ma yin no//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du
91a1(khri pa): byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma 'ang gzhan ma yin te/rnam par shes pa nyid sgyu ma yin la/sgyu ma nyid rnam par shes pa yin
91a2(khri pa): no//de bzhin du mig kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma yin te/mig nyid sgyu ma yin la/sgyu ma nyid mig yin no//de bzhin du yid kyi bar dang /de bzhin du sbya
91a3(khri pa): te/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar yang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma yin te/sgyu ma nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yin la/mig gi 'dus te dog
91a4(khri pa): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid sgyu ma yin no//yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar yang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma yin te/sgyu ma nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
91a5(khri pa): tshor ba yin la/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid sgyu ma yin no//de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma yin te/sgyu ma
91a6(khri pa): nyid dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yin la/dran pa nye bar bzhog pa rnams nyid sgyu ma yin no//de bzhin du sbyar te/'phags pa'i lo ma yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du'ang
91a7(khri pa): gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma yin te/sgyu ma nyid 'phags pa'i lam yan log brgyad pa yin la/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid sgyu ma yin no//
91b1(khri pa): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma yin te/sgyu ma nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yin la/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
91b2(khri pa): bcu nyid sgyu ma yin no//de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyang gzhan pa/sgyu ma'adra gzhan ma yin te/sgyu ma nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams yin la/rnam par thar pa'i
91b3(khri pa): sgo rnams nyid sgyu ma yin no//de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du'ang gzhan la/sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma yin te/sgyu ma nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
91b4(khri pa): pa bco brgyad yin la/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid sgyu ma yin no//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/'o na sgyu ma de
91b5(khri pa): la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang ba dmigs snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/'o na sgyu ma la
91b6(khri pa): skye ba 'am/'gag pa yod snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gang la kun nas nyon mongs pa med
91b7(khri pa): po dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa mi snang ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'gyung
92a1(khri pa): bar 'gyur snyam mam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rjes su 'thob par 'gyur snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//
92a2(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i ming dang /brda dang /gdags pa dang tha snyad 'di nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams
92a3(khri pa): la 'dog sam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gang la ming med pa dang /brda med pa dang /btags
92a4(khri pa): pa med pa dang /tha snyad med pa dang /ming du gdags pa med pa dang /lus med pa dang /lus kyi las med pa dang /ngag med pa dang /ngag gi las med pa dang /yid
92a5(khri pa): med pa dang /yid kyi las med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
92a6(khri pa): la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bka' stsal pa/
92a7(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
92b1(khri pa): panyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan
92b2(khri pa): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar
92b3(khri pa): 'tshal bas/rtag tu sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bslabs par bgyi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di lta ste/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag/
92b4(khri pa): sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bur rig par bgyi ba'i slad du'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/'o na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs
92b5(khri pa): nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/btsun
92b6(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags la/dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de'ang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o///
92b7(khri pa): bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/rmi lam lta bu'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams
93a1(khri pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/btsun pa bcom
93a2(khri pa): ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags la/dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de'ang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//bka' stsal pa/
93a3(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/phung po lnga po dag brag ca lta bu yin snyam mam/de bzhin du mig yor lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu yin snyam
93a4(khri pa): mame/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags so//bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ci phung po lnga pi 'di dag shes rab kyi
93a5(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags
93a6(khri pa): so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu lags shing /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed rnams
93a7(khri pa): dang /rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu lags la/rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lags la/dbang po drug gang lags pa de ni nye bar len
93b1(khri pa): ba'i phung po lnga po rnams lags pa'i slad du'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu lags la/de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /
93b2(khri pa): rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu lags te/rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lagasA la/dbang po drug gang lags pa de ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po
93b3(khri pa): dag lags te/de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid la mi dmigs/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la'ang mi dmigs lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasa'o/
93b4(khri pa): na byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag cing dngang la/dngang bar mi 'gyur lags sem/de skad
