156a1(khri pa): bkod pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid de yin pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de ltar
156a2(khri pa): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bags
156a3(khri pa): nas/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can gang dag sdig pa'i las kun tu spyad cing log pa'i chos la gzhol ba de dag ji ltar 'tsham
156a4(khri pa): pa'i lus dag la gnas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin
156a5(khri pa): du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed do//de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
156a6(khri pa): dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de rab tu 'god par byed cing /sems can de dag
156a7(khri pa): la rtag tu 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid kyi chos ston to//sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
156b1(khri pa): mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//shar phyogs su ji skad bstan pa bzhin du phyogs bcu kun tu sangs
156b2(khri pa): rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du/
156b3(khri pa): ji ltar le'u dang por dpe dang bcas par bstan pa de kho na bzhin du 'dir yang snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
156b4(khri pa): go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po 'di bgos nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
156b5(khri pa): nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas pa na/sems bskyed pa gzhan nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa dag gi skabs mi 'byed la de 'di snyam du bdag gis
156b6(khri pa): sems can 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o//sems can 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba nas/de bzhin du bdag gis sems/
156b7(khri pa): can 'di snyed cig ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba snga ma kho na bzhin no//de bzhin du bdag gis
157a1(khri pa): sems can 'di snyed cig dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs
157a2(khri pa): rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag la dgod par bya'o//sems
157a3(khri pa): can 'di snyed cig ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi bar dag la dgod par mi bya'o//de bzhin du bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
157a4(khri pa): nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod/
157a5(khri pa): par mi bya'o//de bzhin du bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir
157a6(khri pa): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o//de bzhin du bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub kyi bar
157a7(khri pa): la dgod par mi bya'o//de bzhin du bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o//'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi
157b1(khri pa): bya'o snyam du mi sems kyi/rab 'byor de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis sems can dpag tu med cing grangs med pa dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o//
157b2(khri pa): de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/bdag gis sems can dpag tu meng grangs
157b3(khri pa): med pa'i bar dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o snyam mo//rab 'byor dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhes bya ba nas//
157b4(khri pa): de bzhin du sbyar te/ji ltar sngar dpes bstan pa de kho na bzhin du sbyor bar bya ste/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa
157b5(khri pa): zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis
157b6(khri pa): 'tshal ba ltar na/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du/kye mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par bgyi
157b7(khri pa): lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam
158a1(khri pa): par shes pas stong /de bzhin du mig ni mig gis stong /yid ni yid kyis stong /de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong //
158a2(khri pa): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te rag pas stong /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar ni yid kyi 'dus
158a3(khri pa): te reg pas stong /de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas sbyong /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis cher
158a4(khri pa): ba'i bar ni/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor pos stong /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
158a5(khri pa): pas stong /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni/dran po nye bar bzhag pa rnams
158a6(khri pa): kyis stong /'phags pa'i lAm yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ni/'phags pa'i lA ma yan lag brgyad pas stong /nung stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong /dngos
158a7(khri pa): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
158b1(khri pa): bcus stong /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis stong /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
158b2(khri pa): yang byang chub sems dpas stong /go cha chen po'ong go cha chen pos stong pa'i slad du ste/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/kye ma byang chub sems
158b3(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par bgyi lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan
158b4(khri pa): pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa bzhin te/rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byas mngon par 'dus
158b5(khri pa): ma byas pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi ched du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dag yin
158b6(khri pa): no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam
158b7(khri pa): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bgyis shing mngon par 'dus ma bgyis la/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi ched du go cha chen po 'tshal
159a1(khri pa): ba'i sems can de dag kyang ma bgyis shing mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byed pa po dmigs su
159a2(khri pa): med pa'i phyir/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ma byas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o//sems can de dag kyang ma byas mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
159a3(khri pa): rab 'byor gzugs ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do//de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon
159a4(khri pa): par 'du mi byed de/rab 'byor de bzhin du bdag ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do//rab 'byor de bzhin du shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du ni mi byed mi
159a5(khri pa): 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor bdag la sogs pa gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor rmi lam yang mi byed mi 'jig
159a6(khri pa): mngon par 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rmi lam ni gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir/de bzhin du brag ca dang /mig yor dang /sgyu ma dang /smig
159a7(khri pa): rgyu dang /sprul po ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar sprul pa de gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor
159b1(khri pa): nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nang stong pa nyid de gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du sbyar te/rab 'byor dngos
159b2(khri pa): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du sangs rgyas
159b3(khri pa): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
159b4(khri pa): bar du gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed do//rab 'byor de bzhin du ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan
159b5(khri pa): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /cho so gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon mod pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon
159b6(khri pa): par 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar de gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni mi byed mi 'jig
159b7(khri pa): mngon par 'du mi byed do//de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon por 'du mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di
160a1(khri pa): ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar de gtan dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byas mngon
160a2(khri pa): par 'dus ma byas pa yin/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi tshod du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas mngon par 'dus ma byas
160a3(khri pa): pa yin te/rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya'o///
160a4(khri pa): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa//bam po bcu pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa
160a5(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba lags so//
160a6(khri pa): de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba lags so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos//
160a7(khri pa): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du
160b1(khri pa): byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin te/gzugs nam bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
160b2(khri pa): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//
160b3(khri pa): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba gang
160b4(khri pa): yin/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du rmi lam lta bu'i tshor ba dang /rmi lam lta bu'i 'du shes dang /rmi lam
160b5(khri pa): lta bu'i 'du byed rnams dang /rmi lam lta bu'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du sbyar te/brag ca lta bu'i gzugs dang /rnam par shes pa'i bar ni ma bcings
160b6(khri pa): ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du mig yor lta bu dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma drol ba'o//de bzhin du
160b7(khri pa): sprul pa lta bu'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings
161a1(khri pa): ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du 'das pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de
161a2(khri pa): bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol
161a3(khri pa): ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang //
161a4(khri pa): rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/med pa'i phyir gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
161a5(khri pa): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du gzugs dben pa'i phyir/gzugs thams cad ni
161a6(khri pa): ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dben pa'i phyir dang /rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa thams
161a7(khri pa): cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du gzugs skye ba med pa'i phyir/gzugs thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes
161b1(khri pa): dang /'du byed rnams skye ba med pa'i phyir dang /rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du gzugs 'gag pa
161b2(khri pa): med pa'i phyir/gzugs thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams 'gag pa med pa'i phyir dang /rnam par shes pa
161b3(khri pa): 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/rnam par shes pa thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du gzugs dge ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin
161b4(khri pa): du tshor ba dge ba dang /'du shes dge ba dang /'du byed dge ba rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dge ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du gzugs mi dge ba ni ma
161b5(khri pa): bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed mi dge ba rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mi dge ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du
161b6(khri pa): gzugs lung du ma bstan pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed lung du ma bstan pa rnams dang rnam par shes pa lung du ma bstan pa
161b7(khri pa): ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du sbyar te/'jig rten pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed
162a1(khri pa): rnams dang 'jig rten pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du 'jig
162a2(khri pa): rten las 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//gzugs zag pa
162a3(khri pa): dang bcas pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zag pa dang bcas
162a4(khri pa): pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//gzugs zag pa med pa na ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du tsher ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed zag pa med pa rnams dang /
162a5(khri pa): rnam par shes pa zag pa med pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs med pa'i phyir dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams med pa'i
162a6(khri pa): phyir dang /rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni
162a7(khri pa): mo bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du gzugs dang rnam par shes pa'i bar du dben pa'i phyir dang /gzugs dang rnam par shes pa'i bar du skye ba med pa'i phyir dang /
162b1(khri pa): gzugs dang rnam par shes pa'i bar du 'gag pa med pa'i phyir dang /gzugs dang rnam par shes pa'i mar du ma bcings ma grol ba'i phyir gzugs dang /de bzhin du rnam par shes
162b2(khri pa): pa'i bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos thams cad kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni
162b3(khri pa): ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir dang skye ba med pa'i phyir dang /'gog pa med po'i phyir dang /ma bcings pa'i phyir dang /ma grol ba'i phyir/
162b4(khri pa): chos thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha
162b5(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang
162b6(khri pa): ma btsongs ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir/ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du
162b7(khri pa): med pa nyid kyi phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid kyi bar du'o
163a1(khri pa): ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po lnga dang /
163a2(khri pa): stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
163a3(khri pa): stobs bcu dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/med pa nyid kyi phyir
163a4(khri pa): dang /dben pa nyid kyi phyir dang /ma bcings pa nyid kyi phyir dang /ma grol ba nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o///
163a5(khri pa): tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /byang chub
163a6(khri pa): sems dpa' yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /dben pa nyid kyi phyir dang /skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /'gag pa med pa nyid kyi
163a7(khri pa): phyir de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi bar du'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po
163b1(khri pa): de bzhin du ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag
163b2(khri pa): pa'i mtha' dang /'dus ma byas kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dus ma byas kyi bar du med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /dben pa nyid kyi phyir dang /skye ba med pa
163b3(khri pa): nyid kyi phyir dang /'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /ma bcings pa nyid kyi phyir dang /ma grol ba nyid kyi phyir 'dus ma byas kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa
163b4(khri pa): gang po de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang /rnam pa thams cad
163b5(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba ste/le'u gong mar ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
163b6(khri pa): shing /ma bcings ma grol ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas/de bzhin du sbyar te/ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas
163b7(khri pa): te/ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do//ma bcings ma grol ba kho na'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//de ma bcings ma
164a1(khri pa): grol ba kho na'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do//de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las ma bcings ma grol ba kho na'i chos kyang nyan to//
164a2(khri pa): ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyu
164a3(khri pa): ro//ma bcings ma grol ba'i mig lnga dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzungs rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//ma bcings mgrol
164a4(khri pa): ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//ma bcings ma grol ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par sgrub po//ma bcings ma grol ba'i lam gyi rnam
164a5(khri pa): pa shes pa nyid kyang bskyed par byed do//ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi
164a6(khri pa): 'khor lo'ang bskor por 'gyur ro//de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams thog pa gsum po dag la sbyor bar byed de/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub
164a7(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gis ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
164b1(khri pa): ste/chos thams cad med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /zhi ba nyid kyi phyir dang /dben pa nyid kyi phyir dang /skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /'gag pa med pa nyid kyi phyir ro//tshe dang ldan
164b2(khri pa): pa gang po de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma bcings ma grol ba'i go cha chen po yin par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems da
164b3(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po ni 'di lta ste/mngon par shes pa drug po dag yongs su dag par byed pa nyid yin no//drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon
164b4(khri pa): sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /lha'i mig mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /lha'i rna ba mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa
164b5(khri pa): dang /pha rol gyi sems kyi rnam pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par
164b6(khri pa): shes pa dang /zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid de/rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
164b7(khri pa): chen po'i mngon par shes pa drug po dag yin no//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon
165a1(khri pa): par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas/
165a2(khri pa): rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba rnam pa du ma myong bar byed de/des 'di'ang g.yo bar byed do//de bzhin du gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ba dang /mang por gyur nas kyang gcig tu 'gyur ba dang /
165a3(khri pa): de bzhin du snang bar 'gyur zhing /mi snang bar 'gyur ba'ang myong bar byed do//rtsig pa la'ang thad kar 'gro'o//ra ba la'ang thad kar 'gro'o//ri la'ang mi thogs par
165a4(khri pa): thad kar 'gro ste/dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no//nam mkha' la'ang skyil mo krung bcas nas 'gro ste/dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no//sa la'ang steng du
165a5(khri pa): 'byung ba dang /byi'u zul byed de/dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no//chu la'ang mi nub par 'gro ste/dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no//du ba 'thul bar yang byed/'bar bar yang
165a6(khri pa): byed de/dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no//nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/'di ltar mthu che ba/'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di dag la'ang lag
165a7(khri pa): pas nyug par byed do//tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du'ang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro//gang gis rlom sems su byed pa dang /gang la rlom sems su byed pa dang /gang zhig
165b1(khri pa): rlom sems su byed pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir rdzu 'phrul des kyang rlom sems su mi byed/rdzu 'phrul
165b2(khri pa): de la'ang rlom sems su mi byed/dmigs par yang mi byed cing /de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa'i sems pa 'ong mi bskyed
165b3(khri pa): do//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su
165b4(khri pa): dag par byed pa nyid yin no//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i mig mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid gang
165b5(khri pa): zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can 'chi
165b6(khri pa): 'pho ba rnams dang /skye ba rnams dang /kha dog bzang po rnams dang /kha dog ngan pa rnams dang /bde 'gro dang /ngan 'gro dang /dran pa dang /bar ma dang /gya nom pa'i sems can
165b7(khri pa): rnams las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du rab tu shes te/kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/yid kyi nyes par
166a1(khri pa): spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/log par lta ba dang ldan pa dag ste/kye ma de dag ni log par lta ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyu dang
166a2(khri pa): rkyen des lus zhig ste shi nas/ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes so//kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan
166a3(khri pa): pa/ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa dag yin te/rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang
166a4(khri pa): mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa'i bor dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sems can las ji ltar bsags pa rnams mthong ba'i bar dang /
166a5(khri pa): bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lu dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig mngon sum
166a6(khri pa): du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa yin no//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i rna ba mngon sum du bya ba shes pa yongs
166a7(khri pa): su dag par byed pa nyid gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/lha'i rna ba mi'i las 'das pas
166b1(khri pa): de 'di lta ste/lha dang mi'i sgra nyan kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su med pa nyid kyi phyir bdag ni sgra nyan to zhes lha'i
166b2(khri pa): rna ba des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing /rna bas shes par bya ba'i sgra de'ang mi dmigs la/de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba mngon par
166b3(khri pa): bsgrub pa'i phyir sems kyang bskyed par mi byed de/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/lha'i rna ba mngon sum du bya ba
166b4(khri pa): shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid yin no//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol gyi sems kyi rnam pa shes pa mngon sum du bya
166b5(khri pa): bshes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
166b6(khri pa): sems can gzhan dag dang /gang zag gzhan rnams kyi sems sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/'di lta ste/'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la/'dod
166b7(khri pa): chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la/'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba
167a1(khri pa): bzhin du rab tu shes so//zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//zhe sdang dang bral ba'i
167a2(khri pa): sems la/zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems la/gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems su la
167a3(khri pa): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de bzhin du sred pa dang bcas
167a4(khri pa): pa'i sems la/sred pa dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba
167a5(khri pa): bzhin du rab tu shes so//de bzhin du nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems la/nye bar len pa med pa'i sems dang /sems bsdus pa dang /sems rnam par g.yengs pa
167a6(khri pa): dang /sems chung ngu dang /sems rgya chen por gyur pa dang /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang /mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems dang /sems rnam par grol ba
167a7(khri pa): dang /sems rnam par ma grol ba dang /bla na yod pa'i sems la/bla na yod pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//bla na med pa'i sems la/bla na/
167b1(khri pa): med pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes la/de dag gis rlom sems su'ang mi byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir sems deng dag ni sems ma
167b2(khri pa): yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du sbyar te/ji ltar gong du bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol gyi sems
167b3(khri pa): kyi rnam pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid yin no//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngon gyi gnas rjes
167b4(khri pa): su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
167b5(khri pa): phyin pa la gnas te/sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub cing /des sems gcig rjes su dran pa nas/sems brgya'i bar
167b6(khri pa): dang /sems stong gi bar du'ang rjes su dran no//nyi ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas nyi ma brgya'i bar dang /nyi ma stong gi bar dang /nyi ma 'bum gyi bar du'ang rjes su dran no//zla
167b7(khri pa): ba gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/zla ba brgya'i bar dang /zla ba stong gi bar dang /zla ba 'bum gyi bar du'ang rjes su dran no//lo gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/lo 'bum gyi bar
168a1(khri pa): du'ang rjes su dran no//bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas bskal pa brgya phrag du ma'i bar dang /bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang /bskal pa 'bum phrag du ma dang /
168a2(khri pa): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang rjes su dran no//de na bdag gi ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur/rus ni 'di zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za
168a3(khri pa): ba/yun ni 'di srid cig gnas gnas/tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub/tshe ring khyad ni 'di tsam zhig lon/bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong /de de nas shi 'phos nas
168a4(khri pa): che ge mo zhig tu skyes so//de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes de ltar rnam pa dang bcas/yul phyogs dang bcas par bdag dang sems can gzhan dag dang /gang zag gzhan
168a5(khri pa): rnams kyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma dag rjes su dran la/mngon par shes pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa'i bar du ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
168a6(khri pa): po'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid ces bya'o//rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
168a7(khri pa): chen po'i theg bzang pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ra
168b1(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang rjes su thob par mi
168b2(khri pa): byed la/gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos gang la'ang 'dod par mi byed cing /de mngon par shes pa des rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge
168b3(khri pa): 'dzin la brten nas/bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spong bar byed mod kyi/ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa nyid kyi phyir dang /ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su
168b4(khri pa): med pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par sems kyang
168b5(khri pa): bskyed par mi byed de/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yongs su dag par byed pa nyid yin no//rab 'byor
168b6(khri pa): de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa'i mngon par shes pa drug po dag yongs su dag par byed pa nyid ces bya ste/de'ang go cha chen po
168b7(khri pa): yin par rig par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las mngon par shes pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o///rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
169a1(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po ni 'di lta ste/yongs su dag pa'i mig lnga ste/lnga po dag gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sha'i mig dang /lha'i mig
169a2(khri pa): dang /shes rab kyi mig dang /chos kyi mig dang /sangs rgyas kyi mig go/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di ska
169a3(khri pa): ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
169a4(khri pa): pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgyar mthong ba'ang yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
169a5(khri pa): sha'i mig gis dpag tshad nyis brgyar mthong ba'ang yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis dpag tshad sum brgyar mthong ba'ang yod do//
169a6(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis dpag tshad bzhi brgya dang /lnga brgya dang /drug brgyar mthong ba'ang yod do//yang rab 'byor byang chub
169a7(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis dzam+bu gling gcig mthong ba'ang yod do//yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga sha'i mig
169b1(khri pa): gis dza mU gling gnyis mthong ba nas/de bzhin du sbyar te/sha'i mig gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du mthong ba'ang yod do//yang rab 'byor byang chub sems
169b2(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba'ang yod do//yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig
169b3(khri pa): gis stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba'ang yod do//yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong
169b4(khri pa): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba'ang yod do//rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom
169b5(khri pa): ldan 'das yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor rgyal chen
169b6(khri pa): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rab tu shes so//de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum rnams
169b7(khri pa): dang /'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas/'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams
170a1(khri pa): kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rab tu shes la/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig
170a2(khri pa): gang yin pa de ni/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rab tu mi shes pa nas/'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis rab tu mi shes so//yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
170a3(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can las ji ltar bsags pa rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang /skye ba dag
170a4(khri pa): kyang mthong /kha dog bzang po rnams dang /kha dog ngan pa rnams dang bde 'gro dang /ngan 'gro dang /ngan pa dang /bar ma dang /gya nom pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/kye ma
170a5(khri pa): sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa
170a6(khri pa): log par lta ba dang ldan pa dag yin te/kye ma de dag ni log par lta ba yang dag por blangs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des lus zhig ste/shrI ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba
170a7(khri pa): sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes so//kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/yid kyi legs
170b1(khri pa): par spyod pa dang ldan pa dag ste zhes bya ba nas/rgyu de dang rkyen de'i bar du ste/lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /de bzhin du phyogs bcu
170b2(khri pa): kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed kyi bar dag na sems can dag las ji ltar bsags pa bzhin zhes bya ba nas/bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang mi rnams
170b3(khri pa): kyi nang du skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du mthong ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa yin no//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan
170b4(khri pa): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
170b5(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig gang gis 'di snyam du gang 'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas sam/'jig rten pa 'am/'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/zag pa dang
170b6(khri pa): bcas pa 'am/zag pa med pa'i chos gang yang yod do snyam du mi sems pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig gang gis gang ma mthong ba
170b7(khri pa): 'am/ma thos pa 'am/mi dran pa'am/rnam par ma shes pa'i chos gang yang med de/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs
171a1(khri pa): su dag pa yin no//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das
171a2(khri pa): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis 'di ltar shes te/gang zag 'di ni dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'o//'di ni chos
171a3(khri pa): kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o//'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa'o//'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa'o//'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa'o//gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam
171a4(khri pa): par thar pa'i sgos dbang po lnga po dag bskyed par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu dbang po lnga po dag gis bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro//bar chad med pa'i ting
171a5(khri pa): nge 'dzin las rnam par grol ba'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro//de nas rnam par grol ba'i shes pas kun tu sbyor ba gsum po dag spong bar 'gyur te/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
171a6(khri pa): 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /the tshom dang /tshul khrims dang /brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ste/kun tu sbyor ba gsum po de dag spangs pas rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o///
171a7(khri pa): des bsgom pa'i lam thob nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /gnod sems gnyis srab mor byed par 'gyur te/de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no//des bsgom pa'i lam
171b1(khri pa): chetsher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /gnod sems gnyis ma lus par spong bar 'gyur ro//des de gnyis spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba yin no//des bsgom pa'i lam/
171b2(khri pa): cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spong bar 'gyur te/lha gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /gzugs med pa'i 'dod
171b3(khri pa): chags dang /ma rig pa dang /nga rgyal dang /rgod pa ste/des de dag spangs pas dge bcom par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar
171b4(khri pa): pa'i sgos dbang po lnga po dag bskyed par 'gyur ro//de nas dbang po lnga po dag gis bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro//bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las rnam
171b5(khri pa): par grol ba'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro//de nas rnam par grol ba'i shes pas kun tu sbyor ba gsum po dag spong bar 'gyur te/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'jig tshogs
171b6(khri pa): la lta ba dang /the tshomo dang /tshul khrims dang /brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin po ste/kun tu sbyor ba gsum po de dag spangs pas rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o//des bsgom
171b7(khri pa): pa'i lam thob nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /gnod sems gnyis srab mor byed par 'gyur te/de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no//des bsgom pa'i lam tsher bsgoms
172a1(khri pa): pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /gnod sems gnyis ma lus par spong bar 'gyur ro//de gnyis spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba yin no//des bsgom
172a2(khri pa): pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga po dag spong bar 'gyur te/lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /gzugs/
172a3(khri pa): med pa'i 'dod chags dang /ma rig pa dang /nga rgyal dang /rgod pa ste/des de dag spangs pas dgra bcom par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang /gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa'i rnam
172a4(khri pa): par thar pa'i sgos dbang po lnga po dag bskyed par 'gyur ro//de nas dbang po lnga po dag gis bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro//bar chad med pa'i ting nge
172a5(khri pa): 'dzin las rnam par grol ba'i shes po skye bar 'gyur ro//de nas rnam par grol ba'i shes pas kun tu sbyor ba gsum po dag spong bar 'gyur te/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta
172a6(khri pa): ste/'jig tshogs la lte ba dang /the tshom dang /tshul khrims dang /brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ste/kun tu sbyor ba gsum po de dag spangs pas rgyun tu zhugs pa
172a7(khri pa): zhes bya'o//des bsgom pa'i lam thob nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /gnod sems gnyis srab mor byed par 'gyur te/de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no//des
172b1(khri pa): bsgom pa'i lam tshor bsgoms pa de nyid kyis 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /gnod sems de gnyis ma lus par spong bar 'gyur ro//de gnyis ka spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba yin no///
172b2(khri pa): des bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga po dag spong bar 'gyur te/lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang //
172b3(khri pa): gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /ma rig pa dang /nga rgyal dang /rgod pa ste/des de dag spangs pas dgra bcom par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
172b4(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe 'di ltar shes te/kun 'byung/
172b5(khri pa): ba'i chos gang ci'ang rung ba de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can yin par rig nas/dad pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga 'thob ste/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
172b6(khri pa): dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe 'di ltar shes te/'di ni sems dang po
172b7(khri pa): bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o zhes bya ba nas/de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la
173a1(khri pa): spyod pa'o zhes bya ba dang /de nas dad pa'i dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi dbang po thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas rtag tu lus bzang po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur
173a2(khri pa): ro//byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nye bar rton pas brtan pa ste/rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/bram ze'i rigs shi
173a3(khri pa): sA la chen po lta bu dag gam/khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba nas/de
173a4(khri pa): bzhin du sbyar te/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes so//der gnas nas kyang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing
173a5(khri pa): bde ba nye bar sgrub pa thams cad kyis sems can rnams la bsnyen bkur byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
173a6(khri pa): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang mnyes par byed/bkur sti byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod pa byed de/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas
173a7(khri pa): kyi sar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog
173b1(khri pa): par mi 'gyur zhes bya bar shes te/rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
173b2(khri pa): sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar shes te/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//'di ni lung ma bstan
173b3(khri pa): to//byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni rang gi don byed par 'gyur ro//'di dag ni byed par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyir ldog pa'o//'di dag ni phyir mi ldog
173b4(khri pa): pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i mngon par shes pa ni yongs su rdzogs so//'di'i ni yongs su ma rdzogs so//byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa
173b5(khri pa): ngadag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
173b6(khri pa): phyir dang /bkur stir bya ba'i phyir dang /bla mar bya ba'i phyir dang /ri mor bya ba'i phyir dang /mchod par bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o//byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mngon par shes
173b7(khri pa): pa thob bo//'di ni 'thob par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni
174a1(khri pa): yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas so//'dis ni yongs su smin par ma byas so//byang chub
174a2(khri pa): sems dpa' 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsngags pa brjod par mdzad do//'di yin brjod
174a3(khri pa): par mi mdzad do//byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas so//gnas par 'gyur ro//'di dag ni nye bar mi gnas so//nye bar gnas
174a4(khri pa): par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i tshe ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro///
174a5(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub thob pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro//'di ni dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' 'di byang chub
174a6(khri pa): thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni yod par 'gyur ro//'di ni med par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dka' ba spyad po spyod par 'gyur ro//'di ni
174a7(khri pa): spyod par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa yin no//'di ni srid po tha ma pa ma yin no//byang chub sems dpa' 'od ni byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug
174b1(khri pa): par 'gyur ro//'di ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' 'di la ni bdud 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'di la ni bdud 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar shes pa ste/rab 'byor de ltar
174b2(khri pa): nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
174b3(khri pa): ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang
174b4(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis byang chub kyi sems kyi mjug thogs su rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
174b5(khri pa): rjes su thob la/de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan/so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje
174b6(khri pa): chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan zhing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gang gis kyang rnam pa thams cad du chos
174b7(khri pa): thams cad la ma mthong ba 'am/ma thos pa 'am/mi dran pa 'am/mngon par mi shes pa gang yang med pa ste/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
175a1(khri pa): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mig yongs su dag pa ni de lta bu ste/rab 'byor de dag ni byung
175a2(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shin tu yongs su dag pa'i mig lnga po dag yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga pode
175a3(khri pa): dag yongs su dag par byed pa ni go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya'o/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun
175a4(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang dag la gnas par bgyi lags/bcom ldan
175a5(khri pa): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang la'ang gnas par mi bya'i//
175a6(khri pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/gnas dang /gnas pa po dang /gnas par bya ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//de skad ces bka'o stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
175a7(khri pa): pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/btsun pa bcom ldan
175b1(khri pa): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes
175b2(khri pa): dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dag la gnas par mi bgyi logs so//mig la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce
175b3(khri pa): dang /lus dang /yid la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de bzhin du gzugs rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de bzhin du skra dang /dri dang /ro dang /rag
175b4(khri pa): pa dang /chos rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar la gnas par mi
175b5(khri pa): bgyi lags so//de bzhin du sbyar te/chos kyi khams kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//mig
175b6(khri pa): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi zhing /sa'i khams
175b7(khri pa): la gnas par mi bgyi/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams la gnas par mi bgyi/nam mkha'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi/rnam
176a1(khri pa): par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi/ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/rga shi'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhen/
176a2(khri pa): 'di ltar btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes
176a3(khri pa): pas stong ste/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags la/gzugs kyi stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs ma mchis te/
176a4(khri pa): gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs lags pa'i slad du ste/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa'
176a5(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de bzhin du tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang /'du
176a6(khri pa): shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang /'du byed kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de rnam par shes pa ma lags la//
176a7(khri pa): rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa ma mchis te/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags
176b1(khri pa): so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/rnam
176b2(khri pa): par shes pa'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de bzhin du sbyar te/ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/rga shi'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de ci'i slad
176b3(khri pa): du zhe na/'di ltar rga shi'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de rga shi mo lags la/rga shi'i stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rga shi ma mchis te/rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/
176b4(khri pa): stong pa nyid kyang rga shi lags pa'i slad du ste/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rga
176b5(khri pa): shi'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pas//
176b6(khri pa): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi legs so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/
176b7(khri pa): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma mchis te/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
177a1(khri pa): nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams lags pa'i slad du'o//de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya
177a2(khri pa): kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis stong ste/
177a3(khri pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis te/sangs
177a4(khri pa): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad lags pa'i slad du'o//btsun pa bcom
177a5(khri pa): ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas
177a6(khri pa): par mi bgyi lags so////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/bam po bcu gcig po/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
177a7(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi lags/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol
177b1(khri pa): tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi
177b2(khri pa): lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na stong pa nyid
177b3(khri pa): ma mchis la/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
177b4(khri pa): tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du ste/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/sbyin pa'i pha rol
177b5(khri pa): tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
177b6(khri pa): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/yig 'bru rnams la gnas par mi bgyi/yi ge bsgrub pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi/gcig brjod pa dang /
177b7(khri pa): gnyis brjod pa dang /mang po brjod po'i bar dag la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar yig 'bru rnams ni yig 'bru rnams kyis stong pa'i slad
178a1(khri pa): du'o//de bzhin du sbyar te/le'u gong mar ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dang/
178a2(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar mngon par shes
178a3(khri pa): pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/mngon par shes pa gang lags pa de ni stong pa nyid ma lags/stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang mngon par shes pa rnams
178a4(khri pa): ma lags shing /mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis te/mngon par shes
178a5(khri pa): pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags la/stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams lags pa'i slad du ste/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems
178a6(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
178a7(khri pa): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi legs so///
178b1(khri pa): de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar gzugs
178b2(khri pa): mi rtag pa nyid gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/gzugs mi rtag pa nyid gang lags pa de stong pa nyid ma lags/stong pa nyid gang lags pa de'ang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid
178b3(khri pa): ma lags/gzugs mi rtag pa nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te/gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyang
178b4(khri pa): stong pa nyid lags la/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid lags pa'i slad du'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes
178b5(khri pa): pa dag la'ang rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi ste/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/
178b6(khri pa): gzugs mi rtag pa nyid nas rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi bar la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de bzhin du sbyar te gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la bde zhes bgyi
178b7(khri pa): bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so//gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so//gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i
179a1(khri pa): bar la stong zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so//gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la mtshan ma ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags
179a2(khri pa): so//gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la smon pa ma mchis shes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so//gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la zhi zhes bgyi bar
179a3(khri pa): gnas par mi bgyi ljags so//gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la dben zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so//gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la
179a4(khri pa): kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so//gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la skye ba ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so//
179a5(khri pa): gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la 'gag pa ma mchis zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi lags so//gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la dngos po ma mchis
179a6(khri pa): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi mgyi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/gzugs kyi phung por ji skad bstan pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o//btsun pa bcom
179a7(khri pa): ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/chos kyi de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//
179b1(khri pa): de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/chos kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis la/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang chos
179b2(khri pa): kyi de bzhin nyid ma mchis te/chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi de bzhin nyid lags pa'i slad du'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs
179b3(khri pa): des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/chos kyi de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ba nas/de bzhin du sbyar te/chos nyid
179b4(khri pa): dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi
179b5(khri pa): ba'i slad du'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
179b6(khri pa): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams
179b7(khri pa): dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/snga ma bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bgyi'o//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas
180a1(khri pa): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /bdag gir 'dzin par gyur pa'i yid kyis gzugs la spyod cing /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
180a2(khri pa): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la spyod na/de lta na gzugs mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags shing /de bzhin du tshor ba mngon par 'du
180a3(khri pa): bgyid pa dang /'du shes mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /'du byed mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags te/mngon
180a4(khri pa): par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ma lags te/shes rab kyi pha
180a5(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/byang chub
180a6(khri pa): sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/thabs la mi mkhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /bdag gir 'dzin par gyur pa'i yid kyis de gzugs la spyod cing //
180a7(khri pa): de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la spyod na/de ltar na gzugs mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags shing /de
180b1(khri pa): bzhin du tshor ba mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /'du shes mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /'du byed mngon par 'du bgyid pa dang /rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags
180b2(khri pa): la/mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ma lags te/shes
180b3(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs par ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/byang chub
180b4(khri pa): sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /bdag gir 'dzin pa'i yid kyis de bzhin du sbyar te/gzungs kyi sgo rnams
180b5(khri pa): dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi bar la spyod na gzungs kyi sgo dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa lags te/mngon par 'du bgyid pa la spyod pa ni shes
180b6(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa mi lags/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa ma logs te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs
180b7(khri pa): par ni/rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur legs so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis/de bzhin du
181a1(khri pa): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//gzugs kyi bzung ba ma mchis pa/
181a2(khri pa): de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du gzugs ma lags so//de bzhin du tshor ba gang lags pa dang /'du shes gang lags pa dang /'du byed rnams gang lags pa dang //
181a3(khri pa): rnam par shes pa'i yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du rnam par shes pa ma lags so//de bzhin du sbyar te/gzungs kyi sgo/
181a4(khri pa): rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ni yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa lags so//gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang /
181a5(khri pa): 'gas pa de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du/gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams ma lags so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang rang bzhin
181a6(khri pa): gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/chos
181a7(khri pa): thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par nye bar brtag par bgyi ste/ci nas kyang chos gang la'ang yid rnam par rgyu bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar nye bar brtag par bgyi ste/de ni byang
181b1(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad yangs pa/tshad ma mchis pa tshad ma nges pa nyan thos dang /rang
181b2(khri pa): sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang /phyi stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang /de bzhin du phyi nang stong
181b3(khri pa): pa nyid kyi slad du dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
181b4(khri pa): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
181b5(khri pa): nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
181b6(khri pa): nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni mtshan mas bsgrub par bgyi ba ma lags pa'i slad du'o//de ci'i slad du zhe
181b7(khri pa): na/mtshan ma ni nyon mongs pa lags pa'i slad du'o//mtshan ma'ang gang lags she na/'di lta ste gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so//sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang reg bya
182a1(khri pa): dang /chos ni mtshan ma lags so//de bzhin du sbyar te/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma lags so//ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyi bar du ni mtshan ma lags te//
182a2(khri pa): de ni mtshan ma zhes bgyi'o//nyon mongs pa'ang de lags te de ni gzung bar mi bgyi/goms par mi bgyi lags so//de lta ma lags na ni kun du rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang
182a3(khri pa): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la dad par mi 'gyur lags so//dad pa de'ang gang zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yid ches pa dang /rtog pa dang mos pa dang /
182a4(khri pa): brten pa dang sems pa dang mjal ba dang dpyod pa ste/de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags te/de ltar na mtshan ma de gzung bar mi bgyi lags so//kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang
182a5(khri pa): mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang zhing rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du shes pas zhugs nas/gzugs yongs su ma bzung /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams
182a6(khri pa): dang /rnam par shes pa mtshan mar yongs su ma bzung ba lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar de la rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la yongs su
182a7(khri pa): gzung ba mi skye ba'i slad du'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar des shes pa de nang gi mngon par rtogs pa thob pas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /phyi'i mngon par rtogs
182b1(khri pa): pa thob pa dang /phyi nang gi mngon par rtogs pa thob pas shes pa de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong la/nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de shes pa dang /mngon par rtogs pa las
182b2(khri pa): gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar des gang gis shes par bgyid pa dang /gang shes par bgyid pa dang /gang shes par bgyi
182b3(khri pa): ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/shes pa de gzugs nas tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi nang du yang dag par
182b4(khri pa): rjes su ma mthong /shes pa de gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /shes pa de gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi nang dang /
182b5(khri pa): phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /gzugs las gzhan du shes pa de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams las gzhan
182b6(khri pa): du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /shes pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o//rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs mos
182b7(khri pa): par gyur te/de chos 'di la mos nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dad pas rjes su 'brang bar gyur to//de lta bas ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du chos nyid
183a1(khri pa): tshad mar bgyis nas/mtshan ma yid la mi bgyid pas ci nas kyang des chos gang yang yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa de ltar mos lags so//chos thams cad
183a2(khri pa): yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du des gang gzung bar bgyi ba 'am/gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs te/chos thams cad rlom sems ma mchis
183a3(khri pa): pa'i slad du/de mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/
183a4(khri pa): gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin cing /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar
183a5(khri pa): te/chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyi bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni/pha rol
183a6(khri pa): nas pha rol tu mchi bra ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid lags so//de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi nas/'phags
183a7(khri pa): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su
183b1(khri pa): ma rdzogs par bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa ma legs par yang dag par
183b2(khri pa): rjes su mthong ba nas/de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'i
183b3(khri pa): slad du ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /
183b4(khri pa): rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyi bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang /dran pa
183b5(khri pa): nye bar bzhag pa rnams nas/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
183b6(khri pa): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs su mi 'dzin pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
183b7(khri pa): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar nye bar brtag por bgyi ste/kye shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang /gang gis na 'di shes rab kyi pha
184a1(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa yin/'di gang gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin/'di ci'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brtag par bgyi ste/byang chub sems
184a2(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na'ang 'di snyam du chos gang yong med cing mi dmigs pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snyam du nges
184a3(khri pa): par sems par bgyid do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos med cing mi dmigs
184a4(khri pa): pa gang yin/smras pa/nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /chen po stong pa nyid
184a5(khri pa): kyi phyir dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /thog
184a6(khri pa): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /chos
184a7(khri pa): thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /dngos po med pa'i
184b1(khri pa): ngobo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos ni med cing mi dmigs so//de bzhin du sbyar te/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
184b2(khri pa): chos dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
184b3(khri pa): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos ni med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/dngos po med pa'i ngo
184b4(khri pa): bonyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
184b5(khri pa): shes pa med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/dngos po med pa'i
184b6(khri pa): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so//de bzhin du sbyar te/'phags
184b7(khri pa): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan
185a1(khri pa): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa drug med cing mi dmigs so//de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /
185a2(khri pa): chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med cing mi dmigs so//rgyun du zhugs pa med cing mi dmigs pa nas/dgra bcom pa'i bar
185a3(khri pa): du med cing mi dmigs so//rang sangs rgyas med cing mi dmigs so//byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas zhes bya
185a4(khri pa): ba med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
185a5(khri pa): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/de ltar nye bar rtog par byed cing nges par sems par byed la/de ltar nye bar rtog par byed cing /de ltar nges par sems
185a6(khri pa): ba na/gal te sems mi zhum mi 'gong la mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
185a7(khri pa): dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na byang
185b1(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
185b2(khri pa): ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
185b3(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du tsher ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang //
185b4(khri pa): rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshe dang ldan pa
185b5(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
185b6(khri pa): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
185b7(khri pa): chen pos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' bar ni yang dag pa'i
186a1(khri pa): mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
186a2(khri pa): rab tu shes so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rgyu des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o//de
186a3(khri pa): skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin/tsher
186a4(khri pa): ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin/rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin/tshe dang ldan po rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/yang dag pa'i
186a5(khri pa): mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin gang yin/de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
186a6(khri pa): ti'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o///
186a7(khri pa): de bzhin du sbyar te/yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//tshe dang ldan po shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ji ltar
186b1(khri pa): gzugs gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba nas/
186b2(khri pa): de bzhin du sbyar te/yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'a'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba/mtshan nyid kyang rang bzhin dang bral ba yin la/rang bzhin yang mtshan nyid
186b3(khri pa): dang bral bar rig par bya'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
186b4(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa
186b5(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
186b6(khri pa): nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni ma skyes shing nges par 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro//smras pa/
