186b7(khri pa): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par 'byung ba med pa yin/smras pa/tshe dong ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/
187a1(khri pa): de la ni skyes pa'ang med cing byung ba'ang dmigs su med do//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam
187a2(khri pa): par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de la ni skyes pa'ang med cing byung ba'ang dmigs su med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i
187a3(khri pa): rang bzhin gyis stong ste/de la ni skyes pa'ang med cing byung ba'ang dmigs su med do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las mi gnas pa'i le'u
187a4(khri pa): zhes bya ste/bcu gcig pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
187a5(khri pa): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa
187a6(khri pa): lags so//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//yang gal te
187a7(khri pa): gzugs la rtag ces bgyi ba'am/mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
187b1(khri pa): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la rtag ces bgyi ba 'am/mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//de bzhin du gal te gzugs la bde zhes bgyi ba
187b2(khri pa): 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la bde//
187b3(khri pa): zhes bgyi ba'am/sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//gal te gzugs la bdag mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi
187b4(khri pa): bar spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la bdag mchis zhes bgyi
187b5(khri pa): ba 'am/bdag ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spod pa lags so//gal te gzugs la stong zhes bgyi ba 'am/mi stong zhes bgyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma la
187b6(khri pa): spyod pa lags so//de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la stong zhes bgyi ba'am/mi stong zhes bgyi bar spyod na
187b7(khri pa): de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//gal te gzugs la mtshan ma mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/mtshan ma ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//
188a1(khri pa): de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/mtshan ma ma mchis zhes
188a2(khri pa): bgyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//gal te gzugs la smon pa mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/smon pa ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spyod
188a3(khri pa): pa lags so//de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la smon pa mchis zhes bgyi ba'am/smon pa ma mchis zhes
188a4(khri pa): bgyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//gal te gzugs la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//de
188a5(khri pa): bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/mo zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod
188a6(khri pa): pa lags so//gal te gzugs la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na/de ni mtshan mA la spyod pa lags so//de bzhin du gal te tshor ba
188a7(khri pa): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//gal
188b1(khri pa): tegazugs la kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi ba 'am/rnam par byang zhes bgyi bar spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang //
188b2(khri pa): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la kun nas nyon mongs zhes bgyi ba 'am/rnam par byang zhes bgyi bor spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//gal te gzugs
188b3(khri pa): la skyo zhes bgyi ba 'am/mi skye zhes bgyi bar spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
188b4(khri pa): par shes pa la skye zhes bgyi ba 'o ma/mi skye zhes bgyi bar spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//gal te gzugs la 'gag ces bgyi ba 'am/mi 'gag ces bgyi bar
188b5(khri pa): spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la 'gag ces bgyi ba'am//
188b6(khri pa): mi 'gag ces bgyi bar spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//gal te gzugs la dngos po mchos zhes bgyi ba 'am/dngos po ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na/de ni/
188b7(khri pa): mtshan ma la spyod pa lagaso so//de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba 'am/dngos po
189a1(khri pa): ma mchis zhes bgyi bar spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
189a2(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/thobs la mi mkhas pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod na de na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//de bzhin du sbyar te/'phags
189a3(khri pa): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po'i bar la spyod na de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod na/de ni mtshan mo la spyod pa lags
189a4(khri pa): so//de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la spyod na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te
189a5(khri pa): byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'di snyam du sems te/bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/de bsgom
189a6(khri pa): par bya'o snyam na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//gal te 'di snyam du sems te/bdag ni byang chub sems dpa'o//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na//
189a7(khri pa): de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags so//gal te byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o snyam
189b1(khri pa): na/de ni mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas pa lags par rig par bgyi lags so//de nas tshe dang ldan
189b2(khri pa): pa rab 'byor gyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/
189b3(khri pa): gal te gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te
189b4(khri pa): mos la/de gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos pa dang /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun
189b5(khri pa): tu shes te mos par byed pa na/gzugs kyi mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i/
189b6(khri pa): mngon por 'du byed po la spyod pa yin no//gzugs kyi mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa nas rnam par shes pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i bar la spyod na de ni tshe rabs phyi ma
189b7(khri pa): la skye ba las yongs su mi thar zhing /da ni rga ba nas 'khrug pa dang /sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar par kho bo smra'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu ga zhan yang byang chub sems
190a1(khri pa): dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na thabs la mi mkhas pas mig la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas/de bzhin du sbyar te/yid
190a2(khri pa): kyi bar la gnas shing kun tu shes te mngon par zhen la mos par byed na/de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi ngar las yongs su mthar bar kho bo smra'o//de bzhin du
190a3(khri pa): gagral te gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/gal te chos kyi bar lnga gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed na/de ni tshe rabs
190a4(khri pa): phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar par kho bo smra'o//gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
190a5(khri pa): tshor ba'i bar la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed na/de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi thar par kho bo smra'o//gal te dran pa nye bar
190a6(khri pa): bzhag pa rnams la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed pa nas/de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
190a7(khri pa): bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bor la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos par byed na/de ni tshe rabs phyi ma la sdug bsngal gyi bar las yongs su mi
190b1(khri pa): thar par kho bo smra'o//de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'ang mngon sum du bya ba'i skal pa'ang med na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
190b2(khri pa): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lta smos kyang ci dgos te/de ni gnas med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na//
190b3(khri pa): thabs la mi mkhas pa dang ldan zhing /thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'od skad
190b4(khri pa): ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/thabs la mkhas par rig par
190b5(khri pa): bya de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dong ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
190b6(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/gzugs la mi spyod/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa
190b7(khri pa): la mi spyod/gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mo la mi spyod/gzugs rtag ces bya
191a1(khri pa): ba'am/mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/mi rtag ces bya
191a2(khri pa): bar mi spyod/gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa bde
191a3(khri pa): zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod/gzugaso bdag yod ces bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
191a4(khri pa): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa bdag yod ces bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod/gzugs stong zhes bya ba'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/
191a5(khri pa): de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba 'am/mi stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/gzugs mtshan ma yod ces
191a6(khri pa): bya ba'am/mtshan ma med ces bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba
191a7(khri pa): 'am/mtshan ma med ces bya b.ro mi sbyong /gzungs smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du
191b1(khri pa): byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba 'am/smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin du
191b2(khri pa): tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/gzugs dben zhes bya ba'am/mi dben zhes
191b3(khri pa): bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba 'amo/mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/gzugs kun nas
191b4(khri pa): nyon mongs zhes bya ba 'am/rnam par byung zhes bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs zhes bya ba
191b5(khri pa): 'am/rnam par byang zhes bya bar mi spyod/gzugs skye zhes bya ba'am/mi skye zhes bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
191b6(khri pa): par shes pa skye zhes bya ba 'am/mi skyo zhes bya bar mi spyod/gzugs 'gag ces bya ba'am/mi 'gag ces bya bar mi spyod/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
191b7(khri pa): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa 'gog ces bya ba 'am/mi 'gag ces bya bar mi spyod/gzugs dngos po yod ces bya ba 'am/dngos po med ces bya bar mi spyod//
192a1(khri pa): de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya ba'am/dngos po med ces bya bar mi spyod pa ste/
192a2(khri pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod na/thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o//de ci'i
192a3(khri pa): phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin/gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med/stong pa nyid las
192a4(khri pa): gud na'ang gzugs med de/gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams
192a5(khri pa): dang /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam
192a6(khri pa): par shes pa med de/stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin la/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du sbyar te/dran pa nye bar bzhag
192a7(khri pa): pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ong stong pa nyid med/stong pa
192b1(khri pa): las gud na'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med de/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong pa nyid yin la/stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yin no//de bzhin du
192b2(khri pa): sbyar te/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/'phags pa'i lam yan lag
192b3(khri pa): brgyad pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med de/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang
192b4(khri pa): stong pa nyid yin la/stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin no//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar yang gzhan ma yin/stong pa
192b5(khri pa): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med stong pa nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu med de/de
192b6(khri pa): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nyid stong pa nyid yin la/stong pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yin no//de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
192b7(khri pa): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa bco brgyad las gud nal
193a1(khri pa): stong pa nyid med/stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa btsong rgyad med de/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid kyang stong pa nyid yan
193a2(khri pa): la/stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yin no//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
193a3(khri pa): tu phyin pa la spyod pa na spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi ldan/mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len/spyod kyang spyod la/mi spyod kyang mi spyod ces bya bar khas mi len/spyod pa'ang
193a4(khri pa): ma yin mi spyod pa'ang mo yin zheso bya bar khas mi len na/byang chub sems dpa' de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
193a5(khri pa): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba dang ldan pa yin no//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA rad+mo ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di
193a6(khri pa): skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na thams cad du khas mi len//
193a7(khri pa): smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
193b1(khri pa): ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na khas ma
193b2(khri pa): len to//de bzhin du sbyar te/spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi spyod pa'ang ma yin zhes bya ba de lta bur yang khas mi len to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar chos thams cad dngos po
193b3(khri pa): med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang /gzung ba med po'i phyir te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin/chos thams cad nye bar
193b4(khri pa): len pa med pa rgya che ba'i yo byad tshad med par gtogs pa nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid dang ma bral ba'i byang chub
193b5(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
193b6(khri pa): phyin pa khri pa//bam po bcu gnyis pa//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
193b7(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di kho na dang ma bral zhing ldan pa/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
194a1(khri pa): 'tshang rgya 'am/'on te ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis kyang 'tshang rgya/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis de la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin
194a2(khri pa): gzhan dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//smras
194a3(khri pa): pa/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gang dag la gnas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub
194a4(khri pa): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar
194a5(khri pa): 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/de la gnas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
194a6(khri pa): 'chang rgya'o//de bzhin du sbyar te/rin tshon phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//seng gi rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//zla ba bzang po
194a7(khri pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//zla ba'i rgyal mtshon rtog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
194b1(khri pa): dang /spyi gtsug daltar mi mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge
194b2(khri pa): 'dzin dang /nges pa'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ting //
194b3(khri pa): denge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /brtson 'grus kyi stobs zhes bya ba'i ting
194b4(khri pa): ngo 'dzin dang /yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /tshig bla dgas
194b5(khri pa): la 'jug cing phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /brjod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
194b6(khri pa): dang /chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdo rje'i
194b7(khri pa): dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rgyun gyi
195a1(khri pa): rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bkod pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
195a2(khri pa): rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gnas la brten
195a3(khri pa): pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snang ba mtha' yas pa zhes
195a4(khri pa): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
195a5(khri pa): dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gzi brjid yod pa zhes
195a6(khri pa): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nges par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting
195a7(khri pa): ngo 'dzin dang /nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zla ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snang ba
195b1(khri pa): byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mchog gi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ye shes rtog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting
195b2(khri pa): ngo 'dzin dang /kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos
195b3(khri pa): dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /chos
195b4(khri pa): kyis gnon pa'i spyi gtsug ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /tshig thams cad rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
195b5(khri pa): yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam pa
195b6(khri pa): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rab rib med pa ni
195b7(khri pa): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du
196a1(khri pa): yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa
196a2(khri pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
196a3(khri pa): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /shin tu brtags pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nem nur rnam par sel
196a4(khri pa): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa
196a5(khri pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /srid pa'i 'dam bu thams
196a6(khri pa): cad phung po med par rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya
196a7(khri pa): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /mngon par ma dmigs pa
196b1(khri pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya
196b2(khri pa): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam pa zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /yang dag pa dang ldog pa thams cad yang
196b3(khri pa): dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /skra bsgrags pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'gal ba dang 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
196b4(khri pa): 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bkod pa chen
196b5(khri pa): po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /'jig rten thams cad la 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rdul med cing
196b6(khri pa): rdul dang bral ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nyon mongs pa med pa dang /nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
196b7(khri pa): 'dzin dang /g.yo ba med cing gonas paM med la dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /lus kyi
197a1(khri pa): skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /nam mkha'
197a2(khri pa): ltar chags pa med la 'gro ba las rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
197a3(khri pa): po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gang dag la gnas na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
197a4(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni de dag yin no//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//a la la de ltar
197a5(khri pa): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin 'di dag la gnas pa de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
197a6(khri pa): rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin la/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na de bzhin
197a7(khri pa): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
197b1(khri pa): dpa' chen po de la lung ston par rig par bya ste/ting nge 'dzin gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni snyoms par ma zhugs pa dag go/
197b2(khri pa): bdag ni snyoms par zhugs pa'o//snyoms par 'jug go/snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro snyam du ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rlom sems su 'dre mi byed la/rnam par rtog
197b3(khri pa): pipade dag thams cad de la med cing myi 'byung ngo //de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang
197b4(khri pa): ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /da ltar na phyogs bcu'i 'jig
197b5(khri pa): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag 'tsho zhing bzhugs pa dag gis lung bstan par rig par bya 'am/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa
197b6(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhig/ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/byang chub
197b7(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ong gzhan ma yin gyi/byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la/ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin te///
198a1(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro//smras pa/tshe dang
198a2(khri pa): ldan pa rab 'byor gal te ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la/byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin te/ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin/byang chub sems
198a3(khri pa): dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin la/ting nge 'dzin dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa de gnyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin na ni/de ltar na ting nge 'dzin
198a4(khri pa): gyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mi shes shing /kun tu shes pa med par yang 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 'di nyid kyis na byang chub sems
198a5(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin des chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de mi shes shing /kun tu shes pa'ang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/smras pa/byang chub sems
198a6(khri pa): dpa' de dang /ting nge 'dzin de dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de med pa nyid kyi phyir mi shes shing /kun tu shes pa'ang med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
198a7(khri pa): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/rab 'byor legs so legs so//khyod kyi tshig 'di ni legs par smras so//'di ltar khyod ngas nyan thos nyon
198b1(khri pa): mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de la lung phog pa 'di ni khyod kyi tshul dang mthun pa yin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang de ltar shes
198b2(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims
198b3(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o//de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhog pa rnams la de ltar bslab par bya ba nas/'phags pa'i lam
198b4(khri pa): yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bor dag la de ltar bsgrub par
198b5(khri pa): bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
198b6(khri pa): slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa legs sim/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob
198b7(khri pa): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la slob pa yin zhing /de bzhin
199a1(khri pa): du sbyar te/de ltar slob na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi bar la slob pa yin pa nas/de ltar slob na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la
199a2(khri pa): slob pa yin te/de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan
199a3(khri pa): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags shing /de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/
199a4(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul
199a5(khri pa): gyis slob pa yin no//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
199a6(khri pa): bdag mi dmigs/sems can mi dmigs pa nas/shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po rnams mi
199a7(khri pa): dmigs/khams rnams mi dmigs/skye mched rnams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ma rig pa mi dmigs pa nas/rga shi'i bar du mi dmigs so///
199b1(khri pa): de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs/kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir
199b2(khri pa): 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs/gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs/gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar
199b3(khri pa): bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pa nas/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
199b4(khri pa): pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug mi dmigs
199b5(khri pa): so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra
199b6(khri pa): bcom pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so//
199b7(khri pa): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun
200a1(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /de bzhin du 'gag pa med pa
200a2(khri pa): dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /'byung ba med pa dang /dmigs su med pa dang /chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa
200a3(khri pa): de ni rnam par dag pa yin no//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa na chos gang dag sa la bslabs pa legs//
200a4(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa na chos gang dag la'ang bsrabs pa med do//de ci'i
200a5(khri pa): phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag mngon par zhen pa de ltar chos 'di dag med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
200a6(khri pa): chos 'di dag ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di dag mngon par zhen pa de ltar ma mchis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ji ltar med pa de ltar yod
200a7(khri pa): la/de ltar med pas ma rig pa zhes bya'o//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de dag mchis pa ma lags pa la ma rig pa zhes bgyi lags/bcom
200b1(khri pa): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs med do//de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir
200b2(khri pa): dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa med do//de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dong
200b3(khri pa): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med cing mi dmigs so//de bzhin du sbyar te/nAng snang ba nyid kyi phyir dang /dngos po med
200b4(khri pa): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du med na/de la byis pa so so'i skye bo ma rig pa dang sred pa'i dbang gis mngon par zhen
200b5(khri pa): pa de dag gis mngon par zhen nas yod pa ma yin pa la yod par brtags so//de dag ni 'di lta ste/rtag po dang chad pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas/de dag ni mi shes
200b6(khri pa): myimi mthong ba ste/chos gang dag med pa de dag la kun tu rtog par byed do//brtags nas kyang ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa nas/de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi
200b7(khri pa): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la mngon par zhen to//de dag mngon par zhen pa nyid yin pas na yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog par byed pa'i phyir de
201a1(khri pa): dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba dag yin no//de dag ci zhig mi shes mi mthong zhe na/gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo //de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
201a2(khri pa): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du mi shes mi mthong ngo //gang
201a3(khri pa): gi phyir mi shes shing mi mthong ba de'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o//de dag ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/gang nas nges par 'byung
201a4(khri pa): ba ma yin zhe na/'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no//de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin
201a5(khri pa): no//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su nges par 'byung ba ma yin no//byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams su nges par 'byung ba ma yin no//yang dag
201a6(khri pa): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su nges par 'byung ba ma yin no//de dag ni yid mi ches pa dag yin te/gzugs stong pa nyid du yid mi ches so//de bzhin
201a7(khri pa): du tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /'du shes stong pa nyid dang /'du byed rnams stong pa nyid dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid du yid mi tshas pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
201b1(khri pa): kyi bar la'ang yid me ches so//yang de dag ni mi gnas pa dag yin te/gang la mi gnas zhe na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dang /
201b2(khri pa): bar la mi gnas so//phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mi gnas shing /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la mi gnas te/rgyu des na byis pa so so'i skye bo zhes bya//mngon
201b3(khri pa): par zhen pa zhes bya'o//ci zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhing de dag gang la mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/gzugs la mngon par zhen pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar la
201b4(khri pa): mngon par zhen to//de bzhin du mig la mngon par zhen pa nas/de bzhin du yid kyi bar la mngon par zhen to//gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang reg bya dang /chos
201b5(khri pa): rnams la mngon par zhen to//de bzhin du khams rnams la mngon par zhen to//'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnams la mngon par zhen to//lta bar gyur
201b6(khri pa): pa rnams la mngon par zhen to//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa nas/de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la
201b7(khri pa): mngon par zhen to//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i blos 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang
202a1(khri pa): chub sems dpa' de ltar slob na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags mod/btson
202a2(khri pa): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing /thams cad mkhyen pa
202a3(khri pa): nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no//gsol pa/'o na ji lta bu zhig lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
202a4(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rtog par byed cing mngon par zhen to//de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
202a5(khri pa): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par rtog par byed cing
202a6(khri pa): mngon par zhun to//ngo bozhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos mya 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag tu rtog par byed cing mngon par zhen to//mngon par zhen nas kyang
202a7(khri pa): thams cad shes pa nyid dang /rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtog par byed do//yongs su brtags nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par zhen par byed
202b1(khri pa): de/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma
202b2(khri pa): yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob na shes
202b3(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags mod/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
202b4(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin
202b5(khri pa): no|de gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi zhing /byang chub
202b6(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar slob na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu
202b7(khri pa): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu
203a1(khri pa): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
203a2(khri pa): slob cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin no//mi dmigs pa'ang gang zhe na/gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
203a3(khri pa): phyin pa de nyid mi dmigs pa nas/de bzhin du sbyar te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la spyod pa na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i b.ro de nyid mi dmigs pa dang /
203a4(khri pa): byang chub kyi bar du mi dmigs pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa ste/shA ra dwa tI'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
203a5(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba yin
203a6(khri pa): no//gsol pa/btsun po bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges por 'byung ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nang stong pa nyid mi
203a7(khri pa): dmigs pa'i tshul dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
203b1(khri pa): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zag pa des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur lags bcom ldan 'ad/
203b2(khri pa): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor theg pa des ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga la ba der nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/de nyid du
203b3(khri pa): gnas par 'gyur la/de'ang gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de
203b4(khri pa): gnyis ka ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing /gzugs med pa bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir
203b5(khri pa): ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams ni nges par mi 'byung nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur/nges par ma byung ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang
203b6(khri pa): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni chos kyi dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de bzhin du gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la
203b7(khri pa): nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zod cing /de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de bzhin du gang mtshan
204a1(khri pa): nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//gang mtshan nyid med pa'i
204a2(khri pa): chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/grub pa dang bde ba la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod
204a3(khri pa): pa de ni spong ba'i khams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de bzhin du sbyar te/gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni 'dod chags
204a4(khri pa): dang bral ba'i dbyings dang /'gog pa'i dbyings dang /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad pa dang /de bzhin du de ni tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
204a5(khri pa): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe ni/rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid ni khams
204a6(khri pa): gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang //'du byed
204a7(khri pa): rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i
204b1(khri pa): phyir zhe na/'di ltar rab 'byor gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa'i phyir
204b2(khri pa): rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/mig gi stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de bzhin du sbyar te/gang mtshan nyid
204b3(khri pa): med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nas/de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa
204b4(khri pa): nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar mig gi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam pa
204b5(khri pa): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar gyi stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung
204b6(khri pa): bar mi 'gyur zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar mig ni mig gis stong pa nas de bzhin
204b7(khri pa): dusbyar te/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar du stong pa dang /de bzhin du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
205a1(khri pa): gyis tshor bas stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rmi lam la nges par 'byung
205a2(khri pa): bar 'dod du zad do//de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams langs par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /brag ca dang /mig yor dang //
205a3(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung
205a4(khri pa): ba ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang /smig rgyu dang /brag ca dang /mig yor dang //
205a5(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnus pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//
205a6(khri pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid ni rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing /de bzhin du sbyar te/sgyu mo'i ngo bo nyid dang /smig rgyu dang /brag co dang //
205a7(khri pa): mig yor dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de
205b1(khri pa): bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor de bzhin du ga
205b2(khri pa): mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi
205b3(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di/
205b4(khri pa): ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnos pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/
205b5(khri pa): rab 'byor de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
205b6(khri pa): pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cod mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i
205b7(khri pa): phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing /rab 'byor de bzhin du
206a1(khri pa): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
206a2(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par
206a3(khri pa): 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de bzhin du sbyar te/mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod
206a4(khri pa): pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
206a5(khri pa): ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin/de bzhin du sbyar te/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
206a6(khri pa): nyid kyi bar ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di
206a7(khri pa): ltar nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong zhing /de ltar de bzhin du sbyar te/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
206b1(khri pa): stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la nges par 'byung bar
206b2(khri pa): 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
206b3(khri pa): pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong
206b4(khri pa): pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
206b5(khri pa): dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i
206b6(khri pa): phyir zhe na/'di ltar de bzhin du sbyar te/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing //
206b7(khri pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de bzhin du sbyar te/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar byang ba
207a1(khri pa): nyid ni/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du snar te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jig
207a2(khri pa): pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i bar dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par bstan pa kho na
207a3(khri pa): bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni/dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa skye ba
207a4(khri pa): 'dod du zad do//de bzhin du sbyar te/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni rang sangs rgyas dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
207a5(khri pa): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skye bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin du sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo
207a6(khri pa): nyid ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar
207a7(khri pa): dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong /de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid na rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong /de bzhin
207b1(khri pa): gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de
207b2(khri pa): ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni lan cig
207b3(khri pa): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad
207b4(khri pa): ngo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin du sbyar te/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par ji skad du bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan
207b5(khri pa): nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni med la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par
207b6(khri pa): 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni brda dang tha snyad dang /btags pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar ming gi stong pa nyid gang
207b7(khri pa): yin pa de ni khams gsum nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar
208a1(khri pa): ming gi stong pa nyid ni ming gi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nas/de bzhin du sbyar te/btags pa'i chos kyi stong pa nyid kyi bar ni btags pa'i chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis
208a2(khri pa): stong pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges pararo 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni skye ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du
208a3(khri pa): zad do//de ltar de bzhin du sbyar te/rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni 'gag pa med pa dang /mtshan ma med
208a4(khri pa): pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la nges par 'byung bar 'dod du zad do//de bzhin du sbyar te//
208a5(khri pa): ming gi skabs su ji skad du bstan pa de kho na bzhin du rgya cher sbyar bar bya ste/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po ni khams gsum nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
208a6(khri pa): nyid ga la ba der nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing der yang mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis gnas so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u zhes
208a7(khri pa): bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor khyod 'di skad
208b1(khri pa): du theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni/rab 'byor theg pa de ni gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar gnas pa dmigs su
208b2(khri pa): med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni mi gnas pa ste/'on kyang theg pa de ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor dper na chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa'ang ma
208b3(khri pa): yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin te/le'u gong mar ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin
208b4(khri pa): du rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o//rab 'byor dper na skye ba med pa ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de bzhin du theg pa de ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas
208b5(khri pa): pa'ang ma yin no//de bzhin du sbyar te/'gag pa med pa dang mtshan ma med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa
208b6(khri pa): ni gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa de'ang gnas pa'ang ma yin/mi gnas pa'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
208b7(khri pa): chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni gnas pa'ang ma yin mi gnas pa'ang ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid ni chos kyi dbyings
209a1(khri pa): kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nas/de bzhin du sbyar te/mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i bar gyi ngo bo nyid ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/
209a2(khri pa): rab 'byor rnam grangs des na theg pa de ni gang du'ang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/de'ang mi gnas par gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis so//yang rab 'byor gang 'di skad du theg
209a3(khri pa): pa des su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni rab 'byor theg pa des su'ang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rabo 'byor 'di ltar theg pa
209a4(khri pa): gang yin pa de dang /gang nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /gong du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//de ltar
209a5(khri pa): chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs na/chos gang zhig gis su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/gang du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/de ci'i phyir zhe no/rab 'byor 'di
209a6(khri pa): ltar bdag dang de bzhin du sbyar te/shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir bdag gtan mi dmigs so//de bzhin du sems can dang /skye
209a7(khri pa): ba po nas de bzhin du sbyar te/shes pa po dang mthong ba po'i bar du gtan mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings mi dmigs
209b1(khri pa): so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so//yang dag pa'i mtha' mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings
209b2(khri pa): mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/phung po dang khams mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir khams dang skye mched rnams me dmigs so//de bzhin
209b3(khri pa): du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha
209b4(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu
209b5(khri pa): rnam par dag pa'i phyir/nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//de bzhin du sbyar te/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs
209b6(khri pa): so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi dmigs so//de bzhin du sbyar te/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan
209b7(khri pa): lag brgyad pa'i bar mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/rgyun du zhugs pa mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong
210a1(khri pa): ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
210a2(khri pa): mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/lan cig
210a3(khri pa): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi dmigs
210a4(khri pa): so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa
210a5(khri pa): med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /mngon par 'du byed pa med pa mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi
210a6(khri pa): mtha' mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' dang da ltar mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba dang /mi 'gro/
210a7(khri pa): ba dang /gnas pa dang /skye ba mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/'grib pa dang /'phel ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//ci zhig dmigs
210b1(khri pa): su med pas mi dmigs she na/chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/chos kyi dbyings ni sus kyang mi
210b2(khri pa): dmigs mi dmigs gang gis kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de bzhin du sbyar te/chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang /de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir
210b3(khri pa): dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang /stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi dmigs so//nang
210b4(khri pa): stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir mi dmigs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bor du dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so//de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
210b5(khri pa): dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so//de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa dmigs su med pas
210b6(khri pa): mi dmigs so//de bzhin du sbyar te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar du dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so//de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dmigs su
210b7(khri pa): med pas mi dmigs so//de bzhin du sbyar te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so//de bzhin du skye ba med pa dmigs
211a1(khri pa): su med pas mi dmigs so//shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i bar du dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir rlon/ra
211a2(khri pa): 'di ltar shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so//de bzhin du sa dang po dmigs su med pas mi dmigs so//shin tu
211a3(khri pa): rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su mi dmigs so//de la sa bcu po dag grang zhe na/'di lta ste/dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang /rigs kyi sa dang //
211a4(khri pa): brgyad pa'i sa dang /mthong ba'i sa dang /bsrabs pa'i sa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang /bya ba byas pa'i sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /byang chub
211a5(khri pa): sems dpa'i sa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa nyid ni bcu pa'o//de la nang stong pa nyid la sa dang po dmigs su med do//de bzhin du gnyis pa dang //
211a6(khri pa): gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang lnga pa dang /drug pa dang bdun pa dang /brgyad pa dang /dgu pa dang /bcu pa dmigs su med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/shin tu rnam par
211a7(khri pa): dag pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las dang po dmigs su med pa nas/shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du dmigs su med do//
211b1(khri pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sa dang po ni sus kyang ma dmigs mi dmigs te/gang gis kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba dang /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sa bcu pa'i bar du sus
211b2(khri pa): kyang ma dmigs mi dmigs la/gang gis kyang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la sems can yongs su smin
211b3(khri pa): par bya ba mi dmigs pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
211b4(khri pa): phyir nang stong pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba mi dmigs pa nas/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba
211b5(khri pa): mi dmigs so//de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid la mig lnga mi dmigs pa nas/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mig lnga mi dmigs
211b6(khri pa): so//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen
211b7(khri pa): pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces
212a1(khri pa): gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges
212a2(khri pa): par 'byung bar 'gyur lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na/theg pa chen po de ni nam
212a3(khri pa): mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/dper na nam mkha' la ni 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang /gnas pa mi mngon lags so//de bzhin du theg pa chen po de la'ang 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang /
212a4(khri pa): gnas pa mi mngon lags so//dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs shing /phyi ma'i mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs lags so//de bzhin du theg pa de la'ang
212a5(khri pa): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' dang /dbus mi dmigs te/dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pas de'i slad du theg pa de ni theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o//de
212a6(khri pa): skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa bzhin te/theg
212a7(khri pa): ba de ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/des na theg pa chen pos lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab
212b1(khri pa): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa de ni 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/smyon pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu/
212b2(khri pa): phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/rab 'byor
212b3(khri pa): do ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po ni
212b4(khri pa): 'di lta ste//nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
212b5(khri pa): poni 'di lta ste/gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad de 'di lta ste/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /de bzhin
212b6(khri pa): du sbyar te/nam mkha' ltar chags pa med cing rnam par grol la gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dag yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
212b7(khri pa): dpe'i chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /de bzhin
213a1(khri pa): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yin no///
213a2(khri pa): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa/bam po bcu gsum pa//yang rab 'byor 'di skad du theg pa de ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rte
213a3(khri pa): zil gyis mnan nas/nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa la/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten de gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'dod pa'i khams
213a4(khri pa): dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams so//rab 'byor gal te 'dod pa'i khams de bzhin du 'gyur te/ma nor ba dang /gzhan ma yin pa dang /
213a5(khri pa): phyin ci ma log pa dang /yang dag pa dang /bden pa dang /ji lta ba bzhin dang /rtag pa dang /brtan pa dang /ther zug dang /mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/dngos
213a6(khri pa): po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab
213a7(khri pa): 'byor gang gi phyir 'dod pa'i khams ni brtags pa/rnam par bsgrubs pa tshig gis bstan pa ste/mi rtag mi brtan zhing ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can yin te//
213b1(khri pa): dngos po med pa'i bar du yin pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung ngo //rab 'byor /
213b2(khri pa): bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams nas de bzhin du gyur te/ma nor ba dang /gzhan ma yin pa dang /phyin ci ma log pa dang /yang dag pa dang bden pa
213b3(khri pa): dang /ji lta ba bzhin dang /rtag pa dang /brtan pa dang /ther zug dang /mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog
213b4(khri pa): 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs rang
213b5(khri pa): pa'i khams ni brtags pa/rnam par bsgrubs pa/tshig gis bstan pa ste/de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing ther zug ma yin lo 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg
213b6(khri pa): pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung ngo //rab 'byor gal te gzugs de bzhin du gyur to//man
213b7(khri pa): ba dang /gzhan ma yin pa dang /phyin ci ma log pa dang /yang dag pa dang /bden pa dang ji lta ba bzhin dang /thams cad rtag pa dang /brtan pa dang /ther zug dang /mi 'gyur
214a1(khri pa): pa'i chos can yin la/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges
214a2(khri pa): par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir gzugs ni brtags pa/rnam par bsgrubs pa/tshig gis bstan pa ste/de thams cad mi rtag mi brtan zhing thar
214a3(khri pa): zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i chos can te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan
214a4(khri pa): nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la'ang gzugs la ji ltar sbyar ba bzhin du bya'o//
214a5(khri pa): de bzhin du mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid dang /de bzhin du gzugs kyi skye mched dang /sgra'i skye mched dang /dri'o skye mched dang /ro'i skye
214a6(khri pa): mched dang /reg bya'i skye mched dang /chos kyi skye mched dang /de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /de bzhin du mig gis 'dus te reg pa nas yod kyi bar dang /de
214a7(khri pa): bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nas/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar du ma nor ba dang /gzhan ma yin pa dang /phyin ci ma log/
214b1(khri pa): pa dang /yang dag pa dang /bden pa dang /ji lta ba bzhin dang /rtag pa dang /brtan pa dang /ther zug dang /mi 'gyur ba'i chos can yin la dngos po med pa ma yInA na ni/theg
214b2(khri pa): pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi drang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir yid kyi
214b3(khri pa): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i bar ni brtags pa/rnam par bsgrubs pa/tshig gis bstan pa ste/de thams cad mi rtag mi brtun zhing ther zug ma yin la 'gyur ba'i
214b4(khri pa): chos can gyi bar du yin te/dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges
214b5(khri pa): par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang /lha
214b6(khri pa): ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges por 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gis phyir chos kyi dbyings ni dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg
214b7(khri pa): pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du sbyar te/rab 'byor
215a1(khri pa): de bzhin nyid dngos po zhig yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin la/de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dngos po yin te//
215a2(khri pa): dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges por 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba
215a3(khri pa): zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa rab
215a4(khri pa): mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yin
215a5(khri pa): te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rteni zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur
215a6(khri pa): ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
215a7(khri pa): rten zil gyis mnano nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson
215b1(khri pa): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po theg pa
215b2(khri pa): rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
215b3(khri pa): pa nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
215b4(khri pa): mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te nang stong pa nyid nas/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin
215b5(khri pa): na ni/theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mo dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang
215b6(khri pa): gi phyir nang stong pa nyid nas/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
215b7(khri pa): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dngos pa yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni//
216a1(khri pa): theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor
216a2(khri pa): gang gi phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dngos po med pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis
216a3(khri pa): mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang
216a4(khri pa): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
216a5(khri pa): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
216a6(khri pa): zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag dngos po med pas de'i phyir
216a7(khri pa): theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yan du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te rigs
216b1(khri pa): kyi chos dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par
216b2(khri pa): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir rigs kyi chos dngos po med pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
216b3(khri pa): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du gal te brgyad pa'i chos rnams dang /rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang /
216b4(khri pa): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang /dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /byang chub sems
216b5(khri pa): dpa'i chos rnams dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dngos po yin te dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang
216b6(khri pa): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
216b7(khri pa): kyo bar du dngos po med pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar
217a1(khri pa): 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te rigs kyi sa'i gang zag rnams dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha nga
217a2(khri pa): mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir rigs kyi sa'i gang zag rnams dngos po
217a3(khri pa): med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin
217a4(khri pa): du brgyad pa'i gang zag dang /rgyun du zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems
217a5(khri pa): dpa' dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gang zag dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma
217a6(khri pa): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi phyir brgyad pa'i gang zag dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
217a7(khri pa): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gang zag gi bar du dngos po med pas/de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin/
217b1(khri pa): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po yin te/dngos po
217b2(khri pa): med pa ma yin na ni/theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mo dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na//
217b3(khri pa): rab 'byor gang gi phyir lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dngos po med pas de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas
217b4(khri pa): pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung
217b5(khri pa): ste/byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar skabs der sems gang dang gang dag bskyed pa de dag thams cad dngos po yin te/dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/theg
217b6(khri pa): pa chen po theg pa rab mchog 'di lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/rab 'byor gang gi
