377a7(khri pa): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig rten rnams kyi rten yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang
377b1(khri pa): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po 'di lta ste/sbyin pa dang /snyan par smra ba dang /don spyod pa dang /don mthun pas sems can rnams sa rna//
377b2(khri pa): sems can de dag nyid la gzugs ni mam kha'i tshul can du chos ston to//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni ma
377b3(khri pa): mkha'i tshul can du chos ston to//de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du na mo mkha'i tshul can du chos ston to//gzhan
377b4(khri pa): yang ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni stong pa nyid de/de ni gang nas kyang 'ang ba me la/gang du'ang 'gro ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston to//de bzhin du ma 'ongs
377b5(khri pa): pa'i tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni stong pa nyid de/de ni grang nas kyang 'od bra med la glang du'ang 'gro
377b6(khri pa): ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston to//de bzhin du sbyar te/ma 'ongs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni stong pa nyid de/de ni gang nas kyang
377b7(khri pa): 'ong ba med la/gang du'ang 'gro ba med par sems can rnams la chos ston te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag 'jig
378a1(khri pa): rten rnams kyi rkyen yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams rlung ni stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma myung pa dang /smyon pa med pa tshul can to//dang
378a2(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul dri las mi 'dra' ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang //
378a3(khri pa): smon pa med pa dag la ni 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba tsa'ang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor cho so thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i tshul can te/byang
378a4(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de lngas ma dra'o//rab 'byor skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang
378a5(khri pa): rnam par byang ba med pa dag la ni 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba ci'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de ltar gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/chos thams dad ni skye ba med pa dang /
378a6(khri pa): 'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul can te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri dag kyang tshul
378a7(khri pa): de las mi 'da'o//rab 'byor skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dag la ni 'gro ba'am/
378b1(khri pa): 'ong ba ci'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /chu zla dang /rmi lam dang /mig yor dang /brag ca dang /sprul pa'i tshul can//
378b2(khri pa): te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /chu zla dang /rmi lam dang /
378b3(khri pa): mig yor+ya dang /brag ca dang /sprul pa dag la ni 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba ci'ang mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dbri ba med pa dang /bsnan pa
378b4(khri pa): med pa'i tshul can te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dbri ba med pa dang /bsnan
378b5(khri pa): pa med pa'i tshul can la ni 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba ci'ang mi dmigaswa pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni ma 'ongs pa'i tshul can te/byang chub sems dpa'
378b6(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o//dri ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor mi 'ongs pa'i tshul can la ni 'gro ba'am/'ong ba ci'ang mi dmigs pa'i
378b7(khri pa): phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/chos thams cad ni blang du med pa dang /dor du med pa'i bar gyi tshul can te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
379a1(khri pa): de dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor blang du med pa dang /dor du med pa la ni 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba ci'ang rmya
379a2(khri pa): dmyigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'dri ba med pa'i tshul can te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de lus mi 'do'o//
379a3(khri pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'dro ba med pa la 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba ci'ang dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'i tshul can te/
379a4(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri dag kyang tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor bdag la ni 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba ci'ang mi dmigs
379a5(khri pa): po'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de ltar na gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/chos thams cad ni sems can med pa dang /skye ba po med pa dang /srog med pa dang /gso ba myemed pa
379a6(khri pa): dang /gang zag med pa dang /shed las skyes pa med po dang /shed bu med pa dang /slong ba po med pa dang /kun nas slong ba po med pa dang /byed pa po med
379a7(khri pa): pa dang /byed du 'jug pa po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po med pa'i tshul can te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang tshul de las
379b1(khri pa): mi'ajug//nga ci'i phyir zhon/rab 'byor bya dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa dang /de bzhin du sems can+da dang /srog dang /gso pa dang /glang zug dang /nga /
379b2(khri pa): las skyes pa dang /shid bu dang /slong po bo dang /kun+d+ra nas slong ba po dang /byed pa po dang /byed du 'jug pa po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong bu bo med cing mi migs
379b3(khri pa): phyir ro//rab 'byong gzhan yang chos thams cad ni rtag pa dang /mi rtag pa'i tshul can no//rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni bde ba'i tshul rgyun+da dang /sdug
379b4(khri pa): pa'i tshul ngan dong /bdag gi tshul can dang /bdag med de'i tshul can dang /snang ba'i tshul pon+ta da /mi sbyong ba'i tshul rgyun dang /mtshani ma'i tshum
379b5(khri pa): da rnaMm ming 'i chu yin dang /na kyi tshul can dang /sbyin pa med pa'i tshul can do/TI ba'i tshul can dang /dben pa tshul can dang /kAn+da nAs
379b6(khri pa): sbyin mangs pa'i rdul chen dang /rnam par byung ba'i tshul chen dang /d+hI tshul can dang /ba myed pa'i tshul nan dang /'gug pa'i ldan dngag
379b7(khri pa): meng pa'i tshul can dang /dnges pa'i tshul tshon dang /dngangom po meng pa'i tshul can dang /ga pa'i tshul can dang /mi sdug pa'i tshul cani tshul de las mi 'dra'o//
380a1(khri pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rtag pa dang /bde ba dang /bdag dang /sdug pa'i bar du gtan med cing mi dmigs te/de'i phyir de dag gi 'gro ba/
380a2(khri pa): 'am 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi gzhi can dang /zhe sdang gi gzhi can dang /gti mug gi gauzhi can te/tshul
380a3(khri pa): de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'dod chags kyi gzhi dang /zhe sdang gi gzhi dang /gti mug gi gzhi gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dag gi 'gro
380a4(khri pa): ba'am/'ong ba lca ga la yod pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa'i gzhi can te/tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor lte
380a5(khri pa): ba'i rnam pa'i gzhi gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dog gi 'gro ba'am/'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni de bzhin
380a6(khri pa): nyid kyi tshul can dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul can dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshul can+da dang /mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul can dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
380a7(khri pa): dbyings kyi tshul can te/tshul de las mi 'da'o//da ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /chos
380b1(khri pa): mnyam pa nyid dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gtan med cing mi du myigs na/de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos
380b2(khri pa): thams cad ni g.yo ba med pa'i tshul can te/tshul de las mi 'dra'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gang 'gro ba 'am/'ong bar 'gyur ba'i g.yo ba nyid gang yang med
380b3(khri pa): cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi tshul can no//rab 'byor de bzhin du cho sa thams cad ni tshor ba'i tshul can dang /'du shes
380b4(khri pa): kyi tshul can dang /'du byed kyi tshul can dang /rnam par shes pa'i tshul can te/tshul de las mi 'da'o//dri ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor gzugs med cing mi
380b5(khri pa): dmigs pa dang /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigasu na/de dog gi 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba
380b6(khri pa): lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sbyin pa'i tshul can te/tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sbyin pa gtan
380b7(khri pa): med cing mi dmigs na/de'i sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa lta ga la yod/rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni tshul khri mos kyi tshul can dang /bzod pa'i
381a1(khri pa): rgyul can dang /brtson 'grus kyi tshul can dang /bsam gtan gyi tshul can dang /shes rab kyi tshul can+da te/tshul de las mi 'da'o//de /
381a2(khri pa): phyir zhe na/rab 'byor tshul khrims dang /bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dag gi tshul khrims
381a3(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
381a4(khri pa): pa lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni nang stong pa nyid kyi tshul can te/tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor nang stong
381a5(khri pa): pa nyid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi tshul
381a6(khri pa): can dang /de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi tshul can te/tshul do las mi 'dra'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
381a7(khri pa): nyid stong pa nyid ni gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dag gi 'gro ba'am/'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dran pa nye bar bzhag
381b1(khri pa): pa'i tshul can no//rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/chos thams cad ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyi tshul can te/tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
381b2(khri pa): rab 'byor 'phrugs pa'i lom yan lag brgyad pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba lta grwa la yod pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du chos
381b3(khri pa): thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i tshul can no//rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyor te/chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi
381b4(khri pa): tshul can te/tshul de las mi 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dag gi 'gro ba 'am//
381b5(khri pa): 'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i tshul can no//rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad ni lan cig phyir
381b6(khri pa): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ang ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid drang /rang spangs rgyas kyi tshulnga can te/tshul de lngas mu 'da'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab
381b7(khri pa): 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gtan med cing mi dmigs pa dang /de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dong /dgra bcom pa
382a1(khri pa): nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas nyid med cing mi dmigs na/de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos
382a2(khri pa): thams cad ni/bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshul can te/tshul de las mi 'dra'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
382a3(khri pa): pa'i byang chub gtan med cing mi dmigs na/de dag gi 'gro ba 'am/'ong ba lta ga la yod pa'i phyir ro//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe
382a4(khri pa): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab mo 'di la su dag mngon par yid ches shing
382a5(khri pa): mos par 'gyur logs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sngon bla na med pa yang dag par
382a6(khri pa): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu spyod pa spyad pa dag dang /sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogaso pa'i sangs rgyas dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba
382a7(khri pa): dge bskyed pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ro//gsol
382b1(khri pa): pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur//
382b2(khri pa): ba de dag gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid de ci 'dra ba zhig tu 'gyur lags/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi rtags ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags/mtshan ma ni ci
382b3(khri pa): 'dra ba zhig/dbyibs ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
382b4(khri pa): phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba dri dag gi sems kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dul ba yin no//rab 'byor
382b5(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni 'dod chags
382b6(khri pa): dong /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi rtags dang /mtshan ma dang /dbyibs kyi dben pa dag tu 'gyur ro//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub
382b7(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag ji lta bu'i tshul can
383a1(khri pa): du 'gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
383a2(khri pa): phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par yid ches shing mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni tham so cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can du 'gyur ro//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan
383a3(khri pa): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dge 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchi sdu pa bsgom pa dag ni//
383a4(khri pa): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul can du 'gyur lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/chos thams cad
383a5(khri pa): rnam par 'jig pa lags la/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'ang 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di lags
383a6(khri pa): so//bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad gang dag rnam par 'jig pa yin/gsol pa/'di lta
383a7(khri pa): ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa dang /nang gi
383b1(khri pa): skye mched drug dang /phyi'i skye mched drug dang /khams bco brgyad rnam par 'jig pa lags so//de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni///
383b2(khri pa): bdag dang /sems con dang /skye ba po dang /srog dang /gso ba dang /gang zag dang /shed las skyes dang /shed bu dang /byed pa po dang /byed du 'jug pa po dang /slong ba po dang //
383b3(khri pa): kun nas slong ba po dang /tshor ba po dang /tshor bar byed pa po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po rnam par 'jig pa lags so//de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol
383b4(khri pa): tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
383b5(khri pa): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa lags so//de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/nang
383b6(khri pa): stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid nas/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa lags so//de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
383b7(khri pa): pa bsgom pa de na/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang
384a1(khri pa): lam rnams rnam par 'jig pa lags so//de bzhin du sbyar te/'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
384a2(khri pa): pa bco brgyad kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa lags so//de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig
384a3(khri pa): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub rnam par 'jig pa lags so//de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes
384a4(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom po de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam par 'jig pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
384a5(khri pa): de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pho rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gzugs rnam par 'jig pa'o//de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes
384a6(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi
384a7(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni mig rnam par 'jig pa yin no//de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa da ni rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus
384b1(khri pa): dang /yid rnam par 'jig pa yin no//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/gzugs rnams rnam par 'jig pa yin no//de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes
384b2(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams rnam par 'jig pa yin no//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
384b3(khri pa): pa de ni mig gi khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no//de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
384b4(khri pa): khams rnam par 'jig pa yin no//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/rna ba'i khams dang /sgra'i khams dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
384b5(khri pa): rnam par 'jig pa yin no//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/sna'i khams dang /dri'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par
384b6(khri pa): 'jig pa yin no//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/lce'i khams dang /ro'i khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig
384b7(khri pa): pa yin no//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po bsgom pa de ni lus kyi khams dang /reg bya'i khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par 'jig
385a1(khri pa): pa yin no//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi khams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam
385a2(khri pa): par 'jig pa yin no//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par 'jig pa yin no//de bzhin du sbyar te/'di lta ste/
385a3(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du rnam par 'jig pa yin no//'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
385a4(khri pa): bsgom pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'jig pa yin no//de bzhin du sbyar te/'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
385a5(khri pa): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du rnam par 'jig pa yin no//de bzhin du 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad shes pa nyid dang /
385a6(khri pa): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'jig pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor
385a7(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus
385b1(khri pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las phyir mi
385b2(khri pa): ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpas nye bar brtag par bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob mo 'di la mngon paro zhe na
385b3(khri pa): par mi byed do//de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol
385b4(khri pa): tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen par mi byed do//de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par zhen par
385b5(khri pa): mi byed do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni/shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po zab mo 'di la spyod pa na/gzhon gyis smras pa'i tshig dag la snying po med
385b6(khri pa): pa dang /de kho na ma yin par khong du chud par byed de/gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro'o//'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /mtshungs par ldan pa'i
385b7(khri pa): sems dang /sems las byung ba'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la ni/shes rab kyi pha
386a1(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu
386a2(khri pa): phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin po dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//byang chub
386a3(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la lo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'od la spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid thos nas mi skrag mI dngang
386a4(khri pa): zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur la/mi zhum mi 'grong ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yid phyir ldog par mi 'gyur la/shes rab kyi pha rol
386a5(khri pa): tu phyin pa zab mo nyan par mngon par dga' zhing /thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed/'chang bar byed/kun chub par byed pa nas/tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i
386a6(khri pa): bar du byed pa dang /de bzhin du bsgrub par byed pa na/byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par rig par bya ste/byang chubo sems
386a7(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing yongs su dri ba byas pa dang /bzung ba dang /kun chub par byas
386b1(khri pa): pa nas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byas pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
386b2(khri pa): 'dri 'chad pa na/mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur la/mi zhum mi 'gong ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las de'i yid phyir ldog par mi 'gyur
386b3(khri pa): ba'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin par byed/'chang bar byed/kun chub par byed pa nas tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i bar du byed pa'i phyir ro//
386b4(khri pa): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe drang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
386b5(khri pa): zab mo 'di 'chad pa na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dang ngo bar mi 'gyur la/mi zhum mi 'gong ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang yid phyir ldog par
386b6(khri pa): mi 'gyur ba'i steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin par bgyid pa nas/tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i bar du bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
386b7(khri pa): dpa' chen po des/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ji ltar spyad par bgyi lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
387a1(khri pa): gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis spyad par bya'o//gsol pa/ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis spyad par bgyi lcags//
387a2(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/stong po nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang /de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i sems
387a3(khri pa): kyi rgyud kyis spyad par bya'o//de bzhin du nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon
387a4(khri pa): myongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang /de bzhin du de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang /de bzhin du de bzhin
387a5(khri pa): nyid la gzhol ba dang /chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba dang /chos mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang /bsam
387a6(khri pa): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gazlol ba'i sems kyi rgyud dang /de bzhin du sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /chu zla dang /rmi lam dang /mig yor dang /breg ca dang /
387a7(khri pa): sprul pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyad par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la/
387b1(khri pa): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang //
387b2(khri pa): smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /chu zla dang /mi
387b3(khri pa): lim dang /mig yor dang /brag ca dang /sprul pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyis shrIs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po zab mo 'di la spyod na/btsun pa bcom ldan
387b4(khri pa): 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gzugs la spyod pa lags sam/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par
387b5(khri pa): shes pa la spyod pa lags sam/de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
387b6(khri pa): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob mo 'di la spyod pa ni gzugs la spyod pa ma yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang //
387b7(khri pa): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa la spyod pa ma yin no//rab 'byor de bzhin du sbyar te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
388a1(khri pa): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa ma yin no//rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ni sus kyang ma
388a2(khri pa): byas 'gyur bar yang ma byas/gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/gang du'ang ma spong /gang la'ang mo gnas/yul na'ang mi go nas/phyogs na'ang mi gonas te/de la ni grangs
388a3(khri pa): dang /rtsis kyang mi gnas mi dmigs so//gang la grangs dang /rtsis mi dmigs pa de ni sus kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/gzugs sam tshor ba
388a4(khri pa): 'am/'du shes sam/'du byed rnams sam/rnam par shes pa 'am/sbyin pa 'am/tshul khrims sam/bzod pa 'am/brtson 'grus sam/bsam gtan dag gam//
388a5(khri pa): shes rab bam/de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar gyis kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs
388a6(khri pa): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid yin lnga/de bzhin du tshwar ba dang /de bzhin du 'du shes dang /de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang /de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid
388a7(khri pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
388b1(khri pa): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
388b2(khri pa): yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
388b3(khri pa): bco brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi dri bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin/de bzhin
388b4(khri pa): du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /lamr-i gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i
388b5(khri pa): de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las bsgom pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o////de nas 'dod pa na
388b6(khri pa): spyod pa dang /gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dag gis lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dag dang /rgya spos dang /ta la'i lo ma'i phye ma dag dang /lha'i ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu ta dang /
388b7(khri pa): pad+ma dkar po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
389a1(khri pa): btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan/
389a2(khri pa): 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni rtogs par dka' ba/brtag par mi nus pa/rtog ge'i spyod pa ma lags pa/zhi ba zhib mo brtags pa'i
389a3(khri pa): mkhas pa dang /shes pas rig par bgyi ba lags pa dang /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir spangs rgyas bcom ldan
389a4(khri pa): 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa legs te/'di ltar gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/rnam pa thams
389a5(khri pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs so//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /de bzhin du 'du shes dang /de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang /de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa
389a6(khri pa): thams cod mkhyen pa nyid do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par shes pa ste/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
389a7(khri pa): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang
389b1(khri pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so//'di ltar
389b2(khri pa): mig nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mig lags so//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid
389b3(khri pa): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lugs la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid lags te/mig gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
389b4(khri pa): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid grang lcags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid do/gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so//de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /
389b5(khri pa): dang /lus dang /yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/gnyis
389b6(khri pa): su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so//'di ltar gzugs rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs
389b7(khri pa): rnams lags so//de bzhin du sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
390a1(khri pa): chos rnams lags so//'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags
390a2(khri pa): pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer mu mchis so//de bzhin du mig gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
390a3(khri pa): ljags la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mig gi khams lags te/maugo gri de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
390a4(khri pa): nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid dri ni gcig pa nyid de/gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so//'di ltar gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam
390a5(khri pa): par shes pa'i khams dang /rna ba'i khams dang /sgra'i khams dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /sna'i khams dang /dri'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par
390a6(khri pa): shes pa'i khams dang /lce'i khams dang /ro'i khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lus kyi khams dang /reg bya'i khams drang /lus kyi rnam
390a7(khri pa): par shes pa'i khams dang /yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi khams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/rnam
390b1(khri pa): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams lags te/de ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /rnam pa thams
390b2(khri pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so//de bzhin du 'di ltar dran pa
390b3(khri pa): nye bar bzhag pa rnams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams lags so//de bzhin du yang
390b4(khri pa): dag par spong ba gang lags pa dag dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /de bzhin du sbyar
390b5(khri pa): te/'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thums cad mkhyen pa nyid lags la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
390b6(khri pa): pa lpags te/de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de
390b7(khri pa): bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang dag lags pa nyid
391a1(khri pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags lnga/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang lags pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu lags so//de bzhin
391a2(khri pa): du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa'i de bzhin
391a3(khri pa): nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'dri skad ces
391a4(khri pa): bka' stsal to//lha dag de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yin la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzugs
391a5(khri pa): yin no//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /de bzhin du 'du shes dang /de bzhin du 'du byed rnams dang /de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
391a6(khri pa): yin la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par shes pa yin te/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
391a7(khri pa): yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
391b1(khri pa): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid do/gnyis su med cing
391b2(khri pa): gnyis sgra dbyer med do//de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos mo 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
391b3(khri pa): kye de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de/gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//lha dag don gyi dbang 'di yang dag par gzugs pa'i
391b4(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ni thugs kyi phrin las chung bra la gzhol bar mjed kyi tshe sna ston pa la ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha dag kye mchos 'di ni zab ste/
391b5(khri pa): mthong bar dka' ba/rtags par dka' ba/brtag par mi nus pa/zhib mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang /mdzangs pas rig par bya ba yin te/'di lta ste/shes rab
391b6(khri pa): kyipha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bstan pa de ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa yin te/de ni sus kyang mngon
391b7(khri pa): par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/gang las kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/gang du'ang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te/lha dag 'di
392a1(khri pa): gang la gnyis kun tu rgyu ba'ang med pa'i chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro//lha dag nam mkha' zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha/
392a2(khri pa): dngagra de bzhin du de bzhin nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /chos kyi dbyings zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
392a3(khri pa): dbyings zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /mtha' yas shing mthar thug pa med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /'ong ba med pa dang /'gro ba med po zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /skye ba mod pa dang /
392a4(khri pa): 'gog pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha dag de bzhin du bdag zab pa nyid kyi
392a5(khri pa): phyir dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha dag dri bzhin du gzugs zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//de
392a6(khri pa): bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha dag de bzhin du mig zab pa nyid kyi
392a7(khri pa): phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha dag de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha dag gzugs rnams zab
392b1(khri pa): pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha dag de bzhin du sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha dag de bzhin du mig gi/
392b2(khri pa): khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//rna ba'i khams dang /sgra'i khams dang /rna ba'i rnam
392b3(khri pa): par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'dri zab bo//lha dag de bzhin du sna'i khams dang /dri'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi
392b4(khri pa): phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha dag de bzhin du lce'i khams dang /ro'i khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha dge lus
392b5(khri pa): kyi khams dang /reg bya'i khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyi ri chos 'di zab bo//lha dag yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi khams dang /
392b6(khri pa): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha dag de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /tshul khrims kyi pha
392b7(khri pa): rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
393a1(khri pa): zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha dag de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong
393a2(khri pa): pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' lus 'das
393a3(khri pa): pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang
393a4(khri pa): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
393a5(khri pa): nyid zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha dag de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir dang /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi
393a6(khri pa): rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha dag de
393a7(khri pa): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha dag de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du zab pa
393b1(khri pa): nyid kyi phyir dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa nyid kyi phyir chos 'di zab bo//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
393b2(khri pa): 'di skad ces gsol to//kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i chos 'di bstan to//de ci'i slad du zhe na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
393b3(khri pa): chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa
393b4(khri pa): gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/de bzhin du mig gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/de bzhin
393b5(khri pa): du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/gzugs rnams gzung ba'am/mi gzung bar
393b6(khri pa): bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/de bzhin du sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos rnams gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/
393b7(khri pa): de bzhin du mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags//
394a1(khri pa): de bzhin du sna'i khams dang /dri'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/ma gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma
394a2(khri pa): lags/lce'i khams dang /ro'i khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/lus kyi khams
394a3(khri pa): dang /reg bya'i khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma legs/yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi
394a4(khri pa): khams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzung
394a5(khri pa): pa'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
394a6(khri pa): phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/de bzhin
394a7(khri pa): du nang stong pa nyid gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
394b1(khri pa): dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog
394b2(khri pa): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
394b3(khri pa): dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba 'am/mi gzung
394b4(khri pa): bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gzung ba'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/yang dag
394b5(khri pa): par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gzung ba 'am/mi
394b6(khri pa): gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags//
394b7(khri pa): de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o//btsun pa bcom
395a1(khri pa): ldan 'das de bzhin du chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags/lan cig
395a2(khri pa): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba 'am/
395a3(khri pa): mi gzung bar bgyi ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ni bdag gzugs so//de bzhin du bdog tshor ba'o//bdag 'du
395a4(khri pa): shes so//bdag 'du byed rnams so//bdag gi 'du byed rnams so//bdag rnam par shes pa'o//de bzhin du bdag mig go/bdag gi mig go/bdag rna
395a5(khri pa): ba'o//bdag gi rna bro'o//sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyang de bzhin no//de bzhin du bdag cag ni gzugs rnams so//sgra dang /dI dang /ro dang /reg
395a6(khri pa): bya rnams kyang de bzhin no//bridag cag chos rnams so//bdag cig gi chos rnams so//mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par
395a7(khri pa): shes pa'i khams kyang de bzhin no//de bzhin du bdag rna ba'i khams dang /sgra'i khams dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /sna'i khams dang /
395b1(khri pa): dri'i khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lce'i khams dang /ro'i khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lus kyi khams dang /reg
395b2(khri pa): bya'i khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi khams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams so//bdag gi yid
395b3(khri pa): kyi rnam par shes pa'o//de bzhin du bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de bzhin du bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
395b4(khri pa): dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de
395b5(khri pa): bzhin du bdag gi nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /dron dam pa stong pa nyid
395b6(khri pa): dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med
395b7(khri pa): pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos
396a1(khri pa): po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /bdag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
396a2(khri pa): stong pa nyid do//de bzhin du bdag cag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so//bdag cag gi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so//de bzhin du bdag cag yang
396a3(khri pa): dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so//bdag cags
396a4(khri pa): 'phags pa'i lam yan lagra brgyad pa'o//de bzhin du bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'o//de bzhin du sbyar te/bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi
396a5(khri pa): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag //de bzhin du bdag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o//bdag gi rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas/lan cig phyir 'ong
396a6(khri pa): ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa'i bar drag go//bdag rang byang chub bri//bdag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//bdag/
396a7(khri pa): gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /bdag gir 'dzin pa la spyod po lags so////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
396b1(khri pa): phyin pa khri pa/bam po nyi shu gsum pa/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lha dag de de bzhin te/lha dag/
396b2(khri pa): de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/lha dag chos 'dri ni gzugs gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
396b3(khri pa): 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/de bzhin du mig gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa
396b4(khri pa): ma yin/de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/gzugs rnams gzung ba'am/mi
396b5(khri pa): gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/de bzhin du sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /rag bya dang /chos rnams gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/de
396b6(khri pa): bzhin du mig gi khams drang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/de bzhin du
396b7(khri pa): rna ba'i khams dang /sgra'i khams dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa mo yin/sna'i khams dang /dri'i
397a1(khri pa): khams dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/lce'i khams dang /ro'i khams dang
397a2(khri pa): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/lus kyi khams dang /reg bya'i khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes
397a3(khri pa): pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan po mA yin/yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi khams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung
397a4(khri pa): ba'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan po ma yin/de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
397a5(khri pa): dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa
397a6(khri pa): ma yin/de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /dron dam pa stong
397a7(khri pa): pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor
397b1(khri pa): ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po
397b2(khri pa): med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/de bzhin du dran
397b3(khri pa): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gzung ba'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang
397b4(khri pa): po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lagau rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/
397b5(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po bco brgyad kyi bar du
397b6(khri pa): gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin zhing /lha dog chos 'di ni rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gzung ba'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin//
397b7(khri pa): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/
398a1(khri pa): de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba 'am/mi gzung bar bya ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin na/lha dag gang zag
398a2(khri pa): gang dag gzugs gzung ba 'am/sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa gzung ba 'am//
398a3(khri pa): spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so//de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang /de bzhin du tshul
398a4(khri pa): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol
398a5(khri pa): tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so//de bzhin du mig gzung ba 'am/spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /de bzhin du rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid
398a6(khri pa): gzung ba'am/spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /de bzhin du gzugaso rnams dang /sgra rnams dang /dI rnams dang /ro rnams dang /reg bya rnams dang /chos
398a7(khri pa): rnams gzung ba 'am/spong bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /de bzhin du mig gi khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams
398b1(khri pa): gzung ba 'am/spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /de bzhin du rna ba'i khams dang /sgra'i khams dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /sna'i khams dang /dri'i
398b2(khri pa): khams dang /sna'i rnam par shos po'i khams dang /lce'i khams dang /ro'i khams dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /lus kyi khams dang /reg bya'i
398b3(khri pa): khams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /yid kyi khams dang /chos kyi khams dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba 'am/spang bar bya
398b4(khri pa): ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
398b5(khri pa): phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung ba 'am/spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi
398b6(khri pa): stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /tshon po stong pa nyid dang /don dmo pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma
398b7(khri pa): byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang //
399a1(khri pa): rgyas rnams kyad stod nga nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /myi dmigs pa spyong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ba nyid stong pa da/
399a2(khri pa): dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'am/spang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gzung ba 'am/spang ba bya
399a3(khri pa): ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i
399a4(khri pa): la mo yan lag brgyad de'i bar du gzung ba'am/spang byer bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobasdu bcu gzung ba 'am/spung bar bya
399a5(khri pa): ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po bco brgyad kyi bar du gzung ba'am/sbyang bar bya ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag gis ni dran pa
399a6(khri pa): dUr blon go sde bzhi bsgom par mi /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang /dz+nyA 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang ba dang /skyob sa dang /byang chub kyi yan leg
399a7(khri pa): bsgom par mi nus la/de dag gis ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par mi nus/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs po'i skabs bcu dang
399b1(khri pa): bzhin du sbyar te/de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus/de dag gis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom
399b2(khri pa): par mi nus so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang
399b3(khri pa): mthun pa ljags so//ji ltar na chos 'di chos thams cad dang mthun pa lags she na/'di lta ste/chos 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so//
399b4(khri pa): chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so//de bzhin du chos 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so//chos 'di ni bzod
399b5(khri pa): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so//chos 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa lags so//chos 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun pa
399b6(khri pa): lags so//chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang mthun pa nas/chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun po lags sro//chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar
399b7(khri pa): bzhag pa rnams dang mthun pa nas/chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang mthun pa legs so//de bzhin du chos 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
400a1(khri pa): stobs bcu dang mthun pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/chos 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang mthun pa lags so//de bzhin du
400a2(khri pa): chos 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang mthun pa lugs so//de bzhin du chos 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun pa lags so//chos 'di ni phyir mi
400a3(khri pa): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang mthun pa lags so//chos 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang mthun pa logs so//chos 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu dang mthun pa
400a4(khri pa): lags so//chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang mthun pa legs te/chos 'di ni gang du'ang thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so//ji ltar na thogs pa
400a5(khri pa): ma mchis pa lags she na/'di lta ste/gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so//de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam
400a6(khri pa): par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis pa lags so//de bzhin du sbyar te/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mkhra' mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du dang /de bzhin du ches gnas pa/
400a7(khri pa): nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o dbyings kyi slad du dang /de bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi slad du dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
400b1(khri pa): po mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byung ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi skad du/rnam pa thams//
400b2(khri pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid lags so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi skye bo dmigs su ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du dang /de
400b3(khri pa): bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dmyigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
400b4(khri pa): pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/chos 'di skye ba ma mchis pa logs so//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi gan dmigs su ma mchis pa
400b5(khri pa): slad du dang /de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam
400b6(khri pa): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/chos 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs na/
400b7(khri pa): spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos gnas brtan rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes
401a1(khri pa): pa lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang ci ston pa de thams cad stong pa nyid dang ldan
401a2(khri pa): pa dang /stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'brel par ston pa'i slad du'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//lha dag gang 'di skad du
401a3(khri pa): nyan thos gnas brtan rab 'byor ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes pa lags so zhes zer ba lo/gnas brtan rab 'byor gang gi rjes su skyes pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs
401a4(khri pa): pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin/ci re zhig gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su skyes pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin na ni/de bzhin nyid de ni
401a5(khri pa): gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/gang du'ang ma song la/de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/gong du'ang ma song ste/de ltar na ni gnas
401a6(khri pa): brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no//de bzhi ni grashegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de yin zhing //
401a7(khri pa): chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de yin la/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
401b1(khri pa): med pa yin te/de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid grang yin pa de gnas brtan+da rab
401b2(khri pa): 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang de yin te/de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid
401b3(khri pa): gang la'ang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang gang la'ang thogs pa med de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /chos
401b4(khri pa): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa'i de bzhin nyid de ni gcig pa nyid de gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin nyid de ni ma byas pa ste/de ni nam
401b5(khri pa): yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin no//gang gi phyir dri rtag tu de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de'i phyir dri gnyis su med cing /gnyis su dbyer med do/de ltar na gnas
401b6(khri pa): brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mi drad cing bye brag mod la/gnyis su med pa de ltar
401b7(khri pa): gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las
402a1(khri pa): gud na med la/de ni nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin te/de ltararwa na gnas brtan rab 'byor dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir rjes su skyes pa yin no//
402a2(khri pa): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'das pa ma yin/ma 'ongs pa ma yin/da ltar byung ba ma yin la/de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
402a3(khri pa): kyang 'das pa ma yin/ma 'ongs pa ma yin/da ltar byung ba ma yin te/de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa zhes bya'o//'dras pa'i
402a4(khri pa): de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid yin no//ma 'ongs po'i de bzhin nyid ni
402a5(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni ma 'ongs pa'i dri bzhin nyid yin no//da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin
402a6(khri pa): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid yin la/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid yin te/de ltar na 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /nga
402a7(khri pa): ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin du gzugs kyi de
402b1(khri pa): bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs/
402b2(khri pa): pA'i de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin du bdog gi de bzhin nyid nas/shes pa po dang /mthong ba po'i bar gyi de bzhin
402b3(khri pa): nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /
402b4(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis
402b5(khri pa): su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
402b6(khri pa): bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de//de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i
402b7(khri pa): de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin/
403a1(khri pa): nyid dang /de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do//de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin ga shugs
403a2(khri pa): pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid dang /dri bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin nyid de ni/
403a3(khri pa): gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/lha dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis de bzhin nyid gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/de bzhin
403a4(khri pa): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i mtshan thob pa'i chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni 'di yin no//de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di
403a5(khri pa): bshad pa na/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu 'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul lo//ldeg rab tu ldeg/kun
403a6(khri pa): tu rab tu ldeg go/g.yos rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos so//shar phyogs mtho na/nub phyogs dma'o//nub phyogs mtho na/shar phyogs dma'o//byang phyogs
403a7(khri pa): mtho na/lho phyogs dma'o//lho phyogs mtho na/byang phyogs dma'o//mtha' mtho na/dbus dma'o//dbus mtho na/mtha' dma'o//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang
403b1(khri pa): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i tshe lha'i tsan+dan gyi phye ma dag dang /lha'i rgya spos dang /shing ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dag dang /lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku
403b2(khri pa): mu ta dang /pad+ma dkar po dag gris bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang /gnas brtan rab 'byor la gtor/mngon par gtor/mngon par rab tu gtor nas/tshig 'di skad
403b3(khri pa): ces gnas brtan rab 'byor 'dri de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs po'i rjes su skyes pa ni ngo ma tshar lags so zhes smras so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa
403b4(khri pa): rab 'byor gyis gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste/lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//lha dag de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes/gzugs
403b5(khri pa): kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su
403b6(khri pa): ma skyes/rnam par shes po las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad
403b7(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rjes su ma skyes/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid los gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes/
404a1(khri pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/'dus ma byas las
404a2(khri pa): gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes/'dus mi byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha dag 'di ltar gang zhig rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba dang //
404a3(khri pa): gang las skye bar 'gyur ba dang /gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das lo/tshe dang ldan
404a4(khri pa): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /chos gnas pa nyid
404a5(khri pa): dang /chos skyon med pa nyid 'di ni zab lags te/de la ni gzugs dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /de bzhin nyid mi dmigs lags so//bcom
404a6(khri pa): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /
404a7(khri pa): chos gnas pa nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid 'di ni zab ste/de la ni gzugs dang /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so//de la ni tshor ba dang /'du
404b1(khri pa): shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par she sra pa dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so//dri bzhin du sbyar te/dri la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
404b2(khri pa): nyid kyi bar dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin nyid la ni re zhig gzugs nyid kyang mi
404b3(khri pa): dmigs na/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lko ga la dmigs/de bzhin du 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rnam par shes
404b4(khri pa): pa'i de bzhin nyid lta ga la dmigs/de bzhin du sbyar te/re zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang mi dmigs na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin
404b5(khri pa): nyid lta ga la dmigs pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin nyid 'di bshad pa na/dge slong khri nyis stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//dge slong ma
404b6(khri pa): lnga brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so//lha dang mi lnga stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
404b7(khri pa): chen po drug cu ni len pa med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA
405a1(khri pa): radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni sangs rgyas lha brgya la bsnyen bkur byas shing /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
405a2(khri pa): thams cad la dbul ba dag phul te/de dag las rab tu byung nas/tshul khrims bsrungs/bzod pa bskyed/brtson 'grus brtsams/bsam gtan dag bsgrubs mod
405a3(khri pa): kyi/shA ra dwa tI'i bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin cing /thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i
405a4(khri pa): phyir/'du shes sna tshogs po nyid dang /spyod pa tha dad pa nyid du gyur te/de dag ni 'di lta ste/'di ni sbyin pa'o//de bzhin du sbyin pa dag dang /'di ni slong bri'o//
405a5(khri pa): 'di ltar sbyin par bya'o//'di la ni sbyin par bya'o//de bzhin du 'di ni tshul khrims so//bdag cag ni 'di ltar tshul khrims dong ldan pa'o//tshul khrims ni 'dri
405a6(khri pa): ltar bsrung bar bya'o//de bzhin du 'di ni bzod pa'o//bdag cag ni 'di ltar bzod pa dang ldan pa'o//'di ltar bzod pa 'di bskyed par bya'o//de bzhin du 'di ni
405a7(khri pa): brtson 'grus so//bdag cag ni 'di ltar brtson 'gras dang ldan pa'o//'di ltar brtson 'grus 'di brtsam par bya'o//de bzhin du 'di dag ni bsam gtan no//
405b1(khri pa): bdag cag ni 'di ltar bsam gtan pa'o//'di ltar bsam gtan 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam du de lta bu'i 'du shes can dag tu gyur to//de dag gis
405b2(khri pa): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin par sbyin pa dag bya ni/tshul khrims dag bsrungs/bzod pa dag bskyed//
405b3(khri pa): brtson 'grus dag brtsams/bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs te/de dag gis ni 'du shes tha dad pa nyid med pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa lo
405b4(khri pa): 'jug par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes tha dad pa nyid med pa ma thob pas/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la ma zhugs kyi/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob nas//
405b5(khri pa): de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par thar pa'i sgo
405b6(khri pa): stong pa nyid de'ang yod/mtshan ma med pa'ang yod/rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon po med pa'ang yod mod kyi/'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa
405b7(khri pa): dang /thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir/yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byas nas/nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//de skad ces bka' stsal
406a1(khri pa): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun bya bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du nyan thos sam/rang //
406a2(khri pa): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag dag stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos de dag nyid sgom bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs /
406a3(khri pa): sum zin cing /thabs la mkhas pa dang bral te/yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyis nas/nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/byang chub sems
406a4(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos de dag nyid sgom du bas kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su
406a5(khri pa): zin cing /thabs la mkhas pa la brten te/yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bgyis nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
406a6(khri pa): par 'tshang rgya ba lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
406a7(khri pa): la gang zag kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pa dang
406b1(khri pa): bral bar stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos de dag sgom na/nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub
406b2(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas legs par zin pa dang /thabs la mkhas
406b3(khri pa): pa la brten te/snying rje chen po mngon sum du byas nas/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom na/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med
406b4(khri pa): par zhugs nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang na 'ad ba
406b5(khri pa): chags bya 'dab ma med pa lus dpag tshad brgya pa'am/dpag tshad sum brgya pa zhig yod par gyur la/de'ang de na swa dzam+bu gling 'drir 'ong bar sems te/dzam+bu gling du gnas
406b6(khri pa): par bya'o snyam nas/des bdag nyid mchong so la bdag nyid mchongs pa'i 'og tu bar skabs na/de 'di snyam du da ni bdag dzam+bu gling du ma lhung bar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
406b7(khri pa): rnams kyi nang du gnas par bya'o snyam du sems na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ci bya 'dab ma med pa des slar bdag nyid sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang
407a1(khri pa): du gzhag par nus snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang gal
407a2(khri pa): te bya 'dab ma med pa de/de nas lhung bzhin 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma ma la bdag ma smas ma snad par dzam+bu gling du gnas par bya'o snyam na/shA re dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam
407a3(khri pa): du sems/ci bya 'dab ma med pa de ma smas ma snad par dzam+bu'i gling du gnas par 'gyur snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma legs te/de ni smas pa
407a4(khri pa): dang /snang ba kho narA dzem+bu'i gling du lhung zhing 'gum pa'am/'gum pa la thug pa'i sdug bsngal can du 'gyur lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
407a5(khri pa): bya gang yang rung ba zhig lus che zhing 'drab ma mchis par gyur la/mthon po zhig nas lhung ba de ni de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i slad du'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
407a6(khri pa): pr-i/shA ra dwa tI'i bu de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang gis bskal pa pang po zhig tu sbyin pa
407a7(khri pa): byin zhing /de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrungs/bzod pa bsgoms/brtson 'grus brtsams/bsam gtan dag bsgrubs/shes rab bsgoms su zin kyang /de shes
407b1(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing /thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bar de stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom na/yang dag pa'i mtha'
407b2(khri pa): mngon sum du byas nas nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag nges rnam pa thams cad
407b3(khri pa): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang bral bas/chos de dag bskal pa mang po zhig tu bsgoms shing sbyin pa byin/de bzhin du tshul khrims bsrungs/bzod pa bsgoms/brtson
407b4(khri pa): 'grus brtsams/bsam gtan dag bsgrubs/shes rab bsgoms par gyur pa de'i tshe/shesI rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pa
407b5(khri pa): dang bral bas/de'i phyir de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de 'das pa
407b6(khri pa): dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi ting nge 'dzin dang /tshul khrims dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam
407b7(khri pa): par grol po'i ye shes gzigs pa de dag sems shing mtshan mar 'dzin la/kun tu 'dzin te/sgom mod kyi/'on kyang des ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims
408a1(khri pa): kyi phyogs tsam yang mi shes so//de bzhin du des ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phyogs
408a2(khri pa): tsam yang mi shes la/de'ang mi shes mi mthong bzhin du byang chub kyi lam stong pa nyid de dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos de dag gi sgra nyan par byed
408a3(khri pa): do//des sgra de yid la byas nas/mtshan mar 'dzin to//mtshan mar gzung nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/de
408a4(khri pa): ltar yongs su bsngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
408a5(khri pa): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma zin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pa dang bral ba de ni de bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la
408a6(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pa dang ma bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed/
408a7(khri pa): tshul khrims srung /bzod pa skyed/brtson 'grus rtsom/bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pa
408b1(khri pa): dang ma bral bas 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par
408b2(khri pa): grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa gang yin pa de mtshan mar mi 'dzin la/de stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mtshan mar mi 'dzin/mtshan ma med
408b3(khri pa): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mtshan mar mi 'dzin te/de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogasra pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin par rig par bya'o//
408b4(khri pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/sems dang po bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa byin yang mtshan mar ma bzung /tshul khrims bsrungs
408b5(khri pa): kyang mtshon mar ma bzung /bzod pa bskyed kyang mtshan mar me bzung /brtson 'grus brtsams kyang mtshan mar mo bzung /bsam gtan ngag la snyoms par zhugs kyang
408b6(khri pa): mtshan mar ma bzung /shes rab bsgoms kyang mtshan mar ma bzung la/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang
408b7(khri pa): tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mtshon mar ma bzung ba'i phyir te/shA ra dwa/
409a1(khri pa): ti'i bu gang mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtong /tshul khrims srung /bzod pa skyed/brtson 'grus rtsom/bsam gtan dag la snyoms//
409a2(khri pa): par 'jug pa nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa yin no//
409a3(khri pa): gsol pa/bdag gisra bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal bA ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems dang po bskyed byin chad
409a4(khri pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral ba de'i bla na med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni the tshom ma mchis legs so//de ci'i
409a5(khri pa): slad du zhe na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems dang po bskyed slan chad 'di lta ste/gzugs sam/tshor
409a6(khri pa): ba'am/'du shes sam/'du byed rnams samo/rnam par shes pa nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gang zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
409a7(khri pa): rgya bar bgyid pa dang /gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /gang du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos ni nam yang ma dmigs pa'i slad
