504a7(khri pa): po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu nas/sprul pa'i bar lta bu'o//skye mched de dag ni rmi lam lta bu nas/sprul pa'i bar lta bu'o//khams 'di dag ni sprul pa'i bar dag lta bu ste/kye 'di
504b1(khri pa): dag la phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched ni ci'ang med do//'di la rmi lam mam/rmi lam rmi ba po 'ga' yang med do//brag ca'am/brag ca nyan pa po 'am/mig yor ram/mig yor mthong ba
504b2(khri pa): po 'am/de bzhin du smig rgyu dang /sgyu ma dang /sprul pa mthong ba po'ang med de/chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na/khyed ni phung po med pa la phung por 'du shes
504b3(khri pa): par 'gyur/khams med pa la khams su 'du shes pa dang /skye mched rnams med pa la skye mched du 'du shes par zad do//chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyin ci log
504b4(khri pa): las skyes pa dang /las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su zin pa yin na/'di la khyed dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la dngos por 'du shes pa'i rgyu gzhan gang yin zhes ston par byed cing /sems
504b5(khri pa): can sor sna can gang dag yin pa de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa des ser sna de las bzlog nas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar byed do//sems
504b6(khri pa): can de dag gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de'ang longs spyod chen po nyid du 'gyur ro//de las kyang bzlog nas/tshul khrims la sbyor bar byed do//de dag gi tshul khrims yang dag par blang
504b7(khri pa): ba de'ang mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro//des kyang bzlog nas/ting nge 'dzin dag la sbyar bar byed de/de dag gi ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang tshongs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin
505a1(khri pa): du bsam gtan dang po las bzlog nas/bsam gtan gnyis pa la rab tu 'god par byed do//bsam gtan gnyis pa las bzlog nas/bsam gtan gsum pa la rab tu 'god
505a2(khri pa): par byed do//bsam gtan gsum pa las bzlog nas/bsam gtan bzhi pa la rab tu 'god par byed do//bsnam gtan bzhi pa las bzlog nas/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms
505a3(khri pa): par 'jug pa la rab tu 'god par byed do//de bzhin du sbyar te/ci rigs par 'du shes med 'dro shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 'god par byed do//de las kyang
505a4(khri pa): bzlog nas/theg pa gsum po dag la rab tu 'god par byed do//de nas sems can kha cig sbyin pa dang /sbyin po'i 'bras bu de las bzlog nas/phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las
505a5(khri pa): 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dzud par byed/rab tu 'god par byed do//sems can kha cig ni tshul khrims kyi phung po de las bzlog nas/phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
505a6(khri pa): su 'dzud par byed/rab tu 'god par byed do//sems can kha cig ni bsam gtan dang /bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu de dag las rnam grangs du mas bzlog cing /'dun pa bzlog nas mya
505a7(khri pa): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dzud par byed/rab tu 'god par byed do//sems can kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug
505b1(khri pa): pa'i 'bras bu de dag las rnam grangs du mas bzlog cing /'dun pa bzlog nas/phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dzud par byed/rab tu 'god par byed do//sems can kha
505b2(khri pa): cig ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i
505b3(khri pa): lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po dag la 'dzud par byed/rab tu 'god
505b4(khri pa): par byed do//sems can kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po
505b5(khri pa): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la 'dzud par byed/rab tu 'god par byed do//de zag pa med pa'i chos bstan du med pa/thogs pa med pa de dag drang ldan pas/sems
505b6(khri pa): can kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god par byed do//sems can kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu 'god par byed do//kha cig ni phyir mi 'ong
505b7(khri pa): ba'i 'bras bu la/kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid la/kha cig ni rang byang chub la rab tu 'god par byed do//gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba de dag la
506a1(khri pa): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam brjod par byed/ston par byed/sems can de dag la yang dag par gzengs bstod par byed/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de/rab 'byor
506a2(khri pa): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/rmi lam lta bu'i chos rnams dang /sprul pa'i bar lta bu'i chos rnams dang /dngos po med pa
506a3(khri pa): dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin no//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe
506a4(khri pa): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid la
506a5(khri pa): spyod pa ni/rmi lom lta bu'i chos rnams dang /dngos po ma mchis pa dang /dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /mtha' lngas 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa
506a6(khri pa): stong pa nyid kyi chos rnams la 'di lta ste/'di dag ni dge ba'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni mi dge ba'i chos rnams so//'di dag ni lung du bstan pa dag go/'di dag ni lung du ma
506a7(khri pa): bstan pa dag go/'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa dag go//'di dag ni zag pa med pa dag go/'di dag ni 'jig rten pa dag go//'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa dag go/
506b1(khri pa): 'di dag ni 'dus byas so//'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so zhes rnam par 'jog par bgyid pa 'dri na ngo mtshar lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tsha
506b2(khri pa): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
506b3(khri pa): mo 'di la spyod po gang chos rnams kyi rnam par 'jog par byed po de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no//rab 'byor gal te khyod kyis
506b4(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gang dag yin pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gong dag nyan thos dang /rang
506b5(khri pa): sangs rgyas rnams la med pa dag shes na ni de'i phyir nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la lan du phan gdags par sla ba ma yin/
506b6(khri pa): no//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gang dag nyan thos dang
506b7(khri pa): rang sangs rgyas thams cad la ma mchis pa de dag gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yid la bzung zhig dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod
507a1(khri pa): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gang dag yin pa bshad par bya'o//rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
507a2(khri pa): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la gnas shing /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
507a3(khri pa): sum cu rtsa bdun dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /
507a4(khri pa): snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas nas/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song ste/de dag tu sems can gang dag sbyin pas bsdu bar
507a5(khri pa): bya ba de dag ni sbyin pas yongs su sdud do//gang dag tshul khrims kyis bsdu bar bya ba dang /gang dag bzod pas bsdu bar bya ba dang /gang dag brtson 'grus kyis bsdu bar bya ba dang //
507a6(khri pa): gang dag bsam gtan gyis bsdu bar bya ba dang /gang dag shes rab kyis bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni shes rab kyis yongs su sdud do//de bzhin du sems can gang dag tshad med pa bzhi
507a7(khri pa): dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis bsdu bar bya ba dang /gang dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu
507b1(khri pa): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
507b2(khri pa): brgyad pa'i bar gyis yongs su sdud do//de bzhin du gang dag stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdu bar bya ba dang /gang dag mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdu bar bya ba dang /gang dag smon
507b3(khri pa): pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsdu bar bya ba de dag ni/smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su sdod do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
507b4(khri pa): pa la spyod pa/rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas/de bzhin du mngon par shes pa lnga dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas nas/sems can gang
507b5(khri pa): dag sbyin pas bsdu bar bya ba de dag ji ltar sbyin pas yongs su sdud ce na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/sems can
507b6(khri pa): rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/'di lto ste/zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/skom 'dod pa rnams la ni sgrom/bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon po/gos 'dod pa rnams la ni
507b7(khri pa): gos/me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog/phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba/spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos/byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/mal cha 'dod pa rnams la
508a1(khri pa): ni ma laH/stan 'dod pa rnams la ni stan/mar me 'dod pa rnams la ni mar me/na ba'i gsos sman 'dod pa nas mi'i yo byad ci'ang rung ba'i bar du 'dod pa rnams
508a2(khri pa): la ni sbyin par byed de/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ji ltar dbul ba de bzhin du nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams la'ang chos gos
508a3(khri pa): dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams sbyin par byed do//me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /
508a4(khri pa): gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dran dang /mar dang /'bru mar dang /mar me dag sbyin par byed do//ji ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pa de dag la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de bzhin
508a5(khri pa): du tshul khrims 'tshal pa rnams la'ang sbyin pa sbyin par byed do//de bzhin du mi rnams la'ong sbyin pa sbyin par byed do//de bzhin du mi ma yin par gyur pa rnams la'ong sbyin pa sbyin
508a6(khri pa): par byed do//de snod dang snod ma yin par yongs su mi rtog gi/sems can thams cad la tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi 'du shes nye bar bzhag nas/sbyin pa sbyin par byed do//de ci'i phyir
508a7(khri pa): zhen/'di ltar chos thams cad tha dad pa med par rtogs pa'i phyir yongs su shes shing mngon du byas nas/de tha dad pa med pa'i sbyin pa byin pas/tha dad pa med pa'i chos 'di lta
508b1(khri pa): ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags mthong na/'di snyam du
508b2(khri pa): bdag gi sbyin gnas ni/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa ni ma yin no snyam du sems bskyed na/byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma yin no//de
508b3(khri pa): ci'i phyir zhe na/rang gi sems yongs su dag na/byang chub sems dpa'i sprin gnas yongs su dag pa'i phyir te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni bdag gis sems can
508b4(khri pa): dngul po 'di dgra sbyin pas bsdus na/gzhan gyi rjeso dag lnga rku bar mi 'gyur zhing cho ga shes par gyur nas gzhan dag la'ang sbyin pa byed par 'gyur/de bzhin du sbyin pas bsdus na srog
508b5(khri pa): chags rnams kyi srog gcod par mi 'gyur/de bzhin du sbyin pas bsdus na/brdzun mi zer/phra ma mi smra/ngag rtsub po mi smra/tshig 'khyal pa mi smra bar 'gyur te/de dag rgyu nges
508b6(khri pa): lus zhig pa'i 'ogro tu/rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur/de bzhin du bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur/khyim
508b7(khri pa): bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur/de dag rgyu de nyid kyis 'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'o ma/yang dag por
509a1(khri pa): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas phung po'i lcug ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du 'gyur ro snyam nas/byang chub
509a2(khri pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag gis sems can mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon dang /gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas dang /yongs su 'dren pa med pa rnams kyi yongs su
509a3(khri pa): 'dren par 'gyur bar bya'o zhes sngon yi dam 'di ma bcas sam/phyir rgol ba 'am/gsol ba mthong ngam/gzhan gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
509a4(khri pa): lus bslangs na'ang ngos sbyin na me mi sbyin snyam du sems gzhan bskyed par mi bya'i/'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis phyir rgol ba dang /gsod pa de dag la rang gi lus sbyin par bya'o//
509a5(khri pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltor de ni sems can thams cad kyi don dang /phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa yin gyi/lus
509a6(khri pa): dang srog gi phyir ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro//gal te sbyin nam mi sbyin snyam du rnam par rtog par gyur na ni/de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
509a7(khri pa): dpa' chen po rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /de las gzhan pa 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag dang /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten gyis kyang de la khyod la sus gsol ba
509b1(khri pa): btab na/bdag sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang /gnas dang /mgon dang dpung gnyen dang yongs su 'dren par 'gyur bar bya'o zhes sngon gyi tshe rabs su yi dam 'di bcas zhes smad par
509b2(khri pa): 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
509b3(khri pa): 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dod 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa ji ltar chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud par
509b4(khri pa): byed/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams
509b5(khri pa): sdud pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/rab 'byor 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o//de la 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/gang 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams
509b6(khri pa): brjod pa dang /'chad pa dang /rab tu ston pa dang /rnam par 'byed pa ste/'di lta ste/mi ldog pa'i le'u dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i
509b7(khri pa): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga brjod pa dang /'chad pa dang /rab tu ston pa dang /rnam par 'byed pa ste/'di ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o///
510a1(khri pa): ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa yin zhe na/'jig rten las mi 'phags pas/de'i phyir 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o//de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa de byed nas/rnam grangs du mas
510a2(khri pa): sems can de dag bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /mngon par shes pa de dag las 'byed par byed zlog par byed de/phye zhing bzlog
510a3(khri pa): nas kyang thabs la mkhas pas/'phags pa'i chos la 'god par byed de//'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lom yan lag brgyad pa'i bar
510a4(khri pa): dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la 'god par byed do//de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /rang byang chub kyi bar la 'god par byed de/'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
510a5(khri pa): chos kyi sbyin pa yin no//ci'i phyir de 'jig rten las 'das pa yin zhe na/'jig rten las rgal ba dang /'jig rten rnams kyi gong na 'dug pa'i phyir ro//'phags pa'i chos rnams ni
510a6(khri pa): gang 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/'phags pa'i chos rnams zhes bya ba ni/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /
510a7(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag go//'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag ni 'di lta ste/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
510b1(khri pa): bu dang /de bzhin du sbyar te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar dag go/rab 'byor de lta mod kyi/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'phags pa'i chos
510b2(khri pa): rnams ni gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa dang /rang byang chub shes pa'i bar dang /de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du shes pa dang /de bzhin du de
510b3(khri pa): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes pa nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du shes pa dang /de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa'i chos rnams
510b4(khri pa): dang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
510b5(khri pa): chen po rnams kyi 'phags pa'i chos rnams zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/gang nyon mongs pa dang /
510b6(khri pa): bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba thams cad spongs pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci byung
510b7(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//ji skad
511a1(khri pa): smras pa de bzhin te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob bo//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom
511a2(khri pa): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo'i chen pos kyang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob lag sngon/'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /
511a3(khri pa): de bzhin gshogaso pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyad par ci mchis/tha dad du bgyi ba ni ci mchis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang
511a4(khri pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/gdod de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o//rab
511a5(khri pa): 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad kyi mthar phyin pa kho na yin la/byang chub sems dpa' ni rjes su 'gro ba yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad la mun pa
511a6(khri pa): mod pa nyid thob pa yin la/byang chub sems dpa' ni rjes su 'thob pa yin te/rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
511a7(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyad par yin no//'di ni tha dad du bya ba yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi
511b1(khri pa): sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'i rten yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
511b2(khri pa): thabs la mkhas pas/'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sems can rnams btsud nas/'phags pa'i gnas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la 'dzud par byed/'god par
511b3(khri pa): byed do//de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la 'god par byed do////'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri po//bam po nyi shu dgu pa//rab 'byor
511b4(khri pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dang thun mong ma yin pa dag gang yin zhe na/'di lta ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi
511b5(khri pa): dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang //'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang
511b6(khri pa): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
511b7(khri pa): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /dpe
512a1(khri pa): byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad de/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten/
512a2(khri pa): las 'das pa'i chos rnams te/de dag brjod pa dang /'chad pa dang /rab tu ston pa dang /rnam par 'byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten las
512a3(khri pa): 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtun pa shes bzhin can dran
512a4(khri pa): pa dang ldan pas/'jig rten la brnab sems dang /yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal nas nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang /de bzhin du phyi'i lus dang /de bzhin
512a5(khri pa): du nang dang phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang /de bzhin du sems dang chos la'ung rgya cher sbyar bar bya ste/de dag ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi zhes bya'o//yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/
512a6(khri pa): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mI bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed 'bad/brtson 'grus rtsom/sems rab tu 'dzin yang
512a7(khri pa): dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /de bzhin du sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed 'bad/brtson 'grus rtsom/sems rab tu 'dzin yang dag par rab tu
512b1(khri pa): 'jog pa dang /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed 'bad/brtson 'grus rtsom/sems rab tu 'dzin yang dag par rab tu 'jog pa dang /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams
512b2(khri pa): gnas par bya ba dang /mi nyams par bya ba dang /shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang /byir zhing 'byung bar bya ba dang /yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed 'bad/brtson 'grus rtsom /
512b3(khri pa): sems rab tu 'dzin/yang dag par rab tu 'jog ste/'di dag ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya'o//rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
512b4(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam
512b5(khri pa): par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba bsgom pa dang /de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /sems kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu
512b6(khri pa): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/'gog pa la gnas pa/rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba bsgom pa ste/de dag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
512b7(khri pa): pa bzhi zhes bya'o//dbang po lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dad pa'i dbang po dang /brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /dran pa'i dbang po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /shes rab
513a1(khri pa): kyid bang baH/de dag ni daphung po lnga zhes bya'o//stobs lnga gang zhe na/'di k+taste/dad pa'i stongs dang /brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang /dran du'i stobs dang /
513a2(khri pa): nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /shes rab kyi stobs te/de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o//byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang
513a3(khri pa): chos rnam par 'byed pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /dga' ba dang /shin tu sbyangs pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/de dag ni byang chub
513a4(khri pa): kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngag dang //
513a5(khri pa): yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/de dag ni 'phags pa'i
513a6(khri pa): lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang /rnam
513a7(khri pa): par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ste/de dag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum zhes bya'o//de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid gang zhe na/stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas sems rtse gcig pa
513b1(khri pa): ste/de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ces bya'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa gang zhe na/mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pas sems rtse gcig pa gang yin pa ste/de ni rnam par thar
513b2(khri pa): po'i sgo mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o//rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa gang zhe na/mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pas sems rtse gcig pa gang yin pa ste/de ni rnam
513b3(khri pa): par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med po zhes bya'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o//nang gzugs med
513b4(khri pa): par 'du shes pasar/phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o//sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te/bsgrubs nas gnas pa 'di
513b5(khri pa): ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o//de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /sna tshogs kyi 'du shes
513b6(khri pa): rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar dag
513b7(khri pa): bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mchod las yang dag par 'das te/'du shes dang /tshor ba 'gog pa lus kyis mngon
514a1(khri pa): sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas pa'i bar dag ste/de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o//mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/'di la
514a2(khri pa): 'dod pa dag las dben pa/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan
514a3(khri pa): dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de bzhin du bas ma gtan gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /blun pa'i bar dag bsgrubs te gnas pa dang /de bzhin du rnam mkha' mtha yas skye ma
514a4(khri pa): nas/'du shos dang /tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar du bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste/de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
514a5(khri pa): bcu gang zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnas la'ang gnas su yong dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
514a6(khri pa): la/gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shis pa dang /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dras pa dang /mo 'ongs pa dang /nga
514a7(khri pa): ltar byung ba'i las rnams dang /las yang dag par len pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gnas kyi sgo dang /rgyu'i sgo nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /gzhan/
514b1(khri pa): yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa/khams dum pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gzhan
514b2(khri pa): dag dang /gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang /mchog ma yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa sna tshogs
514b3(khri pa): pa dang /mos pa du ma pa'i 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
514b4(khri pa): tu shes pa dang /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam
514b5(khri pa): par byang ba dang ldan pa thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /gzhan yang de bzhin pa/shegs pas lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems
514b6(khri pa): can 'chi 'pho ba dang /skye ba nas bde 'gror 'gro ba dang /ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang /las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i bar dag mthong zhing /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa
514b7(khri pa): dang /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/'di lta ste/tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma'i bar dag kyang
515a1(khri pa): rnam pa dang bcas/yul phyogs dang bcas par rjes su dran pa dang /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas zag pa rnams zad pas zag pa med cing sems rnam par grol ba
515a2(khri pa): dang /shes rab rnam par grol ba tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing /bdag gi skye ba ni zad/tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad/bya ba
515a3(khri pa): ni byas/srid pa 'di las gzhan ni mi shes so zhes bya ba ste/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya'o//mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nga yang dag par
515a4(khri pa): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/'dir chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes lho dang bcas pa dang /bdud dang bcas pa dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa
515a5(khri pa): dang /dge sbyong dang /bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na chos dang mthun par bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/rgyu de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas
515a6(khri pa): bde ba 'thob cing bag tsha ba med pa thob la/mi 'jigs pa thob ste/gnas kyis khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o//'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrag go//
515a7(khri pa): tshangs pa'i 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am bdud dam/tshangs pa 'am/su'ang rung bas chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du ma bskor ba bdag gis bskor bar bya'o//
515b1(khri pa): zhes bya ba dang /nga zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/'dir zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'ga' zhig bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes bya ba rgya
515b2(khri pa): cher sbyar bar bya ba dang /ngas nyan thos rnams la bar du gcod pa'i chos gang dag bshad pa de dag bstan kyang bar du gcod par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'dir dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/
515b3(khri pa): bdud dam/'ga' zhig bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes rgyu chur sbyar bar bya ba dang /ngas nyan thos rnams la nges par 'byin pa/nges par 'byed pa de byed pa sdug
515b4(khri pa): bsngal yang dag par zad par 'byung bar 'gyur ba lam gang bshad pa de la lam 'di ni nges por 'byin pa ma yin/nges par rtogs pa ma yin/byed pa po'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad
515b5(khri pa): par 'gyur ba ma yin zhes dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am/bdud dam/'ga' zhig bdag la rgol ba'i rgyu de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes rgya cher sbyar bar bya ba ste/de dag ni
515b6(khri pa): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya'o//so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/don so so yang dag par rig pa dang /chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
515b7(khri pa): nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang /spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/de dag ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya'o//byams pa chen po gang zhe na/de bzhin gshegs
516a1(khri pa): pa sems can thams cad la dgra bo dang /mdza' bshes la 'dra bar mdzad pa gang yin pa ste/de ni byams pa chen po zhes bya'o//de la snying rje chen po gang zhe na/sems can
516a2(khri pa): ma yin pa'i sems can rnams la byams pa mi gtong ba gang yin pa ste/de ni snying rje chen po zhes bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs
516a3(khri pa): pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang /ca co med pa dang /bsnyel ba med pa dang /sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa dang /tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa dang /so sor ma brtags pa'i btang
516a4(khri pa): snyoms med pa dang /'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang /brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang /dran pa nyams pa med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang /shes rab nyams pa
516a5(khri pa): mod pa dang /rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba nyams pa med pa dang /'das pa'i dus la mu chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug
516a6(khri pa): pa dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa dang /lus kyi
516a7(khri pa): las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /ngag gi las thams cad ye shesta sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /yid kyi las thams
516b1(khri pa): cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste/de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya'o//de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
516b2(khri pa): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa yin no//de la zhabs shin tu gnas pa ni 'di yin te/zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis thams cad
516b3(khri pa): kyis sa laM kun tu reg pa ste/dper na za ma tog zhabs shin tu mnyam zhing phyeng nge ba/sa gzhi shin tu mnyam pa la bzhag na/'og gi zhabs thams cad kyis sa la kun tu reg pa bzhin
516b4(khri pa): du bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni kun nas mu khyud khor yug dang ldan pa yin no//de la mu khyud khor yug dang ldan pa ni 'di
516b5(khri pa): yin te/zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang bcas pa/lte ba dang bcas pa/mu khyung dang bcas pa dag mnga' ste/thams cad kyang kha dog gser lta bu'o//
516b6(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil ni 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa'o//de dag la phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid ni 'di yin te/dper na
516b7(khri pa): shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ras bal gyi 'da' ba lta bu ste/ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni sor mo ring ba'o//de la sor mo ring ba ni 'di lta
517a1(khri pa): yin te/de'i phyag dang zhabs rnams kyi sor mo dag lhag par ring ste/ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni phyag dang zhabs dra ba dang ldan
517a2(khri pa): pa yin te/de'i phyag dang zhabs la dra ba lhag pa dag mnga' ba ni ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs rting pa yangs pa dang ldan pa yin no//de la rting
517a3(khri pa): pa yangs pa ni 'di yin te/de'i zhabs kyi rting pa gnyis kyi mthil yangs pa ni ji ltar mi gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa yin
517a4(khri pa): no//de la zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa ni 'di yin te/rting pa yangs pa la yang dag par sbyor la/rting pa yangs pa'ang zhabs long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa la sbyor ba ste/ji ltar
517a5(khri pa): me gzhan dag la med pa lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni byin pa ri dgas en+yA ya'i byin pa lto bu dang ldan pa yin no//de la byin pa ri dgas in+ta ya'i lta bu ni 'od yin te/de'i byin
517a6(khri pa): pa byin gyis phra bar skyes shing /byin gyis phra bar yang dag par byung ba ste/dper na ri dgas kyi rgyal po e n+ya ye'i lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus
517a7(khri pa): mor slebs pa yin no//de la bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mo slebs pa ni 'di yin te/bcom ldan 'das ni bzhengs na sku ma btud par phyag gnyis kyis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la
517b1(khri pa): yang dag par reg par mdzad cing /kun tu nyug par mdzad pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni 'doms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa yin no//de la 'doms kyi smra ba sbubs su nub pa nyid ni 'di yin te/
517b2(khri pa): dper na rigs btsun pa'i glang po che cang shes sam/rta cang shes kyi lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni ba spu re re nas mdzes par skyes shing g.yas su 'khyil ba yin no//de la ba spu re re nas
517b3(khri pa): mdzes par skyes shing g.yas su 'khyil ba nyid ni 'di yin te/de'i spu khung bu re re nas/spu re re mthon mthang la lcang lor 'khyil ba 'jam zhing snum la/g.yas su 'khyil cing mdzes par skyes
517b4(khri pa): pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni sgo'i spu gyen du phyogs pa dang ldan pa yin no//de la sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa nyid ni 'di yin te/de'i dbu dang sku las skyes pa'i dbu skra dang /spu rnams
517b5(khri pa): ni kha gyen du bltas shing mthon mthing la kun nas lhung lor 'khril ba 'jam zhing snam la g.yas su 'khyil ba mdzes par skyes pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni pags pa srab cing 'jam la
517b6(khri pa): snum pa yin no//de la pags pa srab cing 'jam la snum pa ni 'di yin te/de'i sku la chu 'am/rdul kun tu mi chags shing mi gnas pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni mdog gser lta bu
517b7(khri pa): dang ldan te/dper na dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi mchod sdong la rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa ltar gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa lta na sdug pa yin te/des na gser gyi mdog lta bu zhes
518a1(khri pa): bya'o//bcom ldan 'das ni bdun mtho ba yin no//de la bdun mtho ba nyid ni 'di yin te/de'i zhabs gnyis kyi gong mtho ba gnyis gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la lta na
518a2(khri pa): sdug pa sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par gyur pa dang /de bzhin du phyag gnyis kyi gong mtho ba gnyis gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la lta na sdug pa sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par
518a3(khri pa): gyur pa dang /thal gong gnyis mtho bar gyur pa dang /gnya' gong du mtho ba gcig gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la lta na sdug pa/sha dang khrag gis yongs su rgyas par gyur pa yin no//
518a4(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das ni dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa dang ldan pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni thal gong rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni sku shin tu drang por 'khrungs pa
518a5(khri pa): yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni sku n+ya glo d+hi ltar chu zheng gab pa yin no//de la n+ya gro d+ha ltar sku chu zheng grub pa nyid ni 'di yin te/chur ji srid pa zheng du'ang de srid la/zheng du ji srid pa chung
518a6(khri pa): yang de srid de/de ni n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng grub pa zhes bya'o//bcom ldan 'das ni 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba yin no//bcom
518a7(khri pa): ldan 'das ni tshems thags bzang ba yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni tshims rtse mo mtho zhing rnol dkar ba yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni ri bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin no//de'i
518b1(khri pa): mgur drang por med pa drang zhing ma yo la thogs pa med par ming du rung bar gyur pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni ljags ring zhing srab pa yin no//de la ljags ring zhing srab pa nyid ni
518b2(khri pa): 'di yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhed na zhal nas ljags byung ste/shangs kyi bu ga gnyis dang /spyan gyi khung bu gnyis dang /snyan gyi bu ga gnyis su reg par mdzad cing /yongs su
518b3(khri pa): nyug par mdzad la/dbu'i mtshams su thug pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang 'gebs par mdzad pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa yin no//bcom
518b4(khri pa): ldan 'das ni spyan yangs shing rdzi ma ba'i lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni spyan mthon mthing lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni spyan gyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa yin
518b5(khri pa): no//bcom ldan 'das ni 'od 'dom gang pa yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni zhol zla ba nya ba lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni mdzod spu smin mtshoms su 'khrungs la/shing bal ltar
518b6(khri pa): 'jam zhing me tog kun+d+ha dang /zla ba dang /dung dang /pad+ma'i rtsa ldeg dang /ba'i 'o ma dang /ba mo'i mdog lta bu yin no//bcom ldan 'das ni dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa yin no//
518b7(khri pa): de dag ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan de dag dang ldan pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
519a1(khri pa): 'di rang bzhin gyis snang bas khyab par mdzad do//de bzhin gshegs pa bzhed na/mtshan de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/grangs med tshad med pa dag
519a2(khri pa): snang bas khyab par mdzad cing /de nas de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams gdul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas/'od 'dom gang bar byin gyis rlob bo//gal te de bzhin gshegs
519a3(khri pa): pas byin gyis brlabs pa ma mdzad du zin na/zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis kyang 'jig rten na yod par mi 'gyur/zla ba gcig dang /zla ba byed dang /dus dang lo khyud 'khor rnams kyang 'jig
519a4(khri pa): rten no mi snang bar 'gyur ro//sems can rnams gdul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyis gsung gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
519a5(khri pa): 'di go bar mdzad do//bzhed na gong du'ang gsung chen pos kyang go bar mdzad do//yon tan dang /phan yon de dag thams cad ni nga sngon du byang chub sems dpar gyur cing /shes rab kyi
519a6(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pas bsgrubs so//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/sbyin pa gnyis po zang zing gi sbyin pa dang //
519a7(khri pa): chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud par byed do/rab 'byor 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos yin no//rab 'byor byang chub sems
519b1(khri pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa na/snyan par smra bas ji ltar sems can rnams sdud ce na/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa
519b2(khri pa): drug po dag la spyod pa na/thog ma kho nar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams sdud do//de'i 'og tu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas so//de'i 'og tu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas so//
519b3(khri pa): de'i 'og tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas so//de'i 'og tu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas so//de'i 'og tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas sems can rnams sdud par byed de/rab 'byor
519b4(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud par byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag
519b5(khri pa): gis dge ba'i chos thams cad bsdus po'i phyir ro//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don spyod pas/ji ltar sems can rnams sdud ce na/rab 'byor 'di la pha rol tu
519b6(khri pa): byin pa drug po dag la yun ring por spyod pa na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las gzhan mi byed par rtag tu sems can rnams sdud par byed de/'di lta ste/sbyin pa dang //
519b7(khri pa): snyan par smra ba dang /don spyod pa dang /don mthun pas sdud par byed do//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
520a1(khri pa): 'das rnams ni sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang ldan pa yin no//sred med kyi bu'i ltar sku grims pa yin no//pus mo'i lha nga dag mdzes par grub pa yin no//sku gtsang
520a2(khri pa): bdag yin no//sku 'jam pa dag yin no//sku mnyen pa dag yin no//sku snum bag can dag yin no//sgyu ma btud pa dag yin no//sor mo rnams ring ba dang /byin gyis phra ba dag
520a3(khri pa): yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sor mo rnams zlum pa dag yin no//sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba dag yin no//rtsa rnams mi mngon pa dag yin no//long du rnams mi
520a4(khri pa): mngon pa ngag yin no//sku dbyibs legs pa dag yin no//sku shin tu legs par 'brel ba dag yin no//skye mched rnams shin tu yongs su dag pa dag yin no//mkhyen pa yongs su dag
520a5(khri pa): pa dag yin no//spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dag yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dpal dang /blo gros dang ldan pa drug yin no//blta bar 'os pa dag yin no//zhal ha
520a6(khri pa): cang mi ring ba dag yin no//zhal kang kong med pa dag yin no//sgros bim+ba ltar dmar ba dag yin no//zhal yongs su rgyas pa dag yin no//dbyangs zab pa dag yin no//lte ba zab pa
520a7(khri pa): dag yin no//lte ba shin tu zlum pa dag yin no//lte ba g.yas su 'khyil ba dag yin no//phyag dang zhabs yongs su rgyas pa dag yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag
520b1(khri pa): dang zhabs ji ltar dgongs pa bzhin dang ldan pa dag yin no//phyag gi mthil mnyam pa dag yin no//phyag gi ri mo bar ma chad pa dag yin no//phyag gi ri mo mtho ba dag yin no//sku la dri ma med cing
520b2(khri pa): dri mi zhim pa med pa dag yin no//mdog gsal ba dag yin no//skye mched kyi sgo bzang ba dag yin no//zhal zla ba lta bu dag yin no//gsong por gsung ba dag yin no//zhal khri gnyer gyi rim
520b3(khri pa): pa med pa dag yin no//spu'i khung bu thams cad nas dri yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba dag yin no//de dag gi zhal gyi dri zhim pa dag yin no//seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dag yin no//glang po
520b4(khri pa): che'i dbang po'i stabs su gshegs pa dag yin no//ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa dag yin no//dbu gdugs 'dra ba dag yin no//gsung snyan cing rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dag
520b5(khri pa): yin no//tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa dag yin no//shangs mtho ba dag yin no//ljags dmar ba dag yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ljags srab cing che bdag yin
520b6(khri pa): no//spu mthon mthing can dag yin no//spu gtsang ba dag yin no//spyan yangs pa dag yin no//bu gi'i sgo rnams yongs su ma nyams pa dag yin no//phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dmar ba
520b7(khri pa): dag yin no//lte ba ma bye ba dag yin no//dku ma rnyongs pa dag yin no//phyal phyang nge ba dag yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku la gnyer ma med pa dag yin no//tshigs/
521a1(khri pa): mdzes pa drag yin no//tshigs ring ba dag yin no//phyag dang zhabs yongs su dag pa dag yin no//'od 'dom gang mnyam pa dag yin no//'od kyis gsal bar
521a2(khri pa): mdzad cing gshegs pa dag yin no//lha dang mi gang dag de dag gi sku mthong ba de dag tshim par 'gyur ro//srog chags thams cad kyis mthong yang brnyas par mi byed do//sems cad
521a3(khri pa): rnams la rjes su ston par mdzad do//de dag gi gsung ni 'khor dang mthun par khyab par mdzad kyi/'khor gyi phyi rol tu gsung mi 'gro'o//ro stod seng ge'i lta bu dag yin no//sku'i
521a4(khri pa): tshigs legs par 'brel ba dag yin no//spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dag yin no//dbu skra mthon mthing la 'jam zhing ring bdag yin no//dbu skra ma 'khrugs pa dag yin no//de bu
521a5(khri pa): skra gyen du phyogs shing bzang la lcang lor 'khyil ba dag yin no//dbu skra ma 'dzings pa dag yin no//thugs kar dpal gyi be'us legs par brgyan pa dag dang ldan pa dag yin no//
521a6(khri pa): phyag dang zhabs kyi mtshan dpal gyis 'bar ba dang ldan pa dag yin no//mtshal dang /ldong ros dang /tsin bIsta dang /thing shing dang /zangs ga ya'i kha dog gis bris pa lta bu'i
521a7(khri pa): mtshan rnams dang ldan pa yin no//rab 'byor de dag ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yin te/de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku legs par brgyan nas/lham mi lhan no lhang
521b1(khri pa): de'o//de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dag yin no//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
521b2(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la 'di skad 'doms shing 'di skad rjes su ston te/rigs kyi bu dag tshur shig/khyed cag
521b3(khri pa): yi ge mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig/'di lta ste/yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig/yi ge gnyis la mkhas par gyis shig/de bzhin du gsum dang /bzhi dang //
521b4(khri pa): lnga dang /drug dang /bdun dang /brgyad dang /dgu dang /bcu dang /de bzhin du nyi shu dang /sum cu dang /bzhi bcu dang /lnga bcu'i bar dang /yi ge brgya dang /yi ge stong gi bar
521b5(khri pa): la mkhas par gyis shig/yi ge gcig gis ngag gi rang bzhin thams cad rtogs par gyis shig/de bzhin du gnyis dang /gsum dang /yi ge brgya dang /stong gi bar dag gis ngag gi
521b6(khri pa): rang bzhin thams cad rtogs par gyis shig/de bzhin du yi ge gcig tu yi ge'i phyi mo bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po dag 'dus par gyis shig/yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi nang du yi ge gcig 'dus
521b7(khri pa): par gyis shig ces 'doms shing rjes su ston to//rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po dag 'dus par gyis shig/
522a1(khri pa): yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi nang du yi ge gcig 'dus par gyis shig/yi ge gcig gis yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la mkhas par byas la/de bzhin du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa
522a2(khri pa): gnyis kyis yi ge gcig la mkhas par byas nas/yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro//yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par byas nas/yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa
522a3(khri pa): la mkhas par 'gyur ro//dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos la mkhas pa dang /yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/yi ges yi ge med pa'i
522a4(khri pa): chos ston kyang /rab 'byor yi ge dang yi ge med pa la ma rtogs pa'i chos gang yang med do//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa
522a5(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi slad du/sems can yang gtan dmigs su ma mchis la/chos kyang dmigs su ma
522a6(khri pa): mchis shing /chos kyi rang bzhin yang dmigs su ma mchis lags na/bcom ldan 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing /de bzhin du
522a7(khri pa): bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /stong pa nyid bcu bzhi
522b1(khri pa): dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smyon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /de bzhin gshegs
522b2(khri pa): pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la spyod
522b3(khri pa): pa/rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis ji ltar sems can rnams lo chos ston cing /de bzhin du rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug gis sems
522b4(khri pa): can rnams la chos ston par bgyid lags/sems can dang /sems can du gdags pa ni dmigs su ma mchis lags te/sems can dmigs su ma mchis pas phung po dang /
522b5(khri pa): khams dang /skye mched rnams dmigs su ma mchis/de bzhin du sems can dmigs su ma mchis pas/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dmigs su ma mchis/de bzhin du sbyar te/sangs
522b6(khri pa): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du dmigs su ma mchis dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dmigs su ma mchis/sems can dmigs su ma mchis pas/sems can du gdags pa ma
522b7(khri pa): mchis/phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched du gdags pa ma mchis/de bzhin du sbyar te/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i bar du gdags pa dmigs su ma mchis lags na/btsun pa
523a1(khri pa): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i chos de gang lags/btsun
523a2(khri pa): pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can rnams mchis pa ma lags pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cing /de sems can rnams la phyin
523a3(khri pa): ci log la sbyor bar bgyid pa 'am/gcig tu mi 'gyur lcags grang /de ci'i slad du zhe na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
523a4(khri pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa des ni/byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs lags na/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur ba'i slad du'o//de skad ces gsol
523a5(khri pa): pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor de de bzhin no//ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/rab 'byor sems can dmigs su med
523a6(khri pa): pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//de bzhin du phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /dor
523a7(khri pa): ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /phung po stong pa nyid dang /skye mched stong pa nyid dang /
523b1(khri pa): 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /bdag stong pa nyid
523b2(khri pa): dang /sems can stong pa nyid dang /skye ba po stong pa nyid dang /de bzhin du gso ba dang /gang zag dang /shed las skyes pa dang /shed bu dang /byed pa po dang /byed du 'jug pa po dang /slong
523b3(khri pa): ba po dang /kun nas slong ba po dang /tshor ba po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//de bzhin du bsam gtan dang /tshod med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
523b4(khri pa): par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam
523b5(khri pa): yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//de bzhin du stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /smon pa med pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//de bzhin du rnam par thar pa
523b6(khri pa): brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong pa nyid dang /de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa bzhi stong pa
523b7(khri pa): nyid dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi stong pa nyid dang /byams pa chen po stong pa nyid dang /snying rje chen po stong pa nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid du rig
524a1(khri pa): par bya'o//de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu stong pa nyid dang /dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du stong pa nyid dang /rang byang chub stong pa nyid dang /byang chub sems
524a2(khri pa): dpa'i skyon med pa stong pa nyid dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub stong pa nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o//
524a3(khri pa): rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni chos de dag thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong nas/phyin ci log gis zin pa'i sems can
524a4(khri pa): rnams la chos ston par byed la/sems can de dag kyang mi dmigs so//chos de'ang 'di ltar ci nas kyang stong pa nyid de dag las mi 'da' ba de ltar ston par byed do//de ltar mthong ste/chos
524a5(khri pa): thams cad sgrib pa med po nyid du shes nas/de chos gang yang 'khrug par mi byed cing gnyis su'ang mi 'byed par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du'ang ston to//rab 'byor dper na de bzhin gshegs
524a6(khri pa): pa'i sprul pa zhig gis sprul pa stong phrag du ma mngon par sprul nas/sprul pa de dag nyid kha cig ni sbyin pa lo sbyor bar byed cing /kha cig ni tshul khrims la/kha cig ni bzod pa la/kha cig ni brjon
524a7(khri pa): 'grus la/kha cig ni bsam gtan la/kha cig ni shes rab la sbyor bar byed cing /kha cig ni tshad med pa dag la/kha cig ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la/kha cig ni
524b1(khri pa): mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyor bar byed na/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa des gang yang bye brag tu byas pa yod snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan
524b2(khri pa): 'das ma mchis lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor khyod kyis rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/
524b3(khri pa): ji ltar sems can rnams la chos ston par byed pa de ltar sems can de dag kyang sa la rab tu 'god par byed la/sems can de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul gyis phyin ci log
524b4(khri pa): dag las yongs su thar bar byed pa de ltar rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni rang bzhin nyid kyis ma bcings ma grol ba yin la/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /'du shes
524b5(khri pa): dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin nyid kyis ma bcings ma grol ba ste/gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin la/de bzhin du tshor ba dang
524b6(khri pa): 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs
524b7(khri pa): dang /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/de bzhin du 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi bar
525a1(khri pa): la'ang sbyar ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems can rnams la chos ston par byed kyang sems can
525a2(khri pa): dudamigs pa'ang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de chos thams cad dmigs su med pa la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing /de
525a3(khri pa): gzugs dang de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi stong pa nyid la mi gnas
525a4(khri pa): pa'i tshul gyis gnas la/rab 'byor 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos dang 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid ni gang na'ang mi gnas pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyiraro zhe na/'di ltar chos de dag dang
525a5(khri pa): stong pa nyid de dag la gang la gnas par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid med cing dmigs su med de/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'ang dngos po med pa la mi gnas la/rang gi dngos po'ang rang gi dngos po la
525a6(khri pa): mi gnas te/gzhan gyi dngos po'ang gzhan gyi dngos po la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag thams cad dmigs su med de/dmigs su med pa gang yin pa de ni
525a7(khri pa): gang na yang gnas par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa stong pa nyid de dag thams cad kyis chos 'di
525b1(khri pa): dag la rab tu sgom par byed de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams
525b2(khri pa): dang /'phags pa thams cad la nyes pa med pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
525b3(khri pa): rang sangs rgyas rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis kyang chos nyid 'di nyid rjes su sangs rgyas shing rtogs te/de kho na bzhin du chos de dag dang /chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'da'
525b4(khri pa): bar sems can rnams la bstan cing ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag ni chos kyi dbyings dang de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir
525b5(khri pa): zhe na/'di ltar de dag la gang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan
525b6(khri pa): 'das gal te chos kyi dbyings dang de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' las mi 'da' ba lags na/'o na ci gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag
525b7(khri pa): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan nyid rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang gzhan la 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa ma mchis pa dang /'dus
526a1(khri pa): byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan pa zhig lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor ma yin no//gsol pa btsun pa bcom ldan
526a2(khri pa): 'das gal te gzugs kyang gzhan ma legs la/chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma lags rnam par shes pa'i bar du'ang gzhan ma lags la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan ma lags te/'dus byas
526a3(khri pa): dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la'ang sbyar bar bgyi ba lags na/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar na ni las dkar gnag rnams kyi rnam par smin par rnam par dgod pa dang gdal
526a4(khri pa): bar ji ltar 'gyur te/las nag po rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang yi dgas rnams kyi nang na gda' ba dang /las dkar po rnams kyi rnam par
526a5(khri pa): smin pa dkar po lha dang mi rnams kyi nang na gda' ba dang /de bzhin du las dkar gnag rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar gnag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa rnams dang /mi rnams kyi nang
526a6(khri pa): na gda' ba dang de bzhin du las mi dkar mi gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mi dkar mi gnag pa ni 'di lta ste/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
526a7(khri pa): dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
526b1(khri pa): sprul pa/rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa chang mar byas nas/'bras bu rnam par bzhag pa ston par mdzad kyi/don dam pa'i bden par ni 'bras bu rnam par bzhag pa bstan par mi nus so//de
526b2(khri pa): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar don dam pa'i bden par gzugs dang /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang kun nas
526b3(khri pa): nyon mongs pa med pa dang rnam par byar ba med pa 'di lta ste/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi chos de ni rnam par mi rtog cing brjod du med pa yin pa'i phyir
526b4(khri pa): ro//gsol pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten te/'bras bu rnam par bzhag pa lags na byas pa so so'i skye bo thams cad rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur
526b5(khri pa): lags sam/de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'gyur
526b6(khri pa): lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor ci byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'am/don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/de dag la ni 'di lta ste/
526b7(khri pa): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang de bzhin du sbyar te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar gyi rnam par bzhag pa'ang med do//rab 'byor gang gi phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo
527a1(khri pa): thams cad la/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa med cing 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa med la/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
527a2(khri pa): 'das bu med pa de nyid kyi phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad la 'bras bu rnam par bzhag par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dang /
527a3(khri pa): mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam bsgom pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam bsgom pa'i 'bras bu'ang yod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag nyid la 'bras
527a4(khri pa): bu rnam par bzhag pa yin gyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
527a5(khri pa): ci la ma bsgom na/'bras bu thob lags sam 'on te lam ma bsgom pa 'bras bu thob par 'gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
527a6(khri pa): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor lam bsgoms na'ang 'bras bu mi 'thob la/lam ma bsgoms pa'ang 'bras bu 'thob par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms
527a7(khri pa): por yang 'bras bu mi 'thob ste/lam med por yang 'bras bu thob pa med la lam la gnas te'ang ma yin te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
527b1(khri pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sems can rnams la 'bras bu rnam par 'god pa byed mod kyi/'dus byas kyi khams la 'am/'dus ma byas kyi khams la char gcad pa'i tshul gyis 'bras bu rnam
527b2(khri pa): par 'god pa ma yin no//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas kyi khams la char gcad pas 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/'o na de bzhin
527b3(khri pa): gshegs pas 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yin no//'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems bsrabs pa'i phyir/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
527b4(khri pa): 'bras bu yin no//'ogro ma'i'o cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yin no//gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa
527b5(khri pa): nyid do//kun 'byung ba'i chos gang ci'ang rung ba de thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pa ni rang byang chub yin no//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni bag chags kyi mtshams
527b6(khri pa): sbyor ba dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa yin no zhes ma bstan lags sam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyis chos rnams la char gcad
527b7(khri pa): pos 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ni ma yin no zhes/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di'i don bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi logs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
528a1(khri pa): 'byor ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/dgra bcom pa nyid dam/rang byang chub bam/blan med
528a2(khri pa): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas yin nam/'o na de 'dus ma byas yin/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad ni 'dus ma bgyis lags so//bcom
528a3(khri pa): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/rab 'byor ci 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la tshor gcad du yod dam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma mchis lags so//rab 'byor ci rigs kyi
528a4(khri pa): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gi cha 'dus byos dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig par rtogs pa de'i tshe 'di lta ste 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi
528a5(khri pa): chos gang la'ang char gcod par byed dam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
528a6(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa char gcad du med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sems can rnams la
528a7(khri pa): chos ston par byed cing /bdag kyang chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen par mi byed la/gzhan dag kyang chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen par byed du mi 'jug ste/'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
528b1(khri pa): byin pa dang de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ram bsam gtan dang po 'am bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar ram/byams pa la snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang
528b2(khri pa): snyoms la snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar
528b3(khri pa): ram/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar ram/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mam de bzhin du sbyar te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
528b4(khri pa): kyi bar la mngon par zhen par mi byed de de dag la mngon par zhen par mi byed pas/chos gang la'ang chags pa med do//dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni sbyin pa'ang sbyin par byed la/
528b5(khri pa): sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang nyams su myong bar byed sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la'ang mi gnas te/sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba kho na'i don du pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bor la spyod cing /
528b6(khri pa): de bzhin du zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa dang 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la spyod med kyi/chos gang
528b7(khri pa): la'ang mi gnas so//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/chos thams cad la spyod mod kyi chos gang la'ang mi gnas
529a1(khri pa): shing chags pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des chos thams cad kyichos kyi mtshan nyid legs par rtogs pa'i phyir ro///'phags pa shes ra
529a2(khri pa): kyipha rol tu phyin pa khri pa//bam po sum cu pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad
529a3(khri pa): mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i mchog lags te/mtshan ma ni btags pa tsam kun du rtog pa las byung ba logs na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
529a4(khri pa): spyod pa/ji ltar bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams las khyad par 'thob par 'gyur la/gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos khyad par du 'thob pa la sbyor bar bgyid cing /dge ba'i chos rnams
529a5(khri pa): kyis sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid la/sems can rnams kyang theg pa gsum po dag la sbyor bar bgyid cing /rab tu 'god par bgyid lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom
529a6(khri pa): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po 'am/dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig sgom
529a7(khri pa): zhing /dngos po med pa dang /mtshan ma med pa mi sgom na ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bdag kyang khyad par 'thob par mi 'gyur la/gzhan dag kyang khyad par
529b1(khri pa): la sbyor bar byed cing /rab tu 'god par mi 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis bsam
529b2(khri pa): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /gal te
529b3(khri pa): mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed la/de bzhin du gal te mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed//
529b4(khri pa): gal te mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs mod pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed/de bzhin du gal te mtshan ma med pa kho na'i
529b5(khri pa): tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du sgom zhing yongs su rdzogs par byed/de bzhin du mtshan
529b6(khri pa): ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs
529b7(khri pa): su rdzogs par byed/mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed/de bzhin du sbyar te/mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
530a1(khri pa): nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed/de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed/mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis
530a2(khri pa): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed/de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa kho na'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs po'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa
530a3(khri pa): bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed na/de ltar na de
530a4(khri pa): de dag la mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chags par mi byed la/phyin ci log tu'ang mi 'gyur te/de dge ba'i chos 'di dag bsgoms nas gzhan dag kyang 'di lta ste/dge ba'i chos de
530a5(khri pa): dag nyid la sbyor bar byed cing rab tu 'god par byed do//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de la tha na sa gol gtog
530a6(khri pa): pa tsam du'ango chos kyi mtshan ma zhig yod par gyur na'ang /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de/chos thams cad mtshan ma
530a7(khri pa): med pa dang /dran pa med pa dang /yid la byed pa med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/'di lta ste/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la de bzhin nyid du 'god par mi
530b1(khri pa): 'gyur ro//rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa dang /dran pa med pa dang /yid la byed pa med pa yin te/rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
530b2(khri pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi rtag tu sems can rnams kyi don byed do//gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te
530b3(khri pa): chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang dran pa ma mchis pa dang /yid la byed pa ma mchis pa lags na ci'i slad du 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams so//'dra dag ni
530b4(khri pa): zag pa med pa dug go//'di dag ni 'jig rten pa dag go//'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa dag go/'di dag ni 'dus byas dag go/'di dag ni 'dus ma byas dag go//'di dag ni
530b5(khri pa): thun mong pa dag go/'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa dag go/'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams so//'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so//'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos
530b6(khri pa): rnams so//'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes chos rnams la tha dad pa mang por gdags pa mdzad lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
530b7(khri pa): pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma
531a1(khri pa): lags so//rab 'byor 'di rje snyam du sems/mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/rlung sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan/byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kya
531a2(khri pa): gzhan/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam myam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
531a3(khri pa): stsal pa/rab 'byor 'o na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub
531a4(khri pa): nyid mtshan ma med pa yin nam/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nying mtshan ma med pa yin nam/gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/btsun pa bde
531a5(khri pa): bar gshegs pa de de lta lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor khyod kyis rnam grangs des na/'di ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa yin par rig par
531a6(khri pa): bya'o//rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa'i chos 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen po ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te/'di lta ste/pha rol
531a7(khri pa): tu byin pa drug dong /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med po bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba
531b1(khri pa): bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'bags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /de bzhin du sbyar te sangs rgyas
531b2(khri pa): kyi chos thams cad kyi bar gyis rtag tu rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /
531b3(khri pa): smon pa med pa ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par mi bya ba'i phyir ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'dir dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir ro//de
531b4(khri pa): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa yin la rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba//
531b5(khri pa): yin/rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni smon lam thams cad rnam par spangs pa yin pa'i phyir te/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
531b6(khri pa): dpa' chen po de ni phung po lnga pa dag la skye ba dang 'jig par rjes su lta zhing slob pa yin/de bzhin du skye mched bcu gnyis dang /khams bco brgyad dang /de bzhin du 'phags pa'i
531b7(khri pa): bden pa bzhi rtogs pa la slob pa yin te rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis po rtogs par khong du chud pa la slob pa yin de nas nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi
532a1(khri pa): nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/de bzhin du dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa
532a2(khri pa): yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar la slob pa yin/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
532a3(khri pa): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
532a4(khri pa): khri pa las chos kyi sbyin pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu dgu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan
532a5(khri pa): 'das 'o na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la slob pa na phung po lnga po dag la ji ltar skye ba dang 'jig par rjes
532a6(khri pa): su lta zhing slob pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa/gzugs yang
532a7(khri pa): dge pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/gzugs gang las kyang mi skye ba dang /gang du'ang 'ogag pa med pa dang /gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
532b1(khri pa): shes so//gzugs ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes she na/dper na dbu pa rdos pa la snying po gtan med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang 'di lta ste/shin tu gse tshogs
532b2(khri pa): dang shin tu gsod ldong du rab tu shes so//gzugs kyi skye ba ji ltar rab tu shes she na/gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med la gang du'ang 'gro ba med de/gzugs gang nas kyang 'ong ba
532b3(khri pa): med pa nyid dang /gang du'ang 'gro ba med pa nyid du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba rab tu shes so//gzugs kyi 'gag pa ji ltar rab tu shes she na
532b4(khri pa): gzugs de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med la/zad pa dang 'jig pa'i chos can dang ldan pa de ltar gzugs kyi 'gag pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//gzugs
532b5(khri pa): kyi de bzhin nyid ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes she na/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la skye ba'ang med/'gag pa'ang med/gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/gang du'ang 'gro ba med//
532b6(khri pa): kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang med/rnam par byang ba'ang med/'phel ba'ang med/'grib pa'ang med pa de ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//tshor
532b7(khri pa): ba ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes she na chu'i chu bur gyi gnas pa bzhin du 'di lta ste/shin tu 'bras yin pa dang /shin tu zug rngu yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
533a1(khri pa): du rab tu shes so//tshor ba gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med la/de ni gsum 'dus pa las kyang 'byung ba de ltar tshor ba'i skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
533a2(khri pa): du rab tu shes so//tshor ba gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med la/zad pa dang 'jig pa'i chos can dang yang ldan pa de ltar tshor ba'i 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
533a3(khri pa): tu shes so//tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang med/rnam par byang ba'ang med/'phel ba'ang med/'grib pa'ang med pa de ltar tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba
533a4(khri pa): bzhin du rab tu shes so//'du shes ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//dper na smig rgyu ni chu 'dod pa la slu bar byed pa yin te/smig rgya la chu dmigs su med pa de ltar 'du
533a5(khri pa): shes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'du shes gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med la/log par kun tu rtog pa las kyang 'byung zhing gdags pas/tha snyad du
533a6(khri pa): 'dogs par byed pa de ltar 'du shes kyi skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//de gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med la/zad pa dang 'jig pa'i chos can yang
533a7(khri pa): ldan pa de ltar 'du shes kyi 'gog pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab du shes so//'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang mang /rnam par byang ba'ang med/'phel ba'ang
533b1(khri pa): med/'grib pa'ang med pa de ltar 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//'du byed rnams ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes she na/dper na chu
